6 #ifndef _ftdf
7 #define _ftdf
8 
9 #if dg_configBLACK_ORCA_IC_REV == BLACK_ORCA_IC_REV_A
10 /*
11  *
12  * REGISTER: ftdf_retention_ram_tx_fifo
13  *
14  * Initialization value: none.
15  * Access mode: C-RW (control - read/write)
16  ************************************************************************************
17  *
18  * Copyright (c) 2016, Dialog Semiconductor
19  * All rights reserved.
20  * Redistribution and use in source and binary forms, with or without modification,
21  * are permitted provided that the following conditions are met:
22  * 1. Redistributions of source code must retain the above copyright notice,
23  * this list of conditions and the following disclaimer.
24  * 2. Redistributions in binary form must reproduce the above copyright notice,
25  * this list of conditions and the following disclaimer in the documentation
26  * and/or other materials provided with the distribution.
27  * 3. Neither the name of the copyright holder nor the names of its contributors
28  * may be used to endorse or promote products derived from this software without
29  * specific prior written permission.
30  *

32  * AND ANY EXPRESS OR IMPLIED WARRANTIES, INCLUDING, BUT NOT LIMITED TO, THE IMPLIED
33  * WARRANTIES OF MERCHANTABILITY AND FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE ARE DISCLAIMED.
34  * IN NO EVENT SHALL THE COPYRIGHT HOLDER OR CONTRIBUTORS BE LIABLE FOR ANY DIRECT,
35  * INDIRECT, INCIDENTAL, SPECIAL, EXEMPLARY, OR CONSEQUENTIAL DAMAGES (INCLUDING,
36  * BUT NOT LIMITED TO, PROCUREMENT OF SUBSTITUTE GOODS OR SERVICES; LOSS OF USE, DATA,
37  * OR PROFITS; OR BUSINESS INTERRUPTION) HOWEVER CAUSED AND ON ANY THEORY OF LIABILITY,

44 #define IND_R_FTDF_RETENTION_RAM_TX_FIFO 0x40080000
45 #define SIZE_R_FTDF_RETENTION_RAM_TX_FIFO 0x4
46 #define MSK_R_FTDF_RETENTION_RAM_TX_FIFO 0xffffffff
47 #define FTDF_RETENTION_RAM_TX_FIFO_NUM_1D 0x4
48 #define FTDF_RETENTION_RAM_TX_FIFO_INTVL_1D 0x80
49 #define FTDF_RETENTION_RAM_TX_FIFO_NUM_2D 0x20
50 #define FTDF_RETENTION_RAM_TX_FIFO_INTVL_2D 0x4
51 #define FTDF_RETENTION_RAM_TX_FIFO_NUM_1D 0x4
52 #define FTDF_RETENTION_RAM_TX_FIFO_INTVL_1D 0x80
53 #define FTDF_RETENTION_RAM_TX_FIFO_NUM_2D 0x20
54 #define FTDF_RETENTION_RAM_TX_FIFO_INTVL_2D 0x4
55 
56 /*
57  *
58  * Field: ftdf_retention_ram_tx_fifo
59  *
60  * Transmit fifo buffer, contains 32 addresses per entry (32b x 32a = 128B). There are 4 entries supported.
61  */
62 #define IND_F_FTDF_RETENTION_RAM_TX_FIFO IND_R_FTDF_RETENTION_RAM_TX_FIFO
63 #define MSK_F_FTDF_RETENTION_RAM_TX_FIFO 0xffffffff
64 #define OFF_F_FTDF_RETENTION_RAM_TX_FIFO 0
65 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_RETENTION_RAM_TX_FIFO 32
66 
67 /*
68  *
69  * REGISTER: ftdf_retention_ram_tx_meta_data_0
70  *
71  * Initialization value: none.
72  * Access mode: C-RW (control - read/write)
73  */
74 #define IND_R_FTDF_RETENTION_RAM_TX_META_DATA_0 0x40080200
75 #define SIZE_R_FTDF_RETENTION_RAM_TX_META_DATA_0 0x4
76 #define MSK_R_FTDF_RETENTION_RAM_TX_META_DATA_0 0x57ffffff
77 #define FTDF_RETENTION_RAM_TX_META_DATA_0_NUM 0x4
78 #define FTDF_RETENTION_RAM_TX_META_DATA_0_INTVL 0x10
79 #define FTDF_RETENTION_RAM_FRAME_LENGTH_NUM 0x4
80 #define FTDF_RETENTION_RAM_FRAME_LENGTH_INTVL 0x10
81 #define FTDF_RETENTION_RAM_PHYATTR_NUM 0x4
82 #define FTDF_RETENTION_RAM_PHYATTR_INTVL 0x10
83 #define FTDF_RETENTION_RAM_FRAMETYPE_NUM 0x4
84 #define FTDF_RETENTION_RAM_FRAMETYPE_INTVL 0x10
85 #define FTDF_RETENTION_RAM_CSMACA_ENA_NUM 0x4
86 #define FTDF_RETENTION_RAM_CSMACA_ENA_INTVL 0x10
87 #define FTDF_RETENTION_RAM_ACKREQUEST_NUM 0x4
88 #define FTDF_RETENTION_RAM_ACKREQUEST_INTVL 0x10
89 #define FTDF_RETENTION_RAM_CRC16_ENA_NUM 0x4
90 #define FTDF_RETENTION_RAM_CRC16_ENA_INTVL 0x10
91 
92 /*
93  *
94  * Field: ftdf_retention_ram_frame_length
95  *
96  * Frame length
97  */
98 #define IND_F_FTDF_RETENTION_RAM_FRAME_LENGTH IND_R_FTDF_RETENTION_RAM_TX_META_DATA_0
99 #define MSK_F_FTDF_RETENTION_RAM_FRAME_LENGTH 0x7f
100 #define OFF_F_FTDF_RETENTION_RAM_FRAME_LENGTH 0
101 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_RETENTION_RAM_FRAME_LENGTH 7
102 /*
103  *
104  * Field: ftdf_retention_ram_phyAttr
105  *
106  * During the RX-ON phase, the control register phyRxAttr[16] sources the PHYATTR output signal to the DPHY.
107  * This is also applicable during a CCA or Energy detect scan phase.
108  */
109 #define IND_F_FTDF_RETENTION_RAM_PHYATTR IND_R_FTDF_RETENTION_RAM_TX_META_DATA_0
110 #define MSK_F_FTDF_RETENTION_RAM_PHYATTR 0x7fff80
111 #define OFF_F_FTDF_RETENTION_RAM_PHYATTR 7
112 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_RETENTION_RAM_PHYATTR 16
113 /*
114  *
115  * Field: ftdf_retention_ram_frametype
116  *
117  * Data/Cmd/Ack etc. Also indicate wakeup frame
118  */
119 #define IND_F_FTDF_RETENTION_RAM_FRAMETYPE IND_R_FTDF_RETENTION_RAM_TX_META_DATA_0
120 #define MSK_F_FTDF_RETENTION_RAM_FRAMETYPE 0x3800000
121 #define OFF_F_FTDF_RETENTION_RAM_FRAMETYPE 23
122 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_RETENTION_RAM_FRAMETYPE 3
123 /*
124  *
125  * Bit: ftdf_retention_ram_CsmaCa_ena
126  *
127  * Indicates whether a CSMA-CA is required for the transmission of this packet.
128  */
129 #define IND_F_FTDF_RETENTION_RAM_CSMACA_ENA IND_R_FTDF_RETENTION_RAM_TX_META_DATA_0
130 #define MSK_F_FTDF_RETENTION_RAM_CSMACA_ENA 0x4000000
131 #define OFF_F_FTDF_RETENTION_RAM_CSMACA_ENA 26
132 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_RETENTION_RAM_CSMACA_ENA 1
133 /*
134  *
135  * Bit: ftdf_retention_ram_AckRequest
136  *
137  * Indicates whether an acknowledge is expected from the recipient of this packet.
138  */
139 #define IND_F_FTDF_RETENTION_RAM_ACKREQUEST IND_R_FTDF_RETENTION_RAM_TX_META_DATA_0
140 #define MSK_F_FTDF_RETENTION_RAM_ACKREQUEST 0x10000000
141 #define OFF_F_FTDF_RETENTION_RAM_ACKREQUEST 28
142 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_RETENTION_RAM_ACKREQUEST 1
143 /*
144  *
145  * Bit: ftdf_retention_ram_CRC16_ena
146  *
147  * Indicates whether CRC16 insertion must be enabled or not.
148  * 0 : No hardware inserted CRC16
149  * 1 : Hardware inserts CRC16
150  */
151 #define IND_F_FTDF_RETENTION_RAM_CRC16_ENA IND_R_FTDF_RETENTION_RAM_TX_META_DATA_0
152 #define MSK_F_FTDF_RETENTION_RAM_CRC16_ENA 0x40000000
153 #define OFF_F_FTDF_RETENTION_RAM_CRC16_ENA 30
154 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_RETENTION_RAM_CRC16_ENA 1
155 
156 /*
157  *
158  * REGISTER: ftdf_retention_ram_tx_meta_data_1
159  *
160  * Initialization value: none.
161  * Access mode: C-RW (control - read/write)
162  */
163 #define IND_R_FTDF_RETENTION_RAM_TX_META_DATA_1 0x40080204
164 #define SIZE_R_FTDF_RETENTION_RAM_TX_META_DATA_1 0x4
165 #define MSK_R_FTDF_RETENTION_RAM_TX_META_DATA_1 0xff
166 #define FTDF_RETENTION_RAM_TX_META_DATA_1_NUM 0x4
167 #define FTDF_RETENTION_RAM_TX_META_DATA_1_INTVL 0x10
168 #define FTDF_RETENTION_RAM_MACSN_NUM 0x4
169 #define FTDF_RETENTION_RAM_MACSN_INTVL 0x10
170 
171 /*
172  *
173  * Field: ftdf_retention_ram_macSN
174  *
175  * Sequence Number of this packet.
176  */
177 #define IND_F_FTDF_RETENTION_RAM_MACSN IND_R_FTDF_RETENTION_RAM_TX_META_DATA_1
178 #define MSK_F_FTDF_RETENTION_RAM_MACSN 0xff
179 #define OFF_F_FTDF_RETENTION_RAM_MACSN 0
180 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_RETENTION_RAM_MACSN 8
181 
182 /*
183  *
184  * REGISTER: ftdf_retention_ram_tx_return_status_0
185  *
186  * Initialization value: none.
187  * Access mode: S-R (state - read)
188  */
189 #define IND_R_FTDF_RETENTION_RAM_TX_RETURN_STATUS_0 0x40080240
190 #define SIZE_R_FTDF_RETENTION_RAM_TX_RETURN_STATUS_0 0x4
191 #define MSK_R_FTDF_RETENTION_RAM_TX_RETURN_STATUS_0 0xffffffff
192 #define FTDF_RETENTION_RAM_TX_RETURN_STATUS_0_NUM 0x4
193 #define FTDF_RETENTION_RAM_TX_RETURN_STATUS_0_INTVL 0x10
194 #define FTDF_RETENTION_RAM_TXTIMESTAMP_NUM 0x4
195 #define FTDF_RETENTION_RAM_TXTIMESTAMP_INTVL 0x10
196 
197 /*
198  *
199  * Field: ftdf_retention_ram_TxTimestamp
200  *
201  * Transmit Timestamp
202  * The TimeStamp of the transmitted packet.
203  */
204 #define IND_F_FTDF_RETENTION_RAM_TXTIMESTAMP IND_R_FTDF_RETENTION_RAM_TX_RETURN_STATUS_0
205 #define MSK_F_FTDF_RETENTION_RAM_TXTIMESTAMP 0xffffffff
206 #define OFF_F_FTDF_RETENTION_RAM_TXTIMESTAMP 0
207 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_RETENTION_RAM_TXTIMESTAMP 32
208 
209 /*
210  *
211  * REGISTER: ftdf_retention_ram_tx_return_status_1
212  *
213  * Initialization value: none.
214  * Access mode: S-R (state - read)
215  */
216 #define IND_R_FTDF_RETENTION_RAM_TX_RETURN_STATUS_1 0x40080244
217 #define SIZE_R_FTDF_RETENTION_RAM_TX_RETURN_STATUS_1 0x4
218 #define MSK_R_FTDF_RETENTION_RAM_TX_RETURN_STATUS_1 0x1f
219 #define FTDF_RETENTION_RAM_TX_RETURN_STATUS_1_NUM 0x4
220 #define FTDF_RETENTION_RAM_TX_RETURN_STATUS_1_INTVL 0x10
221 #define FTDF_RETENTION_RAM_ACKFAIL_NUM 0x4
222 #define FTDF_RETENTION_RAM_ACKFAIL_INTVL 0x10
223 #define FTDF_RETENTION_RAM_CSMACAFAIL_NUM 0x4
224 #define FTDF_RETENTION_RAM_CSMACAFAIL_INTVL 0x10
225 #define FTDF_RETENTION_RAM_CSMACANRRETRIES_NUM 0x4
226 #define FTDF_RETENTION_RAM_CSMACANRRETRIES_INTVL 0x10
227 
228 /*
229  *
230  * Bit: ftdf_retention_ram_AckFail
231  *
232  * Acknowledgement status
233  * 0 : SUCCESS
234  * 1 : FAIL
235  */
236 #define IND_F_FTDF_RETENTION_RAM_ACKFAIL IND_R_FTDF_RETENTION_RAM_TX_RETURN_STATUS_1
237 #define MSK_F_FTDF_RETENTION_RAM_ACKFAIL 0x1
238 #define OFF_F_FTDF_RETENTION_RAM_ACKFAIL 0
239 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_RETENTION_RAM_ACKFAIL 1
240 /*
241  *
242  * Bit: ftdf_retention_ram_CsmaCaFail
243  *
244  * CSMA-CA status
245  * 0 : SUCCESS
246  * 1 : FAIL
247  */
248 #define IND_F_FTDF_RETENTION_RAM_CSMACAFAIL IND_R_FTDF_RETENTION_RAM_TX_RETURN_STATUS_1
249 #define MSK_F_FTDF_RETENTION_RAM_CSMACAFAIL 0x2
250 #define OFF_F_FTDF_RETENTION_RAM_CSMACAFAIL 1
251 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_RETENTION_RAM_CSMACAFAIL 1
252 /*
253  *
254  * Field: ftdf_retention_ram_CsmaCaNrRetries
255  *
256  * Number of CSMA-CA retries
257  */
258 #define IND_F_FTDF_RETENTION_RAM_CSMACANRRETRIES IND_R_FTDF_RETENTION_RAM_TX_RETURN_STATUS_1
259 #define MSK_F_FTDF_RETENTION_RAM_CSMACANRRETRIES 0x1c
260 #define OFF_F_FTDF_RETENTION_RAM_CSMACANRRETRIES 2
261 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_RETENTION_RAM_CSMACANRRETRIES 3
262 
263 /*
264  *
265  * REGISTER: ftdf_retention_ram_rx_meta_0
266  *
267  * Initialization value: none.
268  * Access mode: S-R (state - read)
269  */
270 #define IND_R_FTDF_RETENTION_RAM_RX_META_0 0x40080280
271 #define SIZE_R_FTDF_RETENTION_RAM_RX_META_0 0x4
272 #define MSK_R_FTDF_RETENTION_RAM_RX_META_0 0xffffffff
273 #define FTDF_RETENTION_RAM_RX_META_0_NUM 0x8
274 #define FTDF_RETENTION_RAM_RX_META_0_INTVL 0x10
275 #define FTDF_RETENTION_RAM_RX_TIMESTAMP_NUM 0x8
276 #define FTDF_RETENTION_RAM_RX_TIMESTAMP_INTVL 0x10
277 
278 /*
279  *
280  * Field: ftdf_retention_ram_rx_timestamp
281  *
282  * Timestamp taken when frame was received
283  */
284 #define IND_F_FTDF_RETENTION_RAM_RX_TIMESTAMP IND_R_FTDF_RETENTION_RAM_RX_META_0
285 #define MSK_F_FTDF_RETENTION_RAM_RX_TIMESTAMP 0xffffffff
286 #define OFF_F_FTDF_RETENTION_RAM_RX_TIMESTAMP 0
287 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_RETENTION_RAM_RX_TIMESTAMP 32
288 
289 /*
290  *
291  * REGISTER: ftdf_retention_ram_rx_meta_1
292  *
293  * Initialization value: none.
294  * Access mode: S-R (state - read)
295  */
296 #define IND_R_FTDF_RETENTION_RAM_RX_META_1 0x40080284
297 #define SIZE_R_FTDF_RETENTION_RAM_RX_META_1 0x4
298 #define MSK_R_FTDF_RETENTION_RAM_RX_META_1 0xfffd
299 #define FTDF_RETENTION_RAM_RX_META_1_NUM 0x8
300 #define FTDF_RETENTION_RAM_RX_META_1_INTVL 0x10
301 #define FTDF_RETENTION_RAM_CRC16_ERROR_NUM 0x8
302 #define FTDF_RETENTION_RAM_CRC16_ERROR_INTVL 0x10
303 #define FTDF_RETENTION_RAM_RES_FRM_TYPE_ERROR_NUM 0x8
304 #define FTDF_RETENTION_RAM_RES_FRM_TYPE_ERROR_INTVL 0x10
305 #define FTDF_RETENTION_RAM_RES_FRM_VERSION_ERROR_NUM 0x8
306 #define FTDF_RETENTION_RAM_RES_FRM_VERSION_ERROR_INTVL 0x10
307 #define FTDF_RETENTION_RAM_DPANID_ERROR_NUM 0x8
308 #define FTDF_RETENTION_RAM_DPANID_ERROR_INTVL 0x10
309 #define FTDF_RETENTION_RAM_DADDR_ERROR_NUM 0x8
310 #define FTDF_RETENTION_RAM_DADDR_ERROR_INTVL 0x10
311 #define FTDF_RETENTION_RAM_SPANID_ERROR_NUM 0x8
312 #define FTDF_RETENTION_RAM_SPANID_ERROR_INTVL 0x10
313 #define FTDF_RETENTION_RAM_ISPANID_COORD_ERROR_NUM 0x8
314 #define FTDF_RETENTION_RAM_ISPANID_COORD_ERROR_INTVL 0x10
315 #define FTDF_RETENTION_RAM_QUALITY_INDICATOR_NUM 0x8
316 #define FTDF_RETENTION_RAM_QUALITY_INDICATOR_INTVL 0x10
317 
318 /*
319  *
320  * Bit: ftdf_retention_ram_crc16_error
321  *
322  * CRC error, applicable for transparent mode only
323  */
324 #define IND_F_FTDF_RETENTION_RAM_CRC16_ERROR IND_R_FTDF_RETENTION_RAM_RX_META_1
325 #define MSK_F_FTDF_RETENTION_RAM_CRC16_ERROR 0x1
326 #define OFF_F_FTDF_RETENTION_RAM_CRC16_ERROR 0
327 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_RETENTION_RAM_CRC16_ERROR 1
328 /*
329  *
330  * Bit: ftdf_retention_ram_res_frm_type_error
331  *
332  * Not supported frame type error, applicable when frame is not discarded
333  */
334 #define IND_F_FTDF_RETENTION_RAM_RES_FRM_TYPE_ERROR IND_R_FTDF_RETENTION_RAM_RX_META_1
335 #define MSK_F_FTDF_RETENTION_RAM_RES_FRM_TYPE_ERROR 0x4
336 #define OFF_F_FTDF_RETENTION_RAM_RES_FRM_TYPE_ERROR 2
337 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_RETENTION_RAM_RES_FRM_TYPE_ERROR 1
338 /*
339  *
340  * Bit: ftdf_retention_ram_res_frm_version_error
341  *
342  * Not supported frame version error, applicable when frame is not discarded.
343  */
344 #define IND_F_FTDF_RETENTION_RAM_RES_FRM_VERSION_ERROR IND_R_FTDF_RETENTION_RAM_RX_META_1
345 #define MSK_F_FTDF_RETENTION_RAM_RES_FRM_VERSION_ERROR 0x8
346 #define OFF_F_FTDF_RETENTION_RAM_RES_FRM_VERSION_ERROR 3
347 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_RETENTION_RAM_RES_FRM_VERSION_ERROR 1
348 /*
349  *
350  * Bit: ftdf_retention_ram_dpanid_error
351  *
352  * D PAN ID error, applicable when frame is not discarded
353  */
354 #define IND_F_FTDF_RETENTION_RAM_DPANID_ERROR IND_R_FTDF_RETENTION_RAM_RX_META_1
355 #define MSK_F_FTDF_RETENTION_RAM_DPANID_ERROR 0x10
356 #define OFF_F_FTDF_RETENTION_RAM_DPANID_ERROR 4
357 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_RETENTION_RAM_DPANID_ERROR 1
358 /*
359  *
360  * Bit: ftdf_retention_ram_daddr_error
361  *
362  * D Address error, applicable when frame is not discarded
363  */
364 #define IND_F_FTDF_RETENTION_RAM_DADDR_ERROR IND_R_FTDF_RETENTION_RAM_RX_META_1
365 #define MSK_F_FTDF_RETENTION_RAM_DADDR_ERROR 0x20
366 #define OFF_F_FTDF_RETENTION_RAM_DADDR_ERROR 5
367 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_RETENTION_RAM_DADDR_ERROR 1
368 /*
369  *
370  * Bit: ftdf_retention_ram_spanid_error
371  *
372  * PAN ID error, applicable when frame is not discarded
373  */
374 #define IND_F_FTDF_RETENTION_RAM_SPANID_ERROR IND_R_FTDF_RETENTION_RAM_RX_META_1
375 #define MSK_F_FTDF_RETENTION_RAM_SPANID_ERROR 0x40
376 #define OFF_F_FTDF_RETENTION_RAM_SPANID_ERROR 6
377 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_RETENTION_RAM_SPANID_ERROR 1
378 /*
379  *
380  * Bit: ftdf_retention_ram_ispanid_coord_error
381  *
382  * Received frame not for PAN coordinator, applicable when frame is not discarded
383  */
384 #define IND_F_FTDF_RETENTION_RAM_ISPANID_COORD_ERROR IND_R_FTDF_RETENTION_RAM_RX_META_1
385 #define MSK_F_FTDF_RETENTION_RAM_ISPANID_COORD_ERROR 0x80
386 #define OFF_F_FTDF_RETENTION_RAM_ISPANID_COORD_ERROR 7
387 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_RETENTION_RAM_ISPANID_COORD_ERROR 1
388 /*
389  *
390  * Field: ftdf_retention_ram_quality_indicator
391  *
392  * Link Quality Indication
393  *
394  * # $software_scratch@retention_ram
395  * # TX ram not used by hardware, can be used by software as scratch ram with retention.
396  */
397 #define IND_F_FTDF_RETENTION_RAM_QUALITY_INDICATOR IND_R_FTDF_RETENTION_RAM_RX_META_1
398 #define MSK_F_FTDF_RETENTION_RAM_QUALITY_INDICATOR 0xff00
399 #define OFF_F_FTDF_RETENTION_RAM_QUALITY_INDICATOR 8
400 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_RETENTION_RAM_QUALITY_INDICATOR 8
401 
402 /*
403  *
404  * REGISTER: ftdf_rx_ram_rx_fifo
405  *
406  * Initialization value: none.
407  * Access mode: C-RW (control - read/write)
408  */
409 #define IND_R_FTDF_RX_RAM_RX_FIFO 0x40088000
410 #define SIZE_R_FTDF_RX_RAM_RX_FIFO 0x4
411 #define MSK_R_FTDF_RX_RAM_RX_FIFO 0xffffffff
412 #define FTDF_RX_RAM_RX_FIFO_NUM_1D 0x8
413 #define FTDF_RX_RAM_RX_FIFO_INTVL_1D 0x80
414 #define FTDF_RX_RAM_RX_FIFO_NUM_2D 0x20
415 #define FTDF_RX_RAM_RX_FIFO_INTVL_2D 0x4
416 #define FTDF_RX_RAM_RX_FIFO_NUM_1D 0x8
417 #define FTDF_RX_RAM_RX_FIFO_INTVL_1D 0x80
418 #define FTDF_RX_RAM_RX_FIFO_NUM_2D 0x20
419 #define FTDF_RX_RAM_RX_FIFO_INTVL_2D 0x4
420 
421 /*
422  *
423  * Field: ftdf_rx_ram_rx_fifo
424  *
425  * Receive fifo ram, contains 32 addresses per entry (32b x 32a = 128B). There are 8 entries supported.
426  */
427 #define IND_F_FTDF_RX_RAM_RX_FIFO IND_R_FTDF_RX_RAM_RX_FIFO
428 #define MSK_F_FTDF_RX_RAM_RX_FIFO 0xffffffff
429 #define OFF_F_FTDF_RX_RAM_RX_FIFO 0
430 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_RX_RAM_RX_FIFO 32
431 
432 /*
433  *
434  * REGISTER: ftdf_on_off_regmap_Rel_Name
435  *
436  * Initialization value: none.
437  * Access mode: S-R (state - read)
438  */
439 #define IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_REL_NAME 0x40090000
440 #define SIZE_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_REL_NAME 0x4
441 #define MSK_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_REL_NAME 0xffffffff
442 #define FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_REL_NAME_NUM 0x4
443 #define FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_REL_NAME_INTVL 0x4
444 #define FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_REL_NAME_NUM 0x4
445 #define FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_REL_NAME_INTVL 0x4
446 
447 /*
448  *
449  * Field: ftdf_on_off_regmap_Rel_Name
450  *
451  * Name of the release
452  */
453 #define IND_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_REL_NAME IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_REL_NAME
454 #define MSK_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_REL_NAME 0xffffffff
455 #define OFF_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_REL_NAME 0
456 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_REL_NAME 32
457 
458 /*
459  *
460  * REGISTER: ftdf_on_off_regmap_BuildTime
461  *
462  * Initialization value: none.
463  * Access mode: S-R (state - read)
464  */
465 #define IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_BUILDTIME 0x40090010
466 #define SIZE_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_BUILDTIME 0x4
467 #define MSK_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_BUILDTIME 0xffffffff
468 #define FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_BUILDTIME_NUM 0x4
469 #define FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_BUILDTIME_INTVL 0x4
470 #define FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_BUILDTIME_NUM 0x4
471 #define FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_BUILDTIME_INTVL 0x4
472 
473 /*
474  *
475  * Field: ftdf_on_off_regmap_BuildTime
476  *
477  * Build time of device
478  */
479 #define IND_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_BUILDTIME IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_BUILDTIME
480 #define MSK_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_BUILDTIME 0xffffffff
481 #define OFF_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_BUILDTIME 0
482 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_BUILDTIME 32
483 
484 /*
485  *
486  * REGISTER: ftdf_on_off_regmap_glob_control_0
487  *
488  * Initialization value: 0xff00 Initialization mask: 0x6ff0e
489  * Access mode: C-RW (control - read/write)
490  */
491 #define IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_GLOB_CONTROL_0 0x40090020
492 #define SIZE_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_GLOB_CONTROL_0 0x4
493 #define MSK_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_GLOB_CONTROL_0 0x6ff0e
494 
495 /*
496  *
497  * Bit: ftdf_on_off_regmap_IsPANCoordinator
498  *
499  * Enable/disable receiver check on address
500  * fields (0=enabled, 1=disabled)
501  */
502 #define IND_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_ISPANCOORDINATOR IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_GLOB_CONTROL_0
503 #define MSK_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_ISPANCOORDINATOR 0x2
504 #define OFF_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_ISPANCOORDINATOR 1
505 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_ISPANCOORDINATOR 1
506 /*
507  *
508  * Bit: ftdf_on_off_regmap_rx_dma_req
509  *
510  * Source of the RX_DMA_REQ output of this block.
511  */
512 #define IND_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_RX_DMA_REQ IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_GLOB_CONTROL_0
513 #define MSK_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_RX_DMA_REQ 0x4
514 #define OFF_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_RX_DMA_REQ 2
515 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_RX_DMA_REQ 1
516 /*
517  *
518  * Bit: ftdf_on_off_regmap_tx_dma_req
519  *
520  * Source of the TX_DMA_REQ output of this block.
521  */
522 #define IND_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_TX_DMA_REQ IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_GLOB_CONTROL_0
523 #define MSK_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_TX_DMA_REQ 0x8
524 #define OFF_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_TX_DMA_REQ 3
525 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_TX_DMA_REQ 1
526 /*
527  *
528  * Field: ftdf_on_off_regmap_macSimpleAddress
529  *
530  * Simple address of the PAN coordinator
531  */
532 #define IND_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_MACSIMPLEADDRESS IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_GLOB_CONTROL_0
533 #define MSK_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_MACSIMPLEADDRESS 0xff00
534 #define OFF_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_MACSIMPLEADDRESS 8
535 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_MACSIMPLEADDRESS 8
536 /*
537  *
538  * Bit: ftdf_on_off_regmap_macLEenabled
539  *
540  * If set, Low Energy mode is enabled
541  */
542 #define IND_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_MACLEENABLED IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_GLOB_CONTROL_0
543 #define MSK_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_MACLEENABLED 0x20000
544 #define OFF_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_MACLEENABLED 17
545 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_MACLEENABLED 1
546 /*
547  *
548  * Bit: ftdf_on_off_regmap_macTSCHenabled
549  *
550  * If set, TSCH mode is enabled
551  */
552 #define IND_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_MACTSCHENABLED IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_GLOB_CONTROL_0
553 #define MSK_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_MACTSCHENABLED 0x40000
554 #define OFF_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_MACTSCHENABLED 18
555 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_MACTSCHENABLED 1
556 
557 /*
558  *
559  * REGISTER: ftdf_on_off_regmap_glob_control_1
560  *
561  * Initialization value: 0xffffffff Initialization mask: 0xffffffff
562  * Access mode: C-RW (control - read/write)
563  */
564 #define IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_GLOB_CONTROL_1 0x40090024
565 #define SIZE_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_GLOB_CONTROL_1 0x4
566 #define MSK_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_GLOB_CONTROL_1 0xffffffff
567 
568 /*
569  *
570  * Field: ftdf_on_off_regmap_macPANId
571  *
572  * The values 0xFFFF indicates that the device
573  * is not associated
574  */
575 #define IND_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_MACPANID IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_GLOB_CONTROL_1
576 #define MSK_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_MACPANID 0xffff
577 #define OFF_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_MACPANID 0
578 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_MACPANID 16
579 /*
580  *
581  * Field: ftdf_on_off_regmap_macShortAddress
582  *
583  * The values 0xFFFF and 0xFFFE indicate
584  * that no IEEE Short Address is available.
585  * The latter one is used if the device i
586  */
587 #define IND_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_MACSHORTADDRESS IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_GLOB_CONTROL_1
588 #define MSK_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_MACSHORTADDRESS 0xffff0000
589 #define OFF_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_MACSHORTADDRESS 16
590 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_MACSHORTADDRESS 16
591 
592 /*
593  *
594  * REGISTER: ftdf_on_off_regmap_glob_control_2
595  *
596  * Initialization value: 0xffffffff Initialization mask: 0xffffffff
597  * Access mode: C-RW (control - read/write)
598  */
599 #define IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_GLOB_CONTROL_2 0x40090028
600 #define SIZE_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_GLOB_CONTROL_2 0x4
601 #define MSK_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_GLOB_CONTROL_2 0xffffffff
602 
603 /*
604  *
605  * Field: ftdf_on_off_regmap_aExtendedAddress_l

607  * Unique device address, lower 32 bit
608  */
609 #define IND_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_AEXTENDEDADDRESS_L IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_GLOB_CONTROL_2
610 #define MSK_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_AEXTENDEDADDRESS_L 0xffffffff
611 #define OFF_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_AEXTENDEDADDRESS_L 0

636 /*
637  *
638  * REGISTER: ftdf_on_off_regmap_lmac_control_0
639  *
640  * Initialization value: 0x0 Initialization mask: 0xfbfffffe
641  * Access mode: C-RW (control - read/write)
642  */
643 #define IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMAC_CONTROL_0 0x40090030
644 #define SIZE_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMAC_CONTROL_0 0x4
645 #define MSK_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMAC_CONTROL_0 0xfbfffffe
646 
647 /*
648  *
649  * Field: ftdf_on_off_regmap_RxonDuration
650  *
651  * Time the Rx must be on
652  */
653 #define IND_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_RXONDURATION IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMAC_CONTROL_0
654 #define MSK_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_RXONDURATION 0x1fffffe
655 #define OFF_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_RXONDURATION 1
656 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_RXONDURATION 24
657 /*
658  *
659  * Bit: ftdf_on_off_regmap_RxAlwaysOn
660  *
661  * If set, the receiver shall be always on if
662  * RxEnable is set
663  */
664 #define IND_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_RXALWAYSON IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMAC_CONTROL_0
665 #define MSK_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_RXALWAYSON 0x2000000
666 #define OFF_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_RXALWAYSON 25
667 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_RXALWAYSON 1
668 /*
669  *
670  * Field: ftdf_on_off_regmap_pti
671  *
672  * Info to arbiter if phy_en is set
673  */
674 #define IND_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_PTI IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMAC_CONTROL_0
675 #define MSK_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_PTI 0x78000000
676 #define OFF_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_PTI 27
677 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_PTI 4
678 /*
679  *
680  * Bit: ftdf_on_off_regmap_keep_phy_en
681  *
682  * When the transmit or receive action is ready (LmacReady4Sleep will is set), the phy_en signal is cleared unless the control register keep_phy_en is set.
683  * When the control register keep_phy_en is set, the signal phy_en shall remain being set until the keep_phy_en is cleared.
684  */
685 #define IND_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_KEEP_PHY_EN IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMAC_CONTROL_0
686 #define MSK_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_KEEP_PHY_EN 0x80000000
687 #define OFF_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_KEEP_PHY_EN 31
688 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_KEEP_PHY_EN 1
689 
690 /*
691  *
692  * REGISTER: ftdf_on_off_regmap_TxPipePropDelay
693  *
694  * Initialization value: 0x0 Initialization mask: 0xff
695  * Access mode: C-RW (control - read/write)
696  */
697 #define IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_TXPIPEPROPDELAY 0x40090034
698 #define SIZE_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_TXPIPEPROPDELAY 0x4
699 #define MSK_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_TXPIPEPROPDELAY 0xff
700 
701 /*
702  *
703  * Field: ftdf_on_off_regmap_TxPipePropDelay
704  *
705  * Prop delay of tx pipe, start to DPHY
706  */
707 #define IND_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_TXPIPEPROPDELAY IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_TXPIPEPROPDELAY
708 #define MSK_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_TXPIPEPROPDELAY 0xff
709 #define OFF_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_TXPIPEPROPDELAY 0
710 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_TXPIPEPROPDELAY 8
711 
712 /*

717  * Access mode: C-RW (control - read/write)
718  */
719 #define IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_MACACKWAITDURATION 0x40090038
720 #define SIZE_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_MACACKWAITDURATION 0x4
721 #define MSK_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_MACACKWAITDURATION 0xff

725  * Field: ftdf_on_off_regmap_MacAckWaitDuration

731 #define OFF_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_MACACKWAITDURATION 0

798 #define OFF_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_EDSCANENABLE 0

811 /*

813  * REGISTER: ftdf_on_off_regmap_lmac_control_3
814  *

816  * Access mode: C-RW (control - read/write)
817  */
818 #define IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMAC_CONTROL_3 0x40090048
819 #define SIZE_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMAC_CONTROL_3 0x4
820 #define MSK_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMAC_CONTROL_3 0xffffff
821 
822 /*
823  *
824  * Field: ftdf_on_off_regmap_macMaxFrameTotalWaitTime
825  *
826  * Max time to wait for a requested Data Frame or an announced broadcast frame
827  */
828 #define IND_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_MACMAXFRAMETOTALWAITTIME IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMAC_CONTROL_3
829 #define MSK_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_MACMAXFRAMETOTALWAITTIME 0xffff
830 #define OFF_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_MACMAXFRAMETOTALWAITTIME 0
831 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_MACMAXFRAMETOTALWAITTIME 16
832 /*
833  *
834  * Field: ftdf_on_off_regmap_CcaIdleWait
835  *
836  * Time to wait after CCA returned "medium idle" before starting TX-ON (in us).
837  * Note: not applicable in TSCH mode since there macTSRxTx shall be used.
838  */
839 #define IND_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_CCAIDLEWAIT IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMAC_CONTROL_3
840 #define MSK_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_CCAIDLEWAIT 0xff0000
841 #define OFF_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_CCAIDLEWAIT 16
842 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_CCAIDLEWAIT 8
843 
844 /*
845  *
846  * REGISTER: ftdf_on_off_regmap_lmac_control_os
847  *
848  * Initialization value: 0x0 Initialization mask: 0x7
849  * Access mode: OS-W (one-shot - write)
850  */
851 #define IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMAC_CONTROL_OS 0x40090050
852 #define SIZE_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMAC_CONTROL_OS 0x4
853 #define MSK_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMAC_CONTROL_OS 0x7
854 
855 /*
856  *
857  * Bit: ftdf_on_off_regmap_getGeneratorVal
858  *
859  * If set, the current values of WU gen and TS gen will be captured.
860  */
861 #define IND_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_GETGENERATORVAL IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMAC_CONTROL_OS
862 #define MSK_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_GETGENERATORVAL 0x1
863 #define OFF_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_GETGENERATORVAL 0
864 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_GETGENERATORVAL 1
865 /*
866  *
867  * Bit: ftdf_on_off_regmap_RxEnable
868  *
869  * If set, receiving data may be done
870  */
871 #define IND_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_RXENABLE IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMAC_CONTROL_OS
872 #define MSK_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_RXENABLE 0x2
873 #define OFF_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_RXENABLE 1
874 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_RXENABLE 1
875 /*
876  *
877  * Bit: ftdf_on_off_regmap_SingleCCA
878  *
879  * If set, a single CCA will be performed.
880  */
881 #define IND_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_SINGLECCA IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMAC_CONTROL_OS
882 #define MSK_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_SINGLECCA 0x4
883 #define OFF_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_SINGLECCA 2
884 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_SINGLECCA 1
885 
886 /*
887  *
888  * REGISTER: ftdf_on_off_regmap_lmac_control_status
889  *
890  * Initialization value: none.
891  * Access mode: S-R (state - read)
892  */
893 #define IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMAC_CONTROL_STATUS 0x40090054
894 #define SIZE_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMAC_CONTROL_STATUS 0x4
895 #define MSK_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMAC_CONTROL_STATUS 0xff46
896 
897 /*
898  *
899  * Bit: ftdf_on_off_regmap_LmacReady4sleep
900  *
901  * Indicates that the LMAC is ready to go to sleep.
902  */
903 #define IND_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMACREADY4SLEEP IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMAC_CONTROL_STATUS
904 #define MSK_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMACREADY4SLEEP 0x2
905 #define OFF_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMACREADY4SLEEP 1
906 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMACREADY4SLEEP 1
907 /*
908  *
909  * Bit: ftdf_on_off_regmap_CCAStat
910  *
911  * Value single CCA when CCAstat_e is set.
912  */
913 #define IND_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_CCASTAT IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMAC_CONTROL_STATUS
914 #define MSK_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_CCASTAT 0x4
915 #define OFF_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_CCASTAT 2
916 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_CCASTAT 1
917 /*
918  *
919  * Bit: ftdf_on_off_regmap_WakeupTimerEnableStatus
920  *
921  * Status of WakeupTimerEnable after being clocked by LP_CLK (showing it's effective value).
922  */
923 #define IND_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_WAKEUPTIMERENABLESTATUS IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMAC_CONTROL_STATUS
924 #define MSK_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_WAKEUPTIMERENABLESTATUS 0x40
925 #define OFF_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_WAKEUPTIMERENABLESTATUS 6
926 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_WAKEUPTIMERENABLESTATUS 1
927 /*
928  *
929  * Field: ftdf_on_off_regmap_EdScanValue
930  *
931  * Result of ED scan.
932  */
933 #define IND_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_EDSCANVALUE IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMAC_CONTROL_STATUS
934 #define MSK_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_EDSCANVALUE 0xff00
935 #define OFF_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_EDSCANVALUE 8
936 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_EDSCANVALUE 8
937 
938 /*
939  *
940  * REGISTER: ftdf_on_off_regmap_EventCurrVal
941  *
942  * Initialization value: none.
943  * Access mode: S-R (state - read)
944  */
945 #define IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_EVENTCURRVAL 0x40090058
946 #define SIZE_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_EVENTCURRVAL 0x4
947 #define MSK_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_EVENTCURRVAL 0xffffffff
948 
949 /*
950  *
951  * Field: ftdf_on_off_regmap_EventCurrVal
952  *
953  * Value of captured Event generator
954  */
955 #define IND_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_EVENTCURRVAL IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_EVENTCURRVAL
956 #define MSK_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_EVENTCURRVAL 0xffffffff
957 #define OFF_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_EVENTCURRVAL 0
958 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_EVENTCURRVAL 32
959 
960 /*
961  *
962  * REGISTER: ftdf_on_off_regmap_TimeStampCurrVal
963  *
964  * Initialization value: none.
965  * Access mode: S-R (state - read)
966  */
967 #define IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_TIMESTAMPCURRVAL 0x4009005c
968 #define SIZE_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_TIMESTAMPCURRVAL 0x4
969 #define MSK_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_TIMESTAMPCURRVAL 0xffffffff
970 
971 /*
972  *
973  * Field: ftdf_on_off_regmap_TimeStampCurrVal
974  *
975  * Value of captured TS gen
976  */
977 #define IND_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_TIMESTAMPCURRVAL IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_TIMESTAMPCURRVAL
978 #define MSK_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_TIMESTAMPCURRVAL 0xffffffff
979 #define OFF_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_TIMESTAMPCURRVAL 0
980 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_TIMESTAMPCURRVAL 32
981 
982 /*
983  *
984  * REGISTER: ftdf_on_off_regmap_TimeStampCurrPhaseVal
985  *
986  * Initialization value: none.
987  * Access mode: S-R (state - read)
988  */
989 #define IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_TIMESTAMPCURRPHASEVAL 0x40090074
990 #define SIZE_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_TIMESTAMPCURRPHASEVAL 0x4
991 #define MSK_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_TIMESTAMPCURRPHASEVAL 0xff
992 
993 /*
994  *
995  * Field: ftdf_on_off_regmap_TimeStampCurrPhaseVal
996  *
997  * Value of captured TS gen phase within a symbol
998  */
999 #define IND_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_TIMESTAMPCURRPHASEVAL IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_TIMESTAMPCURRPHASEVAL
1000 #define MSK_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_TIMESTAMPCURRPHASEVAL 0xff
1001 #define OFF_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_TIMESTAMPCURRPHASEVAL 0
1002 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_TIMESTAMPCURRPHASEVAL 8
1003 
1004 /*
1005  *
1006  * REGISTER: ftdf_on_off_regmap_macTSTxAckDelayVal
1007  *
1008  * Initialization value: none.
1009  * Access mode: S-R (state - read)
1010  */
1011 #define IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_MACTSTXACKDELAYVAL 0x40090078
1012 #define SIZE_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_MACTSTXACKDELAYVAL 0x4
1013 #define MSK_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_MACTSTXACKDELAYVAL 0xffff
1014 
1015 /*
1016  *
1017  * Field: ftdf_on_off_regmap_macTSTxAckDelayVal
1018  *
1019  * The time in us left until the ack frame is sent by the lmac
1020  */
1021 #define IND_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_MACTSTXACKDELAYVAL IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_MACTSTXACKDELAYVAL
1022 #define MSK_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_MACTSTXACKDELAYVAL 0xffff
1023 #define OFF_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_MACTSTXACKDELAYVAL 0
1024 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_MACTSTXACKDELAYVAL 16
1025 
1026 /*
1027  *
1028  * REGISTER: ftdf_on_off_regmap_lmac_control_4
1029  *
1030  * Initialization value: 0x0 Initialization mask: 0xffffffff
1031  * Access mode: C-RW (control - read/write)
1032  */
1033 #define IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMAC_CONTROL_4 0x40090060
1034 #define SIZE_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMAC_CONTROL_4 0x4
1035 #define MSK_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMAC_CONTROL_4 0xffffffff
1036 
1037 /*
1038  *
1039  * Field: ftdf_on_off_regmap_phySleepWait
1040  *
1041  * Time between negate and assert PHY_EN
1042  * When the signal phy_en is deasserted, it will not be asserted within the time phySleepWait.
1043  * This time is indicated by the control register phySleepWait (resolution: ~s).
1044  */
1045 #define IND_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_PHYSLEEPWAIT IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMAC_CONTROL_4
1046 #define MSK_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_PHYSLEEPWAIT 0xff
1047 #define OFF_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_PHYSLEEPWAIT 0
1048 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_PHYSLEEPWAIT 8
1049 /*
1050  *
1051  * Field: ftdf_on_off_regmap_RxPipePropDelay
1052  *
1053  * The control register RxPipePropDelay indicates the propagation delay in ~s of the Rx pipeline between the last symbol being captured at the DPHY interface and the "data valid" indication to the LMAC controller.
1054  */
1055 #define IND_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_RXPIPEPROPDELAY IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMAC_CONTROL_4
1056 #define MSK_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_RXPIPEPROPDELAY 0xff00
1057 #define OFF_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_RXPIPEPROPDELAY 8
1058 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_RXPIPEPROPDELAY 8
1059 /*
1060  *
1061  * Field: ftdf_on_off_regmap_phyAckAttr
1062  *
1063  * During transmission of an ACK frame, phyAckAttr is used as phyAttr on the DPHY interface.
1064  */
1065 #define IND_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_PHYACKATTR IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMAC_CONTROL_4
1066 #define MSK_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_PHYACKATTR 0xffff0000
1067 #define OFF_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_PHYACKATTR 16
1068 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_PHYACKATTR 16
1069 
1070 /*
1071  *
1072  * REGISTER: ftdf_on_off_regmap_lmac_control_5
1073  *
1074  * Initialization value: 0x8c0 Initialization mask: 0xffff0fff
1075  * Access mode: C-RW (control - read/write)
1076  */
1077 #define IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMAC_CONTROL_5 0x40090064
1078 #define SIZE_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMAC_CONTROL_5 0x4
1079 #define MSK_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMAC_CONTROL_5 0xffff0fff
1080 
1081 /*
1082  *
1083  * Field: ftdf_on_off_regmap_Ack_Response_Delay
1084  *
1085  * In order to have some flexibility the control register Ack_Response_Delay indicates the Acknowledge response time in ~s.
1086  * The default value shall is 192 ~s (12 symbols).
1087  */
1088 #define IND_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_ACK_RESPONSE_DELAY IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMAC_CONTROL_5
1089 #define MSK_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_ACK_RESPONSE_DELAY 0xff
1090 #define OFF_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_ACK_RESPONSE_DELAY 0
1091 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_ACK_RESPONSE_DELAY 8
1092 /*
1093  *
1094  * Field: ftdf_on_off_regmap_CcaStatWait
1095  *
1096  * The output CCASTAT is valid after 8 symbols + phyRxStartup.
1097  * The 8 symbols are programmable by control registerCcaStatWait[4] in symbol timesl.
1098  * Default value is 8d.
1099  */
1100 #define IND_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_CCASTATWAIT IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMAC_CONTROL_5
1101 #define MSK_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_CCASTATWAIT 0xf00
1102 #define OFF_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_CCASTATWAIT 8
1103 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_CCASTATWAIT 4
1104 /*
1105  *
1106  * Field: ftdf_on_off_regmap_phyCsmaCaAttr
1107  *
1108  * The control register phyCsmaCaAttr is used to source PHYATT on the DPHY interface.
1109  */
1110 #define IND_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_PHYCSMACAATTR IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMAC_CONTROL_5
1111 #define MSK_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_PHYCSMACAATTR 0xffff0000
1112 #define OFF_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_PHYCSMACAATTR 16
1113 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_PHYCSMACAATTR 16
1114 
1115 /*
1116  *
1117  * REGISTER: ftdf_on_off_regmap_lmac_control_6
1118  *
1119  * Initialization value: 0xc0c28 Initialization mask: 0xffffff
1120  * Access mode: C-RW (control - read/write)
1121  */
1122 #define IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMAC_CONTROL_6 0x40090068
1123 #define SIZE_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMAC_CONTROL_6 0x4
1124 #define MSK_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMAC_CONTROL_6 0xffffff
1125 
1126 /*
1127  *
1128  * Field: ftdf_on_off_regmap_LifsPeriod
1129  *
1130  * The LIFS period is programmable by LifsPeriod (in symbols).
1131  * The default is 40 symbols (640 ~s),
1132  */
1133 #define IND_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LIFSPERIOD IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMAC_CONTROL_6
1134 #define MSK_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LIFSPERIOD 0xff
1135 #define OFF_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LIFSPERIOD 0
1136 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LIFSPERIOD 8
1137 /*
1138  *
1139  * Field: ftdf_on_off_regmap_SifsPeriod
1140  *
1141  * The SIFS period is programmable by SifsPeriod (in symbols).
1142  * The default is 12 symbols (192 ~s).
1143  */
1144 #define IND_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_SIFSPERIOD IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMAC_CONTROL_6
1145 #define MSK_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_SIFSPERIOD 0xff00
1146 #define OFF_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_SIFSPERIOD 8
1147 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_SIFSPERIOD 8
1148 /*
1149  *
1150  * Field: ftdf_on_off_regmap_WUifsPeriod
1151  *
1152  * The WakeUp IFS period is programmable by WUifsPeriod (in symbols).
1153  * The default is 12 symbols (192 ~s).
1154  */
1155 #define IND_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_WUIFSPERIOD IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMAC_CONTROL_6
1156 #define MSK_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_WUIFSPERIOD 0xff0000
1157 #define OFF_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_WUIFSPERIOD 16
1158 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_WUIFSPERIOD 8
1159 
1160 /*
1161  *
1162  * REGISTER: ftdf_on_off_regmap_lmac_control_11
1163  *
1164  * Initialization value: 0x0 Initialization mask: 0x1ffff
1165  * Access mode: C-RW (control - read/write)
1166  */
1167 #define IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMAC_CONTROL_11 0x4009006c
1168 #define SIZE_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMAC_CONTROL_11 0x4
1169 #define MSK_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMAC_CONTROL_11 0x1ffff
1170 
1171 /*
1172  *
1173  * Field: ftdf_on_off_regmap_macRxTotalCycleTime
1174  *
1175  * In order to make it easier to calculate if it is efficient to disable and enable the PHY Rx until the RZ time is reached, a control register indicates the time needed to disable and enable the PHY Rx: macRxTotalCycleTime (resolution in 10 sym)
1176  */
1177 #define IND_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_MACRXTOTALCYCLETIME IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMAC_CONTROL_11
1178 #define MSK_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_MACRXTOTALCYCLETIME 0xffff
1179 #define OFF_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_MACRXTOTALCYCLETIME 0
1180 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_MACRXTOTALCYCLETIME 16
1181 /*
1182  *
1183  * Bit: ftdf_on_off_regmap_macDisCaRxOfftoRZ
1184  *
1185  * This switching off and on of the PHY Rx can be disabled whith the control register macDisCaRxOfftoRZ.
1186  * 0 : Disabled
1187  * 1 : Enabled
1188  */
1189 #define IND_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_MACDISCARXOFFTORZ IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMAC_CONTROL_11
1190 #define MSK_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_MACDISCARXOFFTORZ 0x10000
1191 #define OFF_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_MACDISCARXOFFTORZ 16
1192 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_MACDISCARXOFFTORZ 1
1193 
1194 /*
1195  *
1196  * REGISTER: ftdf_on_off_regmap_lmac_control_delta
1197  *
1198  * Initialization value: 0x0 Initialization mask: 0x7e
1199  * Access mode: D-RCW (delta read/clear on write 1)
1200  */
1201 #define IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMAC_CONTROL_DELTA 0x40090070
1202 #define SIZE_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMAC_CONTROL_DELTA 0x4
1203 #define MSK_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMAC_CONTROL_DELTA 0x7e
1204 
1205 /*
1206  *
1207  * Bit: ftdf_on_off_regmap_LmacReady4sleep_d
1208  *
1209  * Delta bit for register "LmacReady4sleep"
1210  */
1211 #define IND_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMACREADY4SLEEP_D IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMAC_CONTROL_DELTA
1212 #define MSK_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMACREADY4SLEEP_D 0x2
1213 #define OFF_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMACREADY4SLEEP_D 1
1214 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMACREADY4SLEEP_D 1
1215 /*
1216  *
1217  * Bit: ftdf_on_off_regmap_SyncTimeStamp_e
1218  *
1219  * The SyncTimeStamp_e event is set when the TimeStampgenerator is loaded with SyncTimeStampVal.
1220  * This occurs at the rising edge of lp_clk when SyncTimeStampEna is set and the value of the Event generator is equal to the value SyncTimestampThr.
1221  */
1222 #define IND_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_SYNCTIMESTAMP_E IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMAC_CONTROL_DELTA
1223 #define MSK_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_SYNCTIMESTAMP_E 0x4
1224 #define OFF_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_SYNCTIMESTAMP_E 2
1225 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_SYNCTIMESTAMP_E 1
1226 /*
1227  *
1228  * Bit: ftdf_on_off_regmap_SymbolTimeThr_e
1229  *
1230  * Event that symboltime counter matched SymbolTimeThr
1231  */
1232 #define IND_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_SYMBOLTIMETHR_E IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMAC_CONTROL_DELTA
1233 #define MSK_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_SYMBOLTIMETHR_E 0x8
1234 #define OFF_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_SYMBOLTIMETHR_E 3
1235 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_SYMBOLTIMETHR_E 1
1236 /*
1237  *
1238  * Bit: ftdf_on_off_regmap_SymbolTime2Thr_e
1239  *
1240  * Event that symboltime counter matched SymbolTime2Thr
1241  */
1242 #define IND_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_SYMBOLTIME2THR_E IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMAC_CONTROL_DELTA
1243 #define MSK_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_SYMBOLTIME2THR_E 0x10
1244 #define OFF_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_SYMBOLTIME2THR_E 4
1245 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_SYMBOLTIME2THR_E 1
1246 /*
1247  *
1248  * Bit: ftdf_on_off_regmap_getGeneratorVal_e
1249  *
1250  * Event which indicates that WakeupTimerEnableStatus has changed
1251  */
1252 #define IND_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_GETGENERATORVAL_E IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMAC_CONTROL_DELTA
1253 #define MSK_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_GETGENERATORVAL_E 0x20
1254 #define OFF_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_GETGENERATORVAL_E 5
1255 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_GETGENERATORVAL_E 1
1256 /*
1257  *
1258  * Bit: ftdf_on_off_regmap_WakeupTimerEnableStatus_d
1259  *
1260  * Delta which indicates the getGeneratorVal request is completed
1261  */
1262 #define IND_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_WAKEUPTIMERENABLESTATUS_D IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMAC_CONTROL_DELTA
1263 #define MSK_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_WAKEUPTIMERENABLESTATUS_D 0x40
1264 #define OFF_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_WAKEUPTIMERENABLESTATUS_D 6
1265 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_WAKEUPTIMERENABLESTATUS_D 1
1266 
1267 /*
1268  *
1269  * REGISTER: ftdf_on_off_regmap_lmac_control_mask
1270  *
1271  * Initialization value: 0x0 Initialization mask: 0x7e
1272  * Access mode: DM-RW (delta mask)
1273  */
1274 #define IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMAC_CONTROL_MASK 0x40090080
1275 #define SIZE_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMAC_CONTROL_MASK 0x4
1276 #define MSK_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMAC_CONTROL_MASK 0x7e
1277 
1278 /*
1279  *
1280  * Bit: ftdf_on_off_regmap_LmacReady4sleep_m
1281  *
1282  * Mask bit for delta bit "LmacReady4sleep_d"
1283  */
1284 #define IND_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMACREADY4SLEEP_M IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMAC_CONTROL_MASK
1285 #define MSK_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMACREADY4SLEEP_M 0x2
1286 #define OFF_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMACREADY4SLEEP_M 1
1287 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMACREADY4SLEEP_M 1
1288 /*
1289  *
1290  * Bit: ftdf_on_off_regmap_SyncTimeStamp_m
1291  *
1292  * Mask bit for event register SyncTimeStamp_e.
1293  */
1294 #define IND_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_SYNCTIMESTAMP_M IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMAC_CONTROL_MASK
1295 #define MSK_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_SYNCTIMESTAMP_M 0x4
1296 #define OFF_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_SYNCTIMESTAMP_M 2
1297 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_SYNCTIMESTAMP_M 1
1298 /*
1299  *
1300  * Bit: ftdf_on_off_regmap_SymbolTimeThr_m
1301  *
1302  * Mask for SymbolTimeThr_e
1303  */
1304 #define IND_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_SYMBOLTIMETHR_M IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMAC_CONTROL_MASK
1305 #define MSK_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_SYMBOLTIMETHR_M 0x8
1306 #define OFF_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_SYMBOLTIMETHR_M 3
1307 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_SYMBOLTIMETHR_M 1
1308 /*
1309  *
1310  * Bit: ftdf_on_off_regmap_SymbolTime2Thr_m
1311  *
1312  * Mask for SymbolTime2Thr_e
1313  */
1314 #define IND_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_SYMBOLTIME2THR_M IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMAC_CONTROL_MASK
1315 #define MSK_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_SYMBOLTIME2THR_M 0x10
1316 #define OFF_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_SYMBOLTIME2THR_M 4
1317 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_SYMBOLTIME2THR_M 1
1318 /*
1319  *
1320  * Bit: ftdf_on_off_regmap_getGeneratorVal_m
1321  *
1322  * Mask for getGeneratorVal_e
1323  */
1324 #define IND_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_GETGENERATORVAL_M IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMAC_CONTROL_MASK
1325 #define MSK_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_GETGENERATORVAL_M 0x20
1326 #define OFF_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_GETGENERATORVAL_M 5
1327 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_GETGENERATORVAL_M 1
1328 /*
1329  *
1330  * Bit: ftdf_on_off_regmap_WakeupTimerEnableStatus_m
1331  *
1332  * Mask for WakeupTimerEnableStatus_d
1333  */
1334 #define IND_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_WAKEUPTIMERENABLESTATUS_M IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMAC_CONTROL_MASK
1335 #define MSK_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_WAKEUPTIMERENABLESTATUS_M 0x40
1336 #define OFF_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_WAKEUPTIMERENABLESTATUS_M 6
1337 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_WAKEUPTIMERENABLESTATUS_M 1
1338 
1339 /*
1340  *
1341  * REGISTER: ftdf_on_off_regmap_lmac_event
1342  *
1343  * Initialization value: 0x0 Initialization mask: 0x7
1344  * Access mode: E-RCW (event read/clear on write 1)
1345  */
1346 #define IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMAC_EVENT 0x40090090
1347 #define SIZE_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMAC_EVENT 0x4
1348 #define MSK_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMAC_EVENT 0x7
1349 
1350 /*
1351  *
1352  * Bit: ftdf_on_off_regmap_EdScanReady_e
1353  *
1354  * The event EdScanReady_e is set to notify that the ED scan is ready.
1355  */
1356 #define IND_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_EDSCANREADY_E IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMAC_EVENT
1357 #define MSK_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_EDSCANREADY_E 0x1
1358 #define OFF_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_EDSCANREADY_E 0
1359 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_EDSCANREADY_E 1
1360 /*
1361  *
1362  * Bit: ftdf_on_off_regmap_CCAstat_e
1363  *
1364  * If set, the single CCA is ready
1365  */
1366 #define IND_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_CCASTAT_E IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMAC_EVENT
1367 #define MSK_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_CCASTAT_E 0x2
1368 #define OFF_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_CCASTAT_E 1
1369 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_CCASTAT_E 1
1370 /*
1371  *
1372  * Bit: ftdf_on_off_regmap_RxTimerExpired_e
1373  *
1374  * Set if one of the timers enabling the RX-ON mode expires without having received any valid frame
1375  */
1376 #define IND_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_RXTIMEREXPIRED_E IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMAC_EVENT
1377 #define MSK_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_RXTIMEREXPIRED_E 0x4
1378 #define OFF_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_RXTIMEREXPIRED_E 2
1379 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_RXTIMEREXPIRED_E 1
1380 
1381 /*
1382  *
1383  * REGISTER: ftdf_on_off_regmap_lmac_mask
1384  *
1385  * Initialization value: 0x0 Initialization mask: 0x7
1386  * Access mode: EM-RW (event mask)
1387  */
1388 #define IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMAC_MASK 0x40090094
1389 #define SIZE_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMAC_MASK 0x4
1390 #define MSK_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMAC_MASK 0x7
1391 
1392 /*
1393  *
1394  * Bit: ftdf_on_off_regmap_EdScanReady_m
1395  *
1396  * Mask bit for event "EdScanReady_e"
1397  */
1398 #define IND_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_EDSCANREADY_M IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMAC_MASK
1399 #define MSK_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_EDSCANREADY_M 0x1
1400 #define OFF_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_EDSCANREADY_M 0
1401 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_EDSCANREADY_M 1
1402 /*
1403  *
1404  * Bit: ftdf_on_off_regmap_CCAstat_m
1405  *
1406  * Mask bit for event "CCAstat_e"
1407  */
1408 #define IND_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_CCASTAT_M IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMAC_MASK
1409 #define MSK_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_CCASTAT_M 0x2
1410 #define OFF_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_CCASTAT_M 1
1411 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_CCASTAT_M 1
1412 /*
1413  *
1414  * Bit: ftdf_on_off_regmap_RxTimerExpired_m
1415  *
1416  * Mask bit for event "RxTimerExpired_e"
1417  */
1418 #define IND_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_RXTIMEREXPIRED_M IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMAC_MASK
1419 #define MSK_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_RXTIMEREXPIRED_M 0x4
1420 #define OFF_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_RXTIMEREXPIRED_M 2
1421 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_RXTIMEREXPIRED_M 1
1422 
1423 /*
1424  *
1425  * REGISTER: ftdf_on_off_regmap_lmac_manual_1
1426  *
1427  * Initialization value: 0x0 Initialization mask: 0xffff0fff
1428  * Access mode: C-RW (control - read/write)
1429  */
1430 #define IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMAC_MANUAL_1 0x400900a0
1431 #define SIZE_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMAC_MANUAL_1 0x4
1432 #define MSK_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMAC_MANUAL_1 0xffff0fff
1433 
1434 /*
1435  *
1436  * Bit: ftdf_on_off_regmap_lmac_manual_mode
1437  *
1438  * If the control register lmac_manual_mode is set, the LMAC controller control
1439  * signals should be controlled by the lmac_manual_control registers
1440  */
1441 #define IND_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMAC_MANUAL_MODE IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMAC_MANUAL_1
1442 #define MSK_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMAC_MANUAL_MODE 0x1
1443 #define OFF_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMAC_MANUAL_MODE 0
1444 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMAC_MANUAL_MODE 1
1445 /*
1446  *
1447  * Bit: ftdf_on_off_regmap_lmac_manual_phy_en
1448  *
1449  * lmac_manual_phy_en controls the PHY_EN interface signal when lmac_manual_mode is set
1450  */
1451 #define IND_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMAC_MANUAL_PHY_EN IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMAC_MANUAL_1
1452 #define MSK_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMAC_MANUAL_PHY_EN 0x2
1453 #define OFF_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMAC_MANUAL_PHY_EN 1
1454 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMAC_MANUAL_PHY_EN 1
1455 /*
1456  *
1457  * Bit: ftdf_on_off_regmap_lmac_manual_tx_en
1458  *
1459  * lmac_manual_tx_en controls the TX_EN interface signal when lmac_manual_mode is set
1460  */
1461 #define IND_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMAC_MANUAL_TX_EN IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMAC_MANUAL_1
1462 #define MSK_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMAC_MANUAL_TX_EN 0x4
1463 #define OFF_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMAC_MANUAL_TX_EN 2
1464 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMAC_MANUAL_TX_EN 1
1465 /*
1466  *
1467  * Bit: ftdf_on_off_regmap_lmac_manual_rx_en
1468  *
1469  * lmac_manual_rx_en controls the RX_EN interface signal when lmac_manual_mode is set
1470  */
1471 #define IND_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMAC_MANUAL_RX_EN IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMAC_MANUAL_1
1472 #define MSK_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMAC_MANUAL_RX_EN 0x8
1473 #define OFF_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMAC_MANUAL_RX_EN 3
1474 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMAC_MANUAL_RX_EN 1
1475 /*
1476  *
1477  * Bit: ftdf_on_off_regmap_lmac_manual_rx_pipe_en
1478  *
1479  * lmac_manual_rx_pipe_en controls the rx_enable signal towards the rx pipeline when lmac_manual_mode is set
1480  */
1481 #define IND_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMAC_MANUAL_RX_PIPE_EN IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMAC_MANUAL_1
1482 #define MSK_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMAC_MANUAL_RX_PIPE_EN 0x10
1483 #define OFF_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMAC_MANUAL_RX_PIPE_EN 4
1484 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMAC_MANUAL_RX_PIPE_EN 1
1485 /*
1486  *
1487  * Bit: ftdf_on_off_regmap_lmac_manual_ed_request
1488  *
1489  * lmac_manual_ed_request controls the ED_REQUEST interface signal when lmac_manual_mode is set
1490  */
1491 #define IND_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMAC_MANUAL_ED_REQUEST IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMAC_MANUAL_1
1492 #define MSK_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMAC_MANUAL_ED_REQUEST 0x20
1493 #define OFF_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMAC_MANUAL_ED_REQUEST 5
1494 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMAC_MANUAL_ED_REQUEST 1
1495 /*
1496  *
1497  * Field: ftdf_on_off_regmap_lmac_manual_tx_frm_nr
1498  *
1499  * lmac_manual_tx_frm_nr controls the entry in the tx buffer to be transmitted.
1500  */
1501 #define IND_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMAC_MANUAL_TX_FRM_NR IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMAC_MANUAL_1
1502 #define MSK_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMAC_MANUAL_TX_FRM_NR 0xc0
1503 #define OFF_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMAC_MANUAL_TX_FRM_NR 6
1504 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMAC_MANUAL_TX_FRM_NR 2
1505 /*
1506  *
1507  * Field: ftdf_on_off_regmap_lmac_manual_pti
1508  *
1509  * lmac_manual_pti controls the PTI interface signal when lmac_manual_mode is set
1510  */
1511 #define IND_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMAC_MANUAL_PTI IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMAC_MANUAL_1
1512 #define MSK_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMAC_MANUAL_PTI 0xf00
1513 #define OFF_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMAC_MANUAL_PTI 8
1514 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMAC_MANUAL_PTI 4
1515 /*
1516  *
1517  * Field: ftdf_on_off_regmap_lmac_manual_phy_attr
1518  *
1519  * lmac_manual_phy_attr controls the PHY_ATTR interface signal when lmac_manual_mode is set
1520  */
1521 #define IND_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMAC_MANUAL_PHY_ATTR IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMAC_MANUAL_1
1522 #define MSK_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMAC_MANUAL_PHY_ATTR 0xffff0000
1523 #define OFF_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMAC_MANUAL_PHY_ATTR 16
1524 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMAC_MANUAL_PHY_ATTR 16
1525 
1526 /*
1527  *
1528  * REGISTER: ftdf_on_off_regmap_lmac_manual_os
1529  *
1530  * Initialization value: 0x0 Initialization mask: 0x1
1531  * Access mode: OS-W (one-shot - write)
1532  */
1533 #define IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMAC_MANUAL_OS 0x400900a4
1534 #define SIZE_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMAC_MANUAL_OS 0x4
1535 #define MSK_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMAC_MANUAL_OS 0x1
1536 
1537 /*
1538  *
1539  * Bit: ftdf_on_off_regmap_lmac_manual_tx_start
1540  *
1541  * One shot register which triggers the transmission of a frame from the tx buffer in lmac_manual_mode
1542  */
1543 #define IND_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMAC_MANUAL_TX_START IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMAC_MANUAL_OS
1544 #define MSK_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMAC_MANUAL_TX_START 0x1
1545 #define OFF_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMAC_MANUAL_TX_START 0
1546 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMAC_MANUAL_TX_START 1
1547 
1548 /*
1549  *
1550  * REGISTER: ftdf_on_off_regmap_lmac_manual_status
1551  *
1552  * Initialization value: none.
1553  * Access mode: S-R (state - read)
1554  */
1555 #define IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMAC_MANUAL_STATUS 0x400900a8
1556 #define SIZE_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMAC_MANUAL_STATUS 0x4
1557 #define MSK_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMAC_MANUAL_STATUS 0xff01
1558 
1559 /*
1560  *
1561  * Bit: ftdf_on_off_regmap_lmac_manual_cca_stat
1562  *
1563  * lmac_manual_cca_stat shows the status of the CCA_STAT
1564  */
1565 #define IND_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMAC_MANUAL_CCA_STAT IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMAC_MANUAL_STATUS
1566 #define MSK_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMAC_MANUAL_CCA_STAT 0x1
1567 #define OFF_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMAC_MANUAL_CCA_STAT 0
1568 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMAC_MANUAL_CCA_STAT 1
1569 /*
1570  *
1571  * Field: ftdf_on_off_regmap_lmac_manual_ed_stat
1572  *
1573  * lmac_manual_ed_stat shows the status of the ED_STAT interface signal.
1574  */
1575 #define IND_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMAC_MANUAL_ED_STAT IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMAC_MANUAL_STATUS
1576 #define MSK_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMAC_MANUAL_ED_STAT 0xff00
1577 #define OFF_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMAC_MANUAL_ED_STAT 8
1578 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMAC_MANUAL_ED_STAT 8
1579 
1580 /*
1581  *
1582  * REGISTER: ftdf_on_off_regmap_lmac_control_7
1583  *
1584  * Initialization value: 0x420000 Initialization mask: 0xffffffff
1585  * Access mode: C-RW (control - read/write)
1586  */
1587 #define IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMAC_CONTROL_7 0x40090100
1588 #define SIZE_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMAC_CONTROL_7 0x4
1589 #define MSK_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMAC_CONTROL_7 0xffffffff
1590 
1591 /*
1592  *
1593  * Field: ftdf_on_off_regmap_macWUPeriod
1594  *
1595  * Wake-up duration in symbols.
1596  */
1597 #define IND_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_MACWUPERIOD IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMAC_CONTROL_7
1598 #define MSK_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_MACWUPERIOD 0xffff
1599 #define OFF_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_MACWUPERIOD 0
1600 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_MACWUPERIOD 16
1601 /*
1602  *
1603  * Field: ftdf_on_off_regmap_macCSLsamplePeriod
1604  *
1605  * When performing a idle listening, the receiver is enabled for at least macCSLsamplePeriod (in symbols).
1606  */
1607 #define IND_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_MACCSLSAMPLEPERIOD IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMAC_CONTROL_7
1608 #define MSK_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_MACCSLSAMPLEPERIOD 0xffff0000
1609 #define OFF_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_MACCSLSAMPLEPERIOD 16
1610 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_MACCSLSAMPLEPERIOD 16
1611 
1612 /*
1613  *
1614  * REGISTER: ftdf_on_off_regmap_lmac_control_8
1615  *
1616  * Initialization value: 0x0 Initialization mask: 0xffffffff
1617  * Access mode: C-RW (control - read/write)
1618  */
1619 #define IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMAC_CONTROL_8 0x40090104
1620 #define SIZE_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMAC_CONTROL_8 0x4
1621 #define MSK_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMAC_CONTROL_8 0xffffffff
1622 
1623 /*
1624  *
1625  * Field: ftdf_on_off_regmap_macCSLstartSampleTime
1626  *
1627  * The control register macCSLstartSampleTime indicates the TimeStamp generator time (in symbols) when to start listening (called "idle listening").
1628  */
1629 #define IND_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_MACCSLSTARTSAMPLETIME IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMAC_CONTROL_8
1630 #define MSK_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_MACCSLSTARTSAMPLETIME 0xffffffff
1631 #define OFF_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_MACCSLSTARTSAMPLETIME 0
1632 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_MACCSLSTARTSAMPLETIME 32
1633 
1634 /*
1635  *
1636  * REGISTER: ftdf_on_off_regmap_lmac_control_9
1637  *
1638  * Initialization value: 0x42 Initialization mask: 0xffffffff
1639  * Access mode: C-RW (control - read/write)
1640  */
1641 #define IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMAC_CONTROL_9 0x40090108
1642 #define SIZE_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMAC_CONTROL_9 0x4
1643 #define MSK_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMAC_CONTROL_9 0xffffffff
1644 
1645 /*
1646  *
1647  * Field: ftdf_on_off_regmap_macCSLdataPeriod
1648  *
1649  * After the wake-up sequence a frame is expected, the receiver will be enabled for at least a period of macCSLdataPeriod (in symbols).
1650  */
1651 #define IND_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_MACCSLDATAPERIOD IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMAC_CONTROL_9
1652 #define MSK_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_MACCSLDATAPERIOD 0xffff
1653 #define OFF_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_MACCSLDATAPERIOD 0
1654 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_MACCSLDATAPERIOD 16
1655 /*
1656  *
1657  * Field: ftdf_on_off_regmap_macCSLFramePendingWaitT
1658  *
1659  * If a non Wake-up frame with Frame Pending bit = '1' is received, the receiver is enabled for at least an extra period of macCSLFramePendingWaitT (in symbols) after the end of the received frame.
1660  * The time the Enhanced ACK transmission lasts (if applicable) is included in this time.
1661  */
1662 #define IND_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_MACCSLFRAMEPENDINGWAITT IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMAC_CONTROL_9
1663 #define MSK_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_MACCSLFRAMEPENDINGWAITT 0xffff0000
1664 #define OFF_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_MACCSLFRAMEPENDINGWAITT 16
1665 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_MACCSLFRAMEPENDINGWAITT 16
1666 
1667 /*
1668  *
1669  * REGISTER: ftdf_on_off_regmap_lmac_control_10
1670  *
1671  * Initialization value: 0x20000000 Initialization mask: 0xf00f00ff
1672  * Access mode: C-RW (control - read/write)
1673  */
1674 #define IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMAC_CONTROL_10 0x4009010c
1675 #define SIZE_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMAC_CONTROL_10 0x4
1676 #define MSK_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMAC_CONTROL_10 0xf00f00ff
1677 
1678 /*
1679  *
1680  * Field: ftdf_on_off_regmap_macRZzeroVal
1681  *
1682  * If the current RZtime is less or Equal to macRZzeroVal an RZtime with value zero is inserted in the wakeup frame
1683  */
1684 #define IND_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_MACRZZEROVAL IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMAC_CONTROL_10
1685 #define MSK_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_MACRZZEROVAL 0xf0000000
1686 #define OFF_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_MACRZZEROVAL 28
1687 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_MACRZZEROVAL 4
1688 /*
1689  *
1690  * Field: ftdf_on_off_regmap_macCSLmarginRZ
1691  *
1692  * The UMAC can set the margin for the expected frame by control register macCSLmarginRZ (in 10 sym).
1693  * So the LMAC will make sure the receiver is ready to receive data this amount of time earlier than to be expected by the received RZ time
1694  */
1695 #define IND_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_MACCSLMARGINRZ IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMAC_CONTROL_10
1696 #define MSK_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_MACCSLMARGINRZ 0xf0000
1697 #define OFF_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_MACCSLMARGINRZ 16
1698 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_MACCSLMARGINRZ 4
1699 /*
1700  *
1701  * Field: ftdf_on_off_regmap_macWURZCorrection
1702  *
1703  * This register shall be used if the Wake-up frame to be transmitted is larger than 15 octets.
1704  * It shall indicate the amount of extra data in a Wake-up frame after the RZ position in the frame (in 10 sym).
1705  */
1706 #define IND_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_MACWURZCORRECTION IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMAC_CONTROL_10
1707 #define MSK_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_MACWURZCORRECTION 0xff
1708 #define OFF_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_MACWURZCORRECTION 0
1709 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_MACWURZCORRECTION 8
1710 
1711 /*
1712  *
1713  * REGISTER: ftdf_on_off_regmap_security_0
1714  *
1715  * Initialization value: 0x0 Initialization mask: 0xff7f0f02
1716  * Access mode: C-RW (control - read/write)
1717  */
1718 #define IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_SECURITY_0 0x40090110
1719 #define SIZE_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_SECURITY_0 0x4
1720 #define MSK_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_SECURITY_0 0xff7f0f02
1721 
1722 /*
1723  *
1724  * Bit: ftdf_on_off_regmap_secTxRxn
1725  *
1726  * See register "secEntry"
1727  */
1728 #define IND_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_SECTXRXN IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_SECURITY_0
1729 #define MSK_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_SECTXRXN 0x2
1730 #define OFF_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_SECTXRXN 1
1731 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_SECTXRXN 1
1732 /*
1733  *
1734  * Field: ftdf_on_off_regmap_secEntry
1735  *
1736  * The UMAC shall indicate by control registers secEntry and secTxRxn which entry to use and if it's from the Tx or Rx buffer ('1' resp. '0').
1737  */
1738 #define IND_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_SECENTRY IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_SECURITY_0
1739 #define MSK_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_SECENTRY 0xf00
1740 #define OFF_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_SECENTRY 8
1741 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_SECENTRY 4
1742 /*
1743  *
1744  * Field: ftdf_on_off_regmap_secAlength
1745  *
1746  * The length of the a_data is indicated by control register secAlength.
1747  * The end of the a_data is the start point of the m_data. (So secAlength must also be set if security level==4)
1748  */
1749 #define IND_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_SECALENGTH IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_SECURITY_0
1750 #define MSK_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_SECALENGTH 0x7f0000
1751 #define OFF_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_SECALENGTH 16
1752 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_SECALENGTH 7
1753 /*
1754  *
1755  * Field: ftdf_on_off_regmap_secMlength
1756  *
1757  * The length of the m_data is indicated by control register secMlength.
1758  */
1759 #define IND_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_SECMLENGTH IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_SECURITY_0
1760 #define MSK_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_SECMLENGTH 0x7f000000
1761 #define OFF_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_SECMLENGTH 24
1762 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_SECMLENGTH 7
1763 /*
1764  *
1765  * Bit: ftdf_on_off_regmap_secEncDecn
1766  *
1767  * The control register secEncDecn indicates whether to encrypt ('1') or decrypt ('0') the data.
1768  */
1769 #define IND_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_SECENCDECN IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_SECURITY_0
1770 #define MSK_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_SECENCDECN 0x80000000
1771 #define OFF_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_SECENCDECN 31
1772 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_SECENCDECN 1
1773 
1774 /*
1775  *
1776  * REGISTER: ftdf_on_off_regmap_security_1
1777  *
1778  * Initialization value: 0x0 Initialization mask: 0xffff
1779  * Access mode: C-RW (control - read/write)
1780  */
1781 #define IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_SECURITY_1 0x40090114
1782 #define SIZE_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_SECURITY_1 0x4
1783 #define MSK_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_SECURITY_1 0xffff
1784 
1785 /*
1786  *
1787  * Field: ftdf_on_off_regmap_secAuthFlags
1788  *
1789  * Register secAuthFlags contains the authentication flags fields.
1790  * bit[7] is '0'
1791  * bit[6] is "A_data present"
1792  * bit[5:3]: 3-bit security level of m_data
1793  * bit[2:0]: 3-bit security level of a_data.
1794  */
1795 #define IND_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_SECAUTHFLAGS IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_SECURITY_1
1796 #define MSK_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_SECAUTHFLAGS 0xff
1797 #define OFF_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_SECAUTHFLAGS 0
1798 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_SECAUTHFLAGS 8
1799 /*
1800  *
1801  * Field: ftdf_on_off_regmap_secEncrFlags
1802  *
1803  * Register secEncrFlags contain the encryption flags field.
1804  * Bits [2:0] are the 3-bit encoding flags of a_data, the other bits msut be set to '0'.
1805  */
1806 #define IND_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_SECENCRFLAGS IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_SECURITY_1
1807 #define MSK_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_SECENCRFLAGS 0xff00
1808 #define OFF_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_SECENCRFLAGS 8
1809 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_SECENCRFLAGS 8
1810 
1811 /*
1812  *
1813  * REGISTER: ftdf_on_off_regmap_secKey_0
1814  *
1815  * Initialization value: 0x0 Initialization mask: 0xffffffff
1816  * Access mode: C-RW (control - read/write)
1817  */
1818 #define IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_SECKEY_0 0x40090118
1819 #define SIZE_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_SECKEY_0 0x4
1820 #define MSK_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_SECKEY_0 0xffffffff
1821 
1822 /*
1823  *
1824  * Field: ftdf_on_off_regmap_secKey_0
1825  *
1826  * Registers secKey[0..3] contain the key to be used.
1827  */
1828 #define IND_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_SECKEY_0 IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_SECKEY_0
1829 #define MSK_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_SECKEY_0 0xffffffff
1830 #define OFF_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_SECKEY_0 0
1831 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_SECKEY_0 32
1832 
1833 /*
1834  *
1835  * REGISTER: ftdf_on_off_regmap_secKey_1
1836  *
1837  * Initialization value: 0x0 Initialization mask: 0xffffffff
1838  * Access mode: C-RW (control - read/write)
1839  */
1840 #define IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_SECKEY_1 0x4009011c
1841 #define SIZE_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_SECKEY_1 0x4
1842 #define MSK_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_SECKEY_1 0xffffffff
1843 
1844 /*
1845  *
1846  * Field: ftdf_on_off_regmap_secKey_1
1847  *
1848  * See register "secKey_0"
1849  */
1850 #define IND_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_SECKEY_1 IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_SECKEY_1
1851 #define MSK_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_SECKEY_1 0xffffffff
1852 #define OFF_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_SECKEY_1 0
1853 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_SECKEY_1 32

1862 #define IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_SECKEY_2 0x40090120
1863 #define SIZE_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_SECKEY_2 0x4
1864 #define MSK_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_SECKEY_2 0xffffffff
1865

1868  * Field: ftdf_on_off_regmap_secKey_2

1871  */
1872 #define IND_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_SECKEY_2 IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_SECKEY_2
1873 #define MSK_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_SECKEY_2 0xffffffff
1874 #define OFF_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_SECKEY_2 0

1885 #define SIZE_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_SECKEY_3 0x4
1886 #define MSK_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_SECKEY_3 0xffffffff

1989  * REGISTER: ftdf_on_off_regmap_security_os

1995 #define SIZE_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_SECURITY_OS 0x4
1996 #define MSK_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_SECURITY_OS 0x3
1997

1999  *
2000  * Bit: ftdf_on_off_regmap_secAbort
2001  *
2002  * See register "Nonce_0"
2003  */
2004 #define IND_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_SECABORT IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_SECURITY_OS
2005 #define MSK_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_SECABORT 0x1
2006 #define OFF_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_SECABORT 0
2007 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_SECABORT 1
2008 /*
2009  *
2010  * Bit: ftdf_on_off_regmap_secStart
2011  *
2012  * One_shot register to start the encryption, decryption and authentication support task.
2013  */
2014 #define IND_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_SECSTART IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_SECURITY_OS
2015 #define MSK_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_SECSTART 0x2
2016 #define OFF_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_SECSTART 1
2017 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_SECSTART 1
2018 
2019 /*
2020  *
2021  * REGISTER: ftdf_on_off_regmap_security_status
2022  *
2023  * Initialization value: none.
2024  * Access mode: S-R (state - read)
2025  */
2026 #define IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_SECURITY_STATUS 0x40090140
2027 #define SIZE_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_SECURITY_STATUS 0x4
2028 #define MSK_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_SECURITY_STATUS 0x3
2029 
2030 /*
2031  *
2032  * Bit: ftdf_on_off_regmap_secBusy
2033  *
2034  * Register "secBusy" indicates if the encryption/decryption process is still running.
2035  */
2036 #define IND_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_SECBUSY IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_SECURITY_STATUS
2037 #define MSK_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_SECBUSY 0x1
2038 #define OFF_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_SECBUSY 0
2039 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_SECBUSY 1
2040 /*
2041  *
2042  * Bit: ftdf_on_off_regmap_secAuthFail
2043  *
2044  * In case of decryption, the status bit secAuthFail will be set when the authentication has failed.
2045  */
2046 #define IND_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_SECAUTHFAIL IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_SECURITY_STATUS
2047 #define MSK_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_SECAUTHFAIL 0x2
2048 #define OFF_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_SECAUTHFAIL 1
2049 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_SECAUTHFAIL 1
2050 
2051 /*
2052  *
2053  * REGISTER: ftdf_on_off_regmap_security_event
2054  *
2055  * Initialization value: 0x0 Initialization mask: 0x1
2056  * Access mode: E-RCW (event read/clear on write 1)
2057  */
2058 #define IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_SECURITY_EVENT 0x40090150
2059 #define SIZE_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_SECURITY_EVENT 0x4
2060 #define MSK_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_SECURITY_EVENT 0x1
2061 
2062 /*
2063  *
2064  * Bit: ftdf_on_off_regmap_secReady_e
2065  *
2066  * The Event bit secReady_e is set when the authentication process is ready (i.e. secBusy is cleared).
2067  * This Event shall contribute to the gen_irq.
2068  */
2069 #define IND_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_SECREADY_E IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_SECURITY_EVENT
2070 #define MSK_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_SECREADY_E 0x1
2071 #define OFF_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_SECREADY_E 0
2072 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_SECREADY_E 1
2073 
2074 /*
2075  *
2076  * REGISTER: ftdf_on_off_regmap_security_eventmask
2077  *
2078  * Initialization value: 0x0 Initialization mask: 0x1
2079  * Access mode: EM-RW (event mask)
2080  */
2081 #define IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_SECURITY_EVENTMASK 0x40090154
2082 #define SIZE_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_SECURITY_EVENTMASK 0x4
2083 #define MSK_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_SECURITY_EVENTMASK 0x1
2084 
2085 /*
2086  *
2087  * Bit: ftdf_on_off_regmap_secReady_m
2088  *
2089  * Mask bit for event "secReady_e".
2090  */
2091 #define IND_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_SECREADY_M IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_SECURITY_EVENTMASK
2092 #define MSK_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_SECREADY_M 0x1
2093 #define OFF_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_SECREADY_M 0
2094 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_SECREADY_M 1
2095 
2096 /*
2097  *
2098  * REGISTER: ftdf_on_off_regmap_tsch_control_0
2099  *
2100  * Initialization value: 0x89803e8 Initialization mask: 0xffffffff
2101  * Access mode: C-RW (control - read/write)
2102  */
2103 #define IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_TSCH_CONTROL_0 0x40090160
2104 #define SIZE_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_TSCH_CONTROL_0 0x4
2105 #define MSK_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_TSCH_CONTROL_0 0xffffffff
2106 
2107 /*
2108  *
2109  * Field: ftdf_on_off_regmap_macTSTxAckDelay
2110  *
2111  * End of Rx frame to start of Ack
2112  */
2113 #define IND_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_MACTSTXACKDELAY IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_TSCH_CONTROL_0
2114 #define MSK_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_MACTSTXACKDELAY 0xffff
2115 #define OFF_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_MACTSTXACKDELAY 0
2116 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_MACTSTXACKDELAY 16
2117 /*
2118  *
2119  * Field: ftdf_on_off_regmap_macTSRxWait
2120  *
2121  * The times to wait for start of frame
2122  */
2123 #define IND_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_MACTSRXWAIT IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_TSCH_CONTROL_0
2124 #define MSK_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_MACTSRXWAIT 0xffff0000
2125 #define OFF_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_MACTSRXWAIT 16
2126 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_MACTSRXWAIT 16
2127 
2128 /*
2129  *
2130  * REGISTER: ftdf_on_off_regmap_tsch_control_1
2131  *
2132  * Initialization value: 0xc0 Initialization mask: 0xffff
2133  * Access mode: C-RW (control - read/write)
2134  */
2135 #define IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_TSCH_CONTROL_1 0x40090164
2136 #define SIZE_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_TSCH_CONTROL_1 0x4
2137 #define MSK_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_TSCH_CONTROL_1 0xffff
2138 
2139 /*
2140  *
2141  * Field: ftdf_on_off_regmap_macTSRxTx
2142  *
2143  * The time between the CCA and the TX of a frame
2144  */
2145 #define IND_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_MACTSRXTX IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_TSCH_CONTROL_1
2146 #define MSK_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_MACTSRXTX 0xffff
2147 #define OFF_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_MACTSRXTX 0
2148 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_MACTSRXTX 16
