2150 /*
2151  *
2152  * REGISTER: ftdf_on_off_regmap_tsch_control_2
2153  *
2154  * Initialization value: 0x1900320 Initialization mask: 0xffffffff
2155  * Access mode: C-RW (control - read/write)
2156  */
2157 #define IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_TSCH_CONTROL_2 0x40090168
2158 #define SIZE_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_TSCH_CONTROL_2 0x4
2159 #define MSK_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_TSCH_CONTROL_2 0xffffffff
2160 
2161 /*
2162  *
2163  * Field: ftdf_on_off_regmap_macTSRxAckDelay
2164  *
2165  * End of frame to when the transmitter shall listen for Acknowledgement
2166  */
2167 #define IND_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_MACTSRXACKDELAY IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_TSCH_CONTROL_2
2168 #define MSK_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_MACTSRXACKDELAY 0xffff
2169 #define OFF_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_MACTSRXACKDELAY 0
2170 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_MACTSRXACKDELAY 16
2171 /*
2172  *
2173  * Field: ftdf_on_off_regmap_macTSAckWait
2174  *
2175  * The minimum time to wait for start of an Acknowledgement
2176  */
2177 #define IND_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_MACTSACKWAIT IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_TSCH_CONTROL_2
2178 #define MSK_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_MACTSACKWAIT 0xffff0000
2179 #define OFF_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_MACTSACKWAIT 16
2180 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_MACTSACKWAIT 16
2181 
2182 /*
2183  *
2184  * REGISTER: ftdf_on_off_regmap_phy_parameters_0
2185  *
2186  * Initialization value: 0x76543210 Initialization mask: 0x77777777
2187  * Access mode: C-RW (control - read/write)
2188  */
2189 #define IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_PHY_PARAMETERS_0 0x40090180
2190 #define SIZE_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_PHY_PARAMETERS_0 0x4
2191 #define MSK_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_PHY_PARAMETERS_0 0x77777777
2192 
2193 /*
2194  *
2195  * Field: ftdf_on_off_regmap_rxBitPos_0
2196  *
2197  * Control rxBitPos(8)(3) controls the position that a bit should have at the DPHY interface.
2198  * So the default values are rxBitPos_0 = 0, rxBitPos_1 = 1, rxBitPos_2 = 2, etc.
2199  *
2200  * Note1 that this is a conversion from rx DPHY interface to the internal data byte
2201  * So
2202  * for(n=7;n>=0;n--)
2203  * rx_data(n) = dphy_bit(tx_BitPos(n))
2204  * endfor
2205  *
2206  * Note2 that rxBitPos and txBitPos must have inverse functions.
2207  */
2208 #define IND_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_RXBITPOS_0 IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_PHY_PARAMETERS_0
2209 #define MSK_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_RXBITPOS_0 0x7
2210 #define OFF_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_RXBITPOS_0 0
2211 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_RXBITPOS_0 3
2212 /*
2213  *
2214  * Field: ftdf_on_off_regmap_rxBitPos_1
2215  *
2216  * See rxBitPos_0
2217  */
2218 #define IND_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_RXBITPOS_1 IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_PHY_PARAMETERS_0
2219 #define MSK_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_RXBITPOS_1 0x70
2220 #define OFF_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_RXBITPOS_1 4
2221 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_RXBITPOS_1 3
2222 /*
2223  *
2224  * Field: ftdf_on_off_regmap_rxBitPos_2
2225  *
2226  * See rxBitPos_0
2227  */
2228 #define IND_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_RXBITPOS_2 IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_PHY_PARAMETERS_0
2229 #define MSK_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_RXBITPOS_2 0x700
2230 #define OFF_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_RXBITPOS_2 8
2231 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_RXBITPOS_2 3
2232 /*
2233  *
2234  * Field: ftdf_on_off_regmap_rxBitPos_3
2235  *
2236  * See rxBitPos_0
2237  */
2238 #define IND_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_RXBITPOS_3 IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_PHY_PARAMETERS_0
2239 #define MSK_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_RXBITPOS_3 0x7000
2240 #define OFF_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_RXBITPOS_3 12
2241 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_RXBITPOS_3 3
2242 /*
2243  *
2244  * Field: ftdf_on_off_regmap_rxBitPos_4
2245  *
2246  * See rxBitPos_0
2247  */
2248 #define IND_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_RXBITPOS_4 IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_PHY_PARAMETERS_0
2249 #define MSK_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_RXBITPOS_4 0x70000
2250 #define OFF_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_RXBITPOS_4 16
2251 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_RXBITPOS_4 3
2252 /*
2253  *
2254  * Field: ftdf_on_off_regmap_rxBitPos_5
2255  *
2256  * See rxBitPos_0
2257  */
2258 #define IND_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_RXBITPOS_5 IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_PHY_PARAMETERS_0
2259 #define MSK_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_RXBITPOS_5 0x700000
2260 #define OFF_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_RXBITPOS_5 20
2261 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_RXBITPOS_5 3
2262 /*
2263  *
2264  * Field: ftdf_on_off_regmap_rxBitPos_6
2265  *
2266  * See rxBitPos_0
2267  */
2268 #define IND_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_RXBITPOS_6 IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_PHY_PARAMETERS_0
2269 #define MSK_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_RXBITPOS_6 0x7000000
2270 #define OFF_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_RXBITPOS_6 24
2271 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_RXBITPOS_6 3
2272 /*
2273  *
2274  * Field: ftdf_on_off_regmap_rxBitPos_7
2275  *
2276  * See rxBitPos_0
2277  */
2278 #define IND_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_RXBITPOS_7 IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_PHY_PARAMETERS_0
2279 #define MSK_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_RXBITPOS_7 0x70000000
2280 #define OFF_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_RXBITPOS_7 28
2281 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_RXBITPOS_7 3
2282 
2283 /*
2284  *
2285  * REGISTER: ftdf_on_off_regmap_phy_parameters_1
2286  *
2287  * Initialization value: 0x76543210 Initialization mask: 0x77777777
2288  * Access mode: C-RW (control - read/write)
2289  */
2290 #define IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_PHY_PARAMETERS_1 0x40090184
2291 #define SIZE_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_PHY_PARAMETERS_1 0x4
2292 #define MSK_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_PHY_PARAMETERS_1 0x77777777
2293 
2294 /*
2295  *
2296  * Field: ftdf_on_off_regmap_txBitPos_0
2297  *
2298  * Control txBitPos(8)(3) controls the position that a bit should have at the DPHY interface.
2299  * So the default values are txBitPos_0 = 0, txBitPos_1 = 1, txBitPos_2 = 2, etc.
2300  *
2301  * Note1 that this is a conversion from internal data byte to the DPHY interface.
2302  * So
2303  * for(n=7;n>=0;n--)
2304  * tx_dphy_bit(n) = tx_data(tx_BitPos(n))
2305  * endfor
2306  *
2307  * Note2 that txBitPos and rxBitPos must have inverse functions.
2308  */
2309 #define IND_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_TXBITPOS_0 IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_PHY_PARAMETERS_1
2310 #define MSK_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_TXBITPOS_0 0x7
2311 #define OFF_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_TXBITPOS_0 0
2312 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_TXBITPOS_0 3
2313 /*
2314  *
2315  * Field: ftdf_on_off_regmap_txBitPos_1
2316  *
2317  * See txBitPos_0
2318  */
2319 #define IND_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_TXBITPOS_1 IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_PHY_PARAMETERS_1
2320 #define MSK_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_TXBITPOS_1 0x70
2321 #define OFF_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_TXBITPOS_1 4
2322 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_TXBITPOS_1 3
2323 /*
2324  *
2325  * Field: ftdf_on_off_regmap_txBitPos_2
2326  *
2327  * See txBitPos_0
2328  */
2329 #define IND_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_TXBITPOS_2 IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_PHY_PARAMETERS_1
2330 #define MSK_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_TXBITPOS_2 0x700
2331 #define OFF_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_TXBITPOS_2 8
2332 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_TXBITPOS_2 3
2333 /*
2334  *
2335  * Field: ftdf_on_off_regmap_txBitPos_3
2336  *
2337  * See txBitPos_0
2338  */
2339 #define IND_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_TXBITPOS_3 IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_PHY_PARAMETERS_1
2340 #define MSK_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_TXBITPOS_3 0x7000
2341 #define OFF_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_TXBITPOS_3 12
2342 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_TXBITPOS_3 3
2343 /*
2344  *
2345  * Field: ftdf_on_off_regmap_txBitPos_4
2346  *
2347  * See txBitPos_0
2348  */
2349 #define IND_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_TXBITPOS_4 IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_PHY_PARAMETERS_1
2350 #define MSK_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_TXBITPOS_4 0x70000
2351 #define OFF_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_TXBITPOS_4 16
2352 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_TXBITPOS_4 3
2353 /*
2354  *
2355  * Field: ftdf_on_off_regmap_txBitPos_5
2356  *
2357  * See txBitPos_0
2358  */
2359 #define IND_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_TXBITPOS_5 IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_PHY_PARAMETERS_1
2360 #define MSK_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_TXBITPOS_5 0x700000
2361 #define OFF_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_TXBITPOS_5 20
2362 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_TXBITPOS_5 3
2363 /*
2364  *
2365  * Field: ftdf_on_off_regmap_txBitPos_6
2366  *
2367  * See txBitPos_0
2368  */
2369 #define IND_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_TXBITPOS_6 IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_PHY_PARAMETERS_1
2370 #define MSK_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_TXBITPOS_6 0x7000000
2371 #define OFF_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_TXBITPOS_6 24
2372 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_TXBITPOS_6 3
2373 /*
2374  *
2375  * Field: ftdf_on_off_regmap_txBitPos_7
2376  *
2377  * See txBitPos_0
2378  */
2379 #define IND_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_TXBITPOS_7 IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_PHY_PARAMETERS_1
2380 #define MSK_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_TXBITPOS_7 0x70000000
2381 #define OFF_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_TXBITPOS_7 28
2382 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_TXBITPOS_7 3
2383 
2384 /*
2385  *
2386  * REGISTER: ftdf_on_off_regmap_phy_parameters_2
2387  *
2388  * Initialization value: 0x0 Initialization mask: 0xffffffff
2389  * Access mode: C-RW (control - read/write)
2390  */
2391 #define IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_PHY_PARAMETERS_2 0x40090188
2392 #define SIZE_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_PHY_PARAMETERS_2 0x4
2393 #define MSK_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_PHY_PARAMETERS_2 0xffffffff
2394 
2395 /*
2396  *
2397  * Field: ftdf_on_off_regmap_phyTxStartup
2398  *
2399  * Phy wait time before transmission
2400  */
2401 #define IND_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_PHYTXSTARTUP IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_PHY_PARAMETERS_2
2402 #define MSK_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_PHYTXSTARTUP 0xff
2403 #define OFF_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_PHYTXSTARTUP 0
2404 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_PHYTXSTARTUP 8
2405 /*
2406  *
2407  * Field: ftdf_on_off_regmap_phyTxLatency
2408  *
2409  * Phy delay between DPHY i/f and air
2410  */
2411 #define IND_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_PHYTXLATENCY IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_PHY_PARAMETERS_2
2412 #define MSK_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_PHYTXLATENCY 0xff00
2413 #define OFF_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_PHYTXLATENCY 8
2414 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_PHYTXLATENCY 8
2415 /*
2416  *
2417  * Field: ftdf_on_off_regmap_phyTxFinish
2418  *
2419  * Phy wait time before deasserting TX_EN
2420  */
2421 #define IND_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_PHYTXFINISH IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_PHY_PARAMETERS_2
2422 #define MSK_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_PHYTXFINISH 0xff0000
2423 #define OFF_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_PHYTXFINISH 16
2424 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_PHYTXFINISH 8
2425 /*
2426  *
2427  * Field: ftdf_on_off_regmap_phyTRxWait
2428  *
2429  * Phy wait time between TX_EN/RX_EN
2430  */
2431 #define IND_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_PHYTRXWAIT IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_PHY_PARAMETERS_2
2432 #define MSK_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_PHYTRXWAIT 0xff000000
2433 #define OFF_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_PHYTRXWAIT 24
2434 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_PHYTRXWAIT 8
2435 
2436 /*
2437  *
2438  * REGISTER: ftdf_on_off_regmap_phy_parameters_3
2439  *
2440  * Initialization value: 0x0 Initialization mask: 0xffffff
2441  * Access mode: C-RW (control - read/write)
2442  */
2443 #define IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_PHY_PARAMETERS_3 0x4009018c
2444 #define SIZE_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_PHY_PARAMETERS_3 0x4
2445 #define MSK_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_PHY_PARAMETERS_3 0xffffff
2446 
2447 /*
2448  *
2449  * Field: ftdf_on_off_regmap_phyRxStartup
2450  *
2451  * Phy wait time before receiving
2452  */
2453 #define IND_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_PHYRXSTARTUP IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_PHY_PARAMETERS_3
2454 #define MSK_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_PHYRXSTARTUP 0xff
2455 #define OFF_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_PHYRXSTARTUP 0
2456 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_PHYRXSTARTUP 8
2457 /*
2458  *
2459  * Field: ftdf_on_off_regmap_phyRxLatency
2460  *
2461  * Phy delay between air and DPHY i/f
2462  */
2463 #define IND_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_PHYRXLATENCY IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_PHY_PARAMETERS_3
2464 #define MSK_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_PHYRXLATENCY 0xff00
2465 #define OFF_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_PHYRXLATENCY 8
2466 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_PHYRXLATENCY 8
2467 /*
2468  *
2469  * Field: ftdf_on_off_regmap_phyEnable
2470  *
2471  * Asserting the DPHY interface signals TX_EN or RX_EN does not take place within the time phyEnable after asserting the signal phy_en.
2472  * (resolution: ~s).
2473  */
2474 #define IND_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_PHYENABLE IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_PHY_PARAMETERS_3
2475 #define MSK_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_PHYENABLE 0xff0000
2476 #define OFF_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_PHYENABLE 16
2477 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_PHYENABLE 8
2478 
2479 /*
2480  *
2481  * REGISTER: ftdf_on_off_regmap_rx_control_0
2482  *
2483  * Initialization value: 0x0 Initialization mask: 0xfffffff
2484  * Access mode: C-RW (control - read/write)
2485  */
2486 #define IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_RX_CONTROL_0 0x40090200
2487 #define SIZE_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_RX_CONTROL_0 0x4
2488 #define MSK_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_RX_CONTROL_0 0xfffffff
2489 
2490 /*
2491  *
2492  * Bit: ftdf_on_off_regmap_DbgRxTransparentMode
2493  *
2494  * If set, Rx pipe is fully set in transparent mode (for debug purpose).
2495  */
2496 #define IND_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_DBGRXTRANSPARENTMODE IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_RX_CONTROL_0
2497 #define MSK_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_DBGRXTRANSPARENTMODE 0x1
2498 #define OFF_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_DBGRXTRANSPARENTMODE 0
2499 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_DBGRXTRANSPARENTMODE 1
2500 /*
2501  *
2502  * Bit: ftdf_on_off_regmap_RxBeaconOnly
2503  *
2504  * If set, only Beacons frames are accepted
2505  */
2506 #define IND_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_RXBEACONONLY IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_RX_CONTROL_0
2507 #define MSK_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_RXBEACONONLY 0x2
2508 #define OFF_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_RXBEACONONLY 1
2509 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_RXBEACONONLY 1
2510 /*
2511  *
2512  * Bit: ftdf_on_off_regmap_RxCoordRealignOnly
2513  *
2514  * If set, only Coordinator Realignment frames are accepted
2515  */
2516 #define IND_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_RXCOORDREALIGNONLY IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_RX_CONTROL_0
2517 #define MSK_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_RXCOORDREALIGNONLY 0x4
2518 #define OFF_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_RXCOORDREALIGNONLY 2
2519 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_RXCOORDREALIGNONLY 1
2520 /*
2521  *
2522  * Field: ftdf_on_off_regmap_rx_read_buf_ptr
2523  *
2524  * Indication where new data will be read
2525  * All four bits shall be used when using these pointer values (0d - 15d).
2526  * However, the Receive Packet buffer has a size of 8 entries.
2527  * So reading the Receive Packet buffer entries shall use the mod8 of the pointer values.
2528  */
2529 #define IND_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_RX_READ_BUF_PTR IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_RX_CONTROL_0
2530 #define MSK_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_RX_READ_BUF_PTR 0x78
2531 #define OFF_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_RX_READ_BUF_PTR 3
2532 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_RX_READ_BUF_PTR 4
2533 /*
2534  *
2535  * Bit: ftdf_on_off_regmap_DisRxFrmPendingca
2536  *
2537  * Whan the control register DisRxFrmPendingCa is set, the notification of the received FP bit to the LMAC Controller is disabled.
2538  */
2539 #define IND_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_DISRXFRMPENDINGCA IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_RX_CONTROL_0
2540 #define MSK_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_DISRXFRMPENDINGCA 0x80
2541 #define OFF_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_DISRXFRMPENDINGCA 7
2542 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_DISRXFRMPENDINGCA 1
2543 /*
2544  *
2545  * Bit: ftdf_on_off_regmap_DisRxAckRequestca
2546  *
2547  * When the control register DisRxAckRequestca is set all consequent actions for a received Acknowledge Request bit are disabled.
2548  */
2549 #define IND_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_DISRXACKREQUESTCA IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_RX_CONTROL_0
2550 #define MSK_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_DISRXACKREQUESTCA 0x100
2551 #define OFF_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_DISRXACKREQUESTCA 8
2552 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_DISRXACKREQUESTCA 1
2553 /*
2554  *
2555  * Bit: ftdf_on_off_regmap_macAlwaysPassCrcerror
2556  *
2557  * If set, a FCS error will not drop the frame
2558  */
2559 #define IND_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_MACALWAYSPASSCRCERROR IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_RX_CONTROL_0
2560 #define MSK_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_MACALWAYSPASSCRCERROR 0x200
2561 #define OFF_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_MACALWAYSPASSCRCERROR 9
2562 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_MACALWAYSPASSCRCERROR 1
2563 /*
2564  *
2565  * Bit: ftdf_on_off_regmap_DisDataRequestca
2566  *
2567  * When the control register DisDataRequestCa is set, the notification of the received Data Request is disabled.
2568  */
2569 #define IND_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_DISDATAREQUESTCA IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_RX_CONTROL_0
2570 #define MSK_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_DISDATAREQUESTCA 0x400
2571 #define OFF_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_DISDATAREQUESTCA 10
2572 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_DISDATAREQUESTCA 1
2573 /*
2574  *
2575  * Bit: ftdf_on_off_regmap_macAlwaysPassResFrameVersion
2576  *
2577  * If set, a packet with a reserved FrameVersion shall not be dropped
2578  */
2579 #define IND_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_MACALWAYSPASSRESFRAMEVERSION IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_RX_CONTROL_0
2580 #define MSK_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_MACALWAYSPASSRESFRAMEVERSION 0x800
2581 #define OFF_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_MACALWAYSPASSRESFRAMEVERSION 11
2582 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_MACALWAYSPASSRESFRAMEVERSION 1
2583 /*
2584  *
2585  * Bit: ftdf_on_off_regmap_macAlwaysPassWrongDPANId
2586  *
2587  * If register macAlwaysPassWrongDPANId is set, packet with a wrong Destiantion PanID will not be dropped.
2588  * However, in case of an FCS error, the packet is dropped.
2589  */
2590 #define IND_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_MACALWAYSPASSWRONGDPANID IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_RX_CONTROL_0
2591 #define MSK_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_MACALWAYSPASSWRONGDPANID 0x1000
2592 #define OFF_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_MACALWAYSPASSWRONGDPANID 12
2593 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_MACALWAYSPASSWRONGDPANID 1
2594 /*
2595  *
2596  * Bit: ftdf_on_off_regmap_macAlwaysPassWrongDAddr
2597  *
2598  * If set, a packet with a wrong DAddr is not dropped
2599  */
2600 #define IND_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_MACALWAYSPASSWRONGDADDR IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_RX_CONTROL_0
2601 #define MSK_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_MACALWAYSPASSWRONGDADDR 0x2000
2602 #define OFF_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_MACALWAYSPASSWRONGDADDR 13
2603 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_MACALWAYSPASSWRONGDADDR 1
2604 /*
2605  *
2606  * Bit: ftdf_on_off_regmap_macAlwaysPassBeaconWrongPANId
2607  *
2608  * If the control register macAlwaysPassBeaconWrongPANId is set, the frame is not dropped in case of a mismatch in PAN-ID, irrespective of the setting of RxBeaconOnly.
2609  */
2610 #define IND_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_MACALWAYSPASSBEACONWRONGPANID IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_RX_CONTROL_0
2611 #define MSK_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_MACALWAYSPASSBEACONWRONGPANID 0x4000
2612 #define OFF_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_MACALWAYSPASSBEACONWRONGPANID 14
2613 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_MACALWAYSPASSBEACONWRONGPANID 1
2614 /*
2615  *
2616  * Bit: ftdf_on_off_regmap_macAlwaysPassToPanCoordinator
2617  *
2618  * When the control register macAlwaysPassToPanCoordinator is set, the frame is not dropped due to a span_coord_error.
2619  * However, in case of an FCS error, the packet is dropped.
2620  */
2621 #define IND_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_MACALWAYSPASSTOPANCOORDINATOR IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_RX_CONTROL_0
2622 #define MSK_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_MACALWAYSPASSTOPANCOORDINATOR 0x8000
2623 #define OFF_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_MACALWAYSPASSTOPANCOORDINATOR 15
2624 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_MACALWAYSPASSTOPANCOORDINATOR 1
2625 /*
2626  *
2627  * Field: ftdf_on_off_regmap_macAlwaysPassFrmType
2628  *
2629  * The control registers macAlwaysPassFrmType[7:0], shall control if this Frame Type shall be dropped.
2630  * If a bit is set, the Frame Type corresponding with the bit position is not dropped, even in case of a CRC error.
2631  * Example: if bit 1 is set, Frame Type 1 shall not be dropped.
2632  * The error shall be reported in the Rx meta data
2633  */
2634 #define IND_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_MACALWAYSPASSFRMTYPE IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_RX_CONTROL_0
2635 #define MSK_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_MACALWAYSPASSFRMTYPE 0xff0000
2636 #define OFF_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_MACALWAYSPASSFRMTYPE 16
2637 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_MACALWAYSPASSFRMTYPE 8
2638 /*
2639  *
2640  * Bit: ftdf_on_off_regmap_macAlwaysPassWakeUp
2641  *
2642  * If the control register macAlwaysPassWakeUp is set, received Wake- up frames for this device are put into the Rx packet buffer without notifying the LMAC Controller.
2643  */
2644 #define IND_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_MACALWAYSPASSWAKEUP IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_RX_CONTROL_0
2645 #define MSK_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_MACALWAYSPASSWAKEUP 0x1000000
2646 #define OFF_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_MACALWAYSPASSWAKEUP 24
2647 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_MACALWAYSPASSWAKEUP 1
2648 /*
2649  *
2650  * Bit: ftdf_on_off_regmap_macPassWakeUp
2651  *
2652  * If set, WakeUp frames will not be reported but will be put into the Rx buffer.
2653  */
2654 #define IND_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_MACPASSWAKEUP IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_RX_CONTROL_0
2655 #define MSK_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_MACPASSWAKEUP 0x2000000
2656 #define OFF_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_MACPASSWAKEUP 25
2657 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_MACPASSWAKEUP 1
2658 /*
2659  *
2660  * Bit: ftdf_on_off_regmap_macImplicitBroadcast
2661  *
2662  * If set, Frame Version 2 frames without Daddr or DPANId shall be accepted.
2663  */
2664 #define IND_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_MACIMPLICITBROADCAST IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_RX_CONTROL_0
2665 #define MSK_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_MACIMPLICITBROADCAST 0x4000000
2666 #define OFF_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_MACIMPLICITBROADCAST 26
2667 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_MACIMPLICITBROADCAST 1
2668 /*
2669  *
2670  * Bit: ftdf_on_off_regmap_DisRxAckReceivedca
2671  *
2672  * If set, the LMAC controller shall ignore all consequent actions upon a set AR bit in the transmitted frame
2673  */
2674 #define IND_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_DISRXACKRECEIVEDCA IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_RX_CONTROL_0
2675 #define MSK_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_DISRXACKRECEIVEDCA 0x8000000
2676 #define OFF_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_DISRXACKRECEIVEDCA 27
2677 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_DISRXACKRECEIVEDCA 1
2678 
2679 /*
2680  *
2681  * REGISTER: ftdf_on_off_regmap_rx_event
2682  *
2683  * Initialization value: 0x0 Initialization mask: 0xf
2684  * Access mode: E-RCW2 (event read/clear on write 1)
2685  */
2686 #define IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_RX_EVENT 0x40090204
2687 #define SIZE_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_RX_EVENT 0x4
2688 #define MSK_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_RX_EVENT 0xf
2689 
2690 /*
2691  *
2692  * Bit: ftdf_on_off_regmap_RxSof_e
2693  *
2694  * Set when RX_SOF has been detected.
2695  */
2696 #define IND_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_RXSOF_E IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_RX_EVENT
2697 #define MSK_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_RXSOF_E 0x1
2698 #define OFF_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_RXSOF_E 0
2699 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_RXSOF_E 1
2700 /*
2701  *
2702  * Bit: ftdf_on_off_regmap_rx_overflow_e
2703  *
2704  * Indicates that the Rx packet buffer has an
2705  * overflowl
2706  */
2707 #define IND_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_RX_OVERFLOW_E IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_RX_EVENT
2708 #define MSK_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_RX_OVERFLOW_E 0x2
2709 #define OFF_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_RX_OVERFLOW_E 1
2710 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_RX_OVERFLOW_E 1
2711 /*
2712  *
2713  * Bit: ftdf_on_off_regmap_rx_buf_avail_e
2714  *
2715  * Indicates that a new packet is received
2716  */
2717 #define IND_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_RX_BUF_AVAIL_E IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_RX_EVENT
2718 #define MSK_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_RX_BUF_AVAIL_E 0x4
2719 #define OFF_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_RX_BUF_AVAIL_E 2
2720 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_RX_BUF_AVAIL_E 1
2721 /*
2722  *
2723  * Bit: ftdf_on_off_regmap_rxbyte_e
2724  *
2725  * Indicates the first byte of a new packet is received
2726  */
2727 #define IND_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_RXBYTE_E IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_RX_EVENT
2728 #define MSK_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_RXBYTE_E 0x8
2729 #define OFF_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_RXBYTE_E 3
2730 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_RXBYTE_E 1
2731 
2732 /*
2733  *
2734  * REGISTER: ftdf_on_off_regmap_rx_mask
2735  *
2736  * Initialization value: 0x0 Initialization mask: 0xf
2737  * Access mode: EM-RW (event mask)
2738  */
2739 #define IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_RX_MASK 0x40090208
2740 #define SIZE_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_RX_MASK 0x4
2741 #define MSK_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_RX_MASK 0xf
2742 
2743 /*
2744  *
2745  * Bit: ftdf_on_off_regmap_RxSof_m
2746  *
2747  * Mask bit for event "RxSof_e".
2748  */
2749 #define IND_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_RXSOF_M IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_RX_MASK
2750 #define MSK_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_RXSOF_M 0x1
2751 #define OFF_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_RXSOF_M 0
2752 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_RXSOF_M 1
2753 /*
2754  *
2755  * Bit: ftdf_on_off_regmap_rx_overflow_m
2756  *
2757  * Mask bit for event " rx_overflow_e".
2758  */
2759 #define IND_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_RX_OVERFLOW_M IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_RX_MASK
2760 #define MSK_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_RX_OVERFLOW_M 0x2
2761 #define OFF_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_RX_OVERFLOW_M 1
2762 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_RX_OVERFLOW_M 1
2763 /*
2764  *
2765  * Bit: ftdf_on_off_regmap_rx_buf_avail_m
2766  *
2767  * Mask bit for event "rx_buf_avail_e".
2768  */
2769 #define IND_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_RX_BUF_AVAIL_M IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_RX_MASK
2770 #define MSK_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_RX_BUF_AVAIL_M 0x4
2771 #define OFF_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_RX_BUF_AVAIL_M 2
2772 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_RX_BUF_AVAIL_M 1
2773 /*
2774  *
2775  * Bit: ftdf_on_off_regmap_rxbyte_m
2776  *
2777  * Mask bit for event "rxbyte_e".
2778  */
2779 #define IND_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_RXBYTE_M IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_RX_MASK
2780 #define MSK_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_RXBYTE_M 0x8
2781 #define OFF_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_RXBYTE_M 3
2782 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_RXBYTE_M 1
2783 
2784 /*
2785  *
2786  * REGISTER: ftdf_on_off_regmap_rx_status
2787  *
2788  * Initialization value: none.
2789  * Access mode: S-R (state - read)
2790  */
2791 #define IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_RX_STATUS 0x4009020c
2792 #define SIZE_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_RX_STATUS 0x4
2793 #define MSK_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_RX_STATUS 0x1f
2794 
2795 /*
2796  *
2797  * Bit: ftdf_on_off_regmap_rx_buff_is_full
2798  *
2799  * Indicates that the Rx packet buffer is full
2800  */
2801 #define IND_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_RX_BUFF_IS_FULL IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_RX_STATUS
2802 #define MSK_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_RX_BUFF_IS_FULL 0x1
2803 #define OFF_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_RX_BUFF_IS_FULL 0
2804 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_RX_BUFF_IS_FULL 1
2805 /*
2806  *
2807  * Field: ftdf_on_off_regmap_rx_write_buf_ptr
2808  *
2809  * Indication where new data will be written.
2810  * All four bits shall be used when using these pointer values (0d - 15d).
2811  * However, the Receive Packet buffer has a size of 8 entries.
2812  * So reading the Receive Packet buffer entries shall use the mod8 of the pointer values.
2813  */
2814 #define IND_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_RX_WRITE_BUF_PTR IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_RX_STATUS
2815 #define MSK_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_RX_WRITE_BUF_PTR 0x1e
2816 #define OFF_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_RX_WRITE_BUF_PTR 1
2817 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_RX_WRITE_BUF_PTR 4
2818 
2819 /*
2820  *
2821  * REGISTER: ftdf_on_off_regmap_SymbolTimeSnapshotVal
2822  *
2823  * Initialization value: none.
2824  * Access mode: S-R (state - read)
2825  */
2826 #define IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_SYMBOLTIMESNAPSHOTVAL 0x40090210
2827 #define SIZE_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_SYMBOLTIMESNAPSHOTVAL 0x4
2828 #define MSK_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_SYMBOLTIMESNAPSHOTVAL 0xffffffff
2829 
2830 /*
2831  *
2832  * Field: ftdf_on_off_regmap_SymbolTimeSnapshotVal
2833  *
2834  * The Status register SymbolTimeSnapshotVal indicates the actual value of the TimeStamp generator.
2835  */
2836 #define IND_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_SYMBOLTIMESNAPSHOTVAL IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_SYMBOLTIMESNAPSHOTVAL
2837 #define MSK_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_SYMBOLTIMESNAPSHOTVAL 0xffffffff
2838 #define OFF_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_SYMBOLTIMESNAPSHOTVAL 0
2839 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_SYMBOLTIMESNAPSHOTVAL 32
2840 
2841 /*
2842  *
2843  * REGISTER: ftdf_on_off_regmap_rx_status_delta
2844  *
2845  * Initialization value: 0x0 Initialization mask: 0x1
2846  * Access mode: D-RCW (delta read/clear on write 1)
2847  */
2848 #define IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_RX_STATUS_DELTA 0x40090220
2849 #define SIZE_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_RX_STATUS_DELTA 0x4
2850 #define MSK_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_RX_STATUS_DELTA 0x1
2851 
2852 /*
2853  *
2854  * Bit: ftdf_on_off_regmap_rx_buff_is_full_d
2855  *
2856  * Delta bit of status "rx_buff_is_full"
2857  */
2858 #define IND_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_RX_BUFF_IS_FULL_D IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_RX_STATUS_DELTA
2859 #define MSK_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_RX_BUFF_IS_FULL_D 0x1
2860 #define OFF_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_RX_BUFF_IS_FULL_D 0
2861 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_RX_BUFF_IS_FULL_D 1
2862 
2863 /*
2864  *
2865  * REGISTER: ftdf_on_off_regmap_rx_status_mask
2866  *
2867  * Initialization value: 0x0 Initialization mask: 0x1
2868  * Access mode: DM-RW (delta mask)
2869  */
2870 #define IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_RX_STATUS_MASK 0x40090224
2871 #define SIZE_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_RX_STATUS_MASK 0x4
2872 #define MSK_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_RX_STATUS_MASK 0x1
2873 
2874 /*
2875  *
2876  * Bit: ftdf_on_off_regmap_rx_buff_is_full_m
2877  *
2878  * Mask bit of status "rx_buff_is_full"
2879  */
2880 #define IND_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_RX_BUFF_IS_FULL_M IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_RX_STATUS_MASK
2881 #define MSK_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_RX_BUFF_IS_FULL_M 0x1
2882 #define OFF_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_RX_BUFF_IS_FULL_M 0
2883 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_RX_BUFF_IS_FULL_M 1
2884 
2885 /*
2886  *
2887  * REGISTER: ftdf_on_off_regmap_tx_control_0
2888  *
2889  * Initialization value: 0x4350 Initialization mask: 0x7ff1
2890  * Access mode: C-RW (control - read/write)
2891  */
2892 #define IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_TX_CONTROL_0 0x40090240
2893 #define SIZE_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_TX_CONTROL_0 0x4
2894 #define MSK_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_TX_CONTROL_0 0x7ff1
2895 
2896 /*
2897  *
2898  * Bit: ftdf_on_off_regmap_DbgTxTransparentMode
2899  *
2900  * If 1, the MPDU octets pass transparently through the MAC in the transmit direction (for debug purpose).
2901  */
2902 #define IND_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_DBGTXTRANSPARENTMODE IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_TX_CONTROL_0
2903 #define MSK_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_DBGTXTRANSPARENTMODE 0x1
2904 #define OFF_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_DBGTXTRANSPARENTMODE 0
2905 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_DBGTXTRANSPARENTMODE 1
2906 /*
2907  *
2908  * Field: ftdf_on_off_regmap_macMaxBE
2909  *
2910  * Maximum Backoff Exponent (range 3-8)
2911  */
2912 #define IND_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_MACMAXBE IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_TX_CONTROL_0
2913 #define MSK_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_MACMAXBE 0xf0
2914 #define OFF_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_MACMAXBE 4
2915 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_MACMAXBE 4
2916 /*
2917  *
2918  * Field: ftdf_on_off_regmap_macMinBE
2919  *
2920  * Minimum Backoff Exponent (range 0-macMaxBE)
2921  */
2922 #define IND_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_MACMINBE IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_TX_CONTROL_0
2923 #define MSK_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_MACMINBE 0xf00
2924 #define OFF_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_MACMINBE 8
2925 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_MACMINBE 4
2926 /*
2927  *
2928  * Field: ftdf_on_off_regmap_macMaxCSMABackoffs
2929  *
2930  * Maximum number of CSMA-CA backoffs
2931  * (range 0-5)
2932  */
2933 #define IND_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_MACMAXCSMABACKOFFS IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_TX_CONTROL_0
2934 #define MSK_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_MACMAXCSMABACKOFFS 0x7000
2935 #define OFF_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_MACMAXCSMABACKOFFS 12
2936 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_MACMAXCSMABACKOFFS 3
2937 
2938 /*
2939  *
2940  * REGISTER: ftdf_on_off_regmap_ftdf_ce
2941  *
2942  * Initialization value: none.
2943  * Access mode: EC-R (composite event)
2944  */
2945 #define IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_FTDF_CE 0x40090250
2946 #define SIZE_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_FTDF_CE 0x4
2947 #define MSK_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_FTDF_CE 0x3f
2948 
2949 /*
2950  *
2951  * Field: ftdf_on_off_regmap_ftdf_ce
2952  *
2953  * Composite serveice request from ftdf macro (see FR0400 in v40.100.2.41.pdf)
2954  * Bit 0 = unused
2955  * Bit 1 = rx interrupts
2956  * Bit 2 = tx interrupts
2957  * Bit 3 = miscelaneous interrupts
2958  * Bit 4 = tx interrupts from pages below (0x3 and 0x4)
2959  * Bit 5 = Reserved
2960  */
2961 #define IND_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_FTDF_CE IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_FTDF_CE
2962 #define MSK_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_FTDF_CE 0x3f
2963 #define OFF_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_FTDF_CE 0
2964 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_FTDF_CE 6
2965 
2966 /*
2967  *
2968  * REGISTER: ftdf_on_off_regmap_ftdf_cm
2969  *
2970  * Initialization value: 0x0 Initialization mask: 0x3f
2971  * Access mode: ECM-RW (composite event mask)
2972  */
2973 #define IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_FTDF_CM 0x40090254
2974 #define SIZE_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_FTDF_CM 0x4
2975 #define MSK_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_FTDF_CM 0x3f
2976 
2977 /*
2978  *
2979  * Field: ftdf_on_off_regmap_ftdf_cm
2980  *
2981  * mask bits for ftf_ce
2982  */
2983 #define IND_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_FTDF_CM IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_FTDF_CM
2984 #define MSK_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_FTDF_CM 0x3f
2985 #define OFF_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_FTDF_CM 0
2986 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_FTDF_CM 6
2987 
2988 /*
2989  *
2990  * REGISTER: ftdf_on_off_regmap_SyncTimeStampThr
2991  *
2992  * Initialization value: 0x0 Initialization mask: 0xffffffff
2993  * Access mode: C-RW (control - read/write)
2994  */
2995 #define IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_SYNCTIMESTAMPTHR 0x40090304
2996 #define SIZE_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_SYNCTIMESTAMPTHR 0x4
2997 #define MSK_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_SYNCTIMESTAMPTHR 0xffffffff
2998 
2999 /*
3000  *
3001  * Field: ftdf_on_off_regmap_SyncTimeStampThr
3002  *
3003  * Threshold for synchronize TS gen.
3004  * Note that due to implementation this register may only be written once per two LP_CLK periods.
3005  */
3006 #define IND_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_SYNCTIMESTAMPTHR IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_SYNCTIMESTAMPTHR
3007 #define MSK_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_SYNCTIMESTAMPTHR 0xffffffff
3008 #define OFF_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_SYNCTIMESTAMPTHR 0
3009 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_SYNCTIMESTAMPTHR 32
3010 
3011 /*
3012  *
3013  * REGISTER: ftdf_on_off_regmap_SyncTimeStampVal
3014  *
3015  * Initialization value: 0x0 Initialization mask: 0xffffffff
3016  * Access mode: C-RW (control - read/write)
3017  */
3018 #define IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_SYNCTIMESTAMPVAL 0x40090308
3019 #define SIZE_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_SYNCTIMESTAMPVAL 0x4
3020 #define MSK_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_SYNCTIMESTAMPVAL 0xffffffff
3021 
3022 /*
3023  *
3024  * Field: ftdf_on_off_regmap_SyncTimeStampVal
3025  *
3026  * Value to sync TS gen with.
3027  */
3028 #define IND_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_SYNCTIMESTAMPVAL IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_SYNCTIMESTAMPVAL
3029 #define MSK_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_SYNCTIMESTAMPVAL 0xffffffff
3030 #define OFF_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_SYNCTIMESTAMPVAL 0
3031 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_SYNCTIMESTAMPVAL 32
3032 
3033 /*
3034  *
3035  * REGISTER: ftdf_on_off_regmap_SyncTimeStampPhaseVal
3036  *
3037  * Initialization value: 0x0 Initialization mask: 0xff
3038  * Access mode: C-RW (control - read/write)
3039  */
3040 #define IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_SYNCTIMESTAMPPHASEVAL 0x40090320
3041 #define SIZE_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_SYNCTIMESTAMPPHASEVAL 0x4
3042 #define MSK_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_SYNCTIMESTAMPPHASEVAL 0xff
3043 
3044 /*
3045  *
3046  * Field: ftdf_on_off_regmap_SyncTimeStampPhaseVal
3047  *
3048  * Value to sync TS gen phase within a symbol with.
3049  * Please note the +1 correction needed for most accurate result (+0.5 is than the average error, resulting is a just too fast clock).
3050  */
3051 #define IND_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_SYNCTIMESTAMPPHASEVAL IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_SYNCTIMESTAMPPHASEVAL
3052 #define MSK_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_SYNCTIMESTAMPPHASEVAL 0xff
3053 #define OFF_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_SYNCTIMESTAMPPHASEVAL 0
3054 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_SYNCTIMESTAMPPHASEVAL 8
3055 
3056 /*
3057  *
3058  * REGISTER: ftdf_on_off_regmap_timer_control_1
3059  *
3060  * Initialization value: 0x0 Initialization mask: 0x2
3061  * Access mode: C-RW (control - read/write)
3062  */
3063 #define IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_TIMER_CONTROL_1 0x4009030c
3064 #define SIZE_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_TIMER_CONTROL_1 0x4
3065 #define MSK_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_TIMER_CONTROL_1 0x2
3066 
3067 /*
3068  *
3069  * Bit: ftdf_on_off_regmap_SyncTimeStampEna
3070  *
3071  * If set, the TimeStampThr is enabled to generate a sync of the TS gen.
3072  */
3073 #define IND_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_SYNCTIMESTAMPENA IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_TIMER_CONTROL_1
3074 #define MSK_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_SYNCTIMESTAMPENA 0x2
3075 #define OFF_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_SYNCTIMESTAMPENA 1
3076 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_SYNCTIMESTAMPENA 1
3077 
3078 /*
3079  *
3080  * REGISTER: ftdf_on_off_regmap_macTxStdAckFrmCnt
3081  *
3082  * Initialization value: none.
3083  * Access mode: S-R (state - read)
3084  */
3085 #define IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_MACTXSTDACKFRMCNT 0x40090310
3086 #define SIZE_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_MACTXSTDACKFRMCNT 0x4
3087 #define MSK_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_MACTXSTDACKFRMCNT 0xffffffff
3088

3091  * Field: ftdf_on_off_regmap_macTxStdAckFrmCnt
3092  *
3093  * Standard Acknowledgment frames transmitted
3094  */
3095 #define IND_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_MACTXSTDACKFRMCNT IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_MACTXSTDACKFRMCNT
3096 #define MSK_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_MACTXSTDACKFRMCNT 0xffffffff
3097 #define OFF_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_MACTXSTDACKFRMCNT 0

3099

3188 /*
3189  *
3190  * REGISTER: ftdf_on_off_regmap_LmacReset
3191  *
3192  * Initialization value: 0x0 Initialization mask: 0x106df
3193  * Access mode: OS-W (one-shot - write)
3194  */
3195 #define IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMACRESET 0x40090360
3196 #define SIZE_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMACRESET 0x4
3197 #define MSK_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMACRESET 0x106df
3198 
3199 /*
3200  *
3201  * Bit: ftdf_on_off_regmap_LmacReset_control
3202  *
3203  * LmacReset_control: A '1' Resets LMAC Controller (for debug and MLME-reset)
3204  */
3205 #define IND_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMACRESET_CONTROL IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMACRESET
3206 #define MSK_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMACRESET_CONTROL 0x1
3207 #define OFF_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMACRESET_CONTROL 0
3208 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMACRESET_CONTROL 1
3209 /*
3210  *
3211  * Bit: ftdf_on_off_regmap_LmacReset_rx
3212  *
3213  * LmacReset_rx: A '1' Resets LMAC rx pipeline (for debug and MLME-reset)
3214  */
3215 #define IND_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMACRESET_RX IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMACRESET
3216 #define MSK_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMACRESET_RX 0x2
3217 #define OFF_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMACRESET_RX 1
3218 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMACRESET_RX 1
3219 /*
3220  *
3221  * Bit: ftdf_on_off_regmap_LmacReset_tx
3222  *
3223  * LmacReset_tx: A '1' Resets LMAC tx pipeline (for debug and MLME-reset)
3224  */
3225 #define IND_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMACRESET_TX IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMACRESET
3226 #define MSK_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMACRESET_TX 0x4
3227 #define OFF_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMACRESET_TX 2
3228 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMACRESET_TX 1
3229 /*
3230  *
3231  * Bit: ftdf_on_off_regmap_LmacReset_ahb
3232  *
3233  * LmacReset_ahb: A '1' Resets LMAC ahb interface (for debug and MLME-reset)
3234  */
3235 #define IND_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMACRESET_AHB IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMACRESET
3236 #define MSK_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMACRESET_AHB 0x8
3237 #define OFF_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMACRESET_AHB 3
3238 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMACRESET_AHB 1
3239 /*
3240  *
3241  * Bit: ftdf_on_off_regmap_LmacReset_oreg
3242  *
3243  * LmacReset_oreg: A '1' Resets LMAC on_off regmap (for debug and MLME-reset)
3244  *
3245  * #$LmacReset_areg@on_off_regmap
3246  * #LmacReset_areg: A '1' Resets LMAC always_on regmap (for debug and MLME-reset)
3247  */
3248 #define IND_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMACRESET_OREG IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMACRESET
3249 #define MSK_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMACRESET_OREG 0x10
3250 #define OFF_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMACRESET_OREG 4
3251 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMACRESET_OREG 1
3252 /*
3253  *
3254  * Bit: ftdf_on_off_regmap_LmacReset_tstim
3255  *
3256  * LmacReset_tstim: A '1' Resets LMAC timestamp timer (for debug and MLME-reset)
3257  */
3258 #define IND_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMACRESET_TSTIM IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMACRESET
3259 #define MSK_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMACRESET_TSTIM 0x40
3260 #define OFF_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMACRESET_TSTIM 6
3261 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMACRESET_TSTIM 1
3262 /*
3263  *
3264  * Bit: ftdf_on_off_regmap_LmacReset_sec
3265  *
3266  * LmacReset_sec: A '1' Resets LMAC security (for debug and MLME-reset)
3267  *
3268  * #$LmacReset_wutim@on_off_regmap
3269  * #LmacReset_wutim: A '1' Resets LMAC wake-up timer (for debug and MLME-reset)
3270  */
3271 #define IND_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMACRESET_SEC IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMACRESET
3272 #define MSK_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMACRESET_SEC 0x80
3273 #define OFF_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMACRESET_SEC 7
3274 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMACRESET_SEC 1
3275 /*
3276  *
3277  * Bit: ftdf_on_off_regmap_LmacReset_count
3278  *
3279  * LmacReset_count: A '1' Resets LMAC mac counters (for debug and MLME-reset)
3280  */
3281 #define IND_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMACRESET_COUNT IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMACRESET
3282 #define MSK_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMACRESET_COUNT 0x200
3283 #define OFF_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMACRESET_COUNT 9
3284 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMACRESET_COUNT 1
3285 /*
3286  *
3287  * Bit: ftdf_on_off_regmap_LmacReset_timctrl
3288  *
3289  * LmacReset_count: A '1' Resets LMAC timing control block (for debug and MLME-reset)
3290  */
3291 #define IND_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMACRESET_TIMCTRL IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMACRESET
3292 #define MSK_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMACRESET_TIMCTRL 0x400
3293 #define OFF_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMACRESET_TIMCTRL 10
3294 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMACRESET_TIMCTRL 1
3295 /*
3296  *
3297  * Bit: ftdf_on_off_regmap_LmacGlobReset_count
3298  *
3299  * If set, the LMAC performance and traffic counters will be reset.
3300  * Use this register for functionally reset these counters.
3301  */
3302 #define IND_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMACGLOBRESET_COUNT IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMACRESET
3303 #define MSK_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMACGLOBRESET_COUNT 0x10000
3304 #define OFF_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMACGLOBRESET_COUNT 16
3305 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMACGLOBRESET_COUNT 1
3306 
3307 /*
3308  *
3309  * REGISTER: ftdf_on_off_regmap_SymbolTimeThr

3313  */
3314 #define IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_SYMBOLTIMETHR 0x40090380

3323  */
