3350 
3351 /*
3352  *
3353  * REGISTER: ftdf_on_off_regmap_DebugControl
3354  *
3355  * Initialization value: 0x0 Initialization mask: 0x1ff
3356  * Access mode: C-RW (control - read/write)
3357  */
3358 #define IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_DEBUGCONTROL 0x40090390
3359 #define SIZE_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_DEBUGCONTROL 0x4
3360 #define MSK_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_DEBUGCONTROL 0x1ff
3361 
3362 /*
3363  *
3364  * Bit: ftdf_on_off_regmap_dbg_rx_input
3365  *
3366  * If set, the Rx debug interface will be selected as input for the Rx pipeline.
3367  */
3368 #define IND_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_DBG_RX_INPUT IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_DEBUGCONTROL
3369 #define MSK_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_DBG_RX_INPUT 0x100
3370 #define OFF_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_DBG_RX_INPUT 8
3371 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_DBG_RX_INPUT 1
3372 /*
3373  *
3374  * Field: ftdf_on_off_regmap_dbg_control
3375  *
3376  * Control of the debug interface
3377  *
3378  * dbg_control 0x00 Not used
3379  * diagnose bus bit 7 - 0 = all '0'
3380  *
3381  * dbg_control 0x01 Legacy debug mode
3382  * diagnose bus bit 7 = ed_request
3383  * diagnose bus bit 6 = gen_irq
3384  * diagnose bus bit 5 = tx_en
3385  * diagnose bus bit 4 = rx_en
3386  * diagnose bus bit 3 = phy_en
3387  * diagnose bus bit 2 = tx_valid
3388  * diagnose bus bit 1 = rx_sof
3389  * diagnose bus bit 0 = rx_eof
3390  *
3391  * dbg_control 0x02 Clocks and reset
3392  * diagnose bus bit 7-3 = "00000"
3393  * diagnose bus bit 2 = lp_clk divide by 2
3394  * diagnose bus bit 1 = mac_clk divide by 2
3395  * diagnose bus bit 0 = hclk divided by 2
3396  *
3397  * dbg_control in range 0x02 - 0x0f Not used
3398  * diagnose bus bit 7 - 0 = all '0'
3399  *
3400  * dbg_control in range 0x10 - 0x1f Debug rx pipeline
3401  *
3402  * 0x10 Rx phy signals
3403  * diagnose_bus bit 7 = rx_enable towards the rx_pipeline
3404  * diagnose bus bit 6 = rx_sof from phy
3405  * diagnose bus bit 5-2 = rx_data from phy
3406  * diagnose bus bit 1 = rx_eof to phy
3407  * diagnose bus bit 0 = rx_sof event from rx_mac_timing block
3408  *
3409  * 0x11 Rx sof and length
3410  * diagnose_bus bit 7 = rx_sof
3411  * diagnose bus bit 6-0 = rx_mac_length from rx_mac_timing block
3412  *
3413  * 0x12 Rx mac timing output
3414  * diagnose_bus bit 7 = Enable from rx_mac_timing block
3415  * diagnose bus bit 6 = Sop from rx_mac_timing block
3416  * diagnose bus bit 5 = Eop from rx_mac_timing block
3417  * diagnose bus bit 4 = Crc from rx_mac_timing block
3418  * diagnose bus bit 3 = Err from rx_mac_timing block
3419  * diagnose bus bit 2 = Drop from rx_mac_timing block
3420  * diagnose bus bit 1 = Forward from rx_mac_timing block
3421  * diagnose bus bit 0 = rx_sof
3422  *
3423  * 0x13 Rx mac frame parser output
3424  * diagnose_bus bit 7 = Enable from mac_frame_parser block
3425  * diagnose bus bit 6 = Sop from mac_frame_parser block
3426  * diagnose bus bit 5 = Eop from mac_frame_parser block
3427  * diagnose bus bit 4 = Crc from mac_frame_parser block
3428  * diagnose bus bit 3 = Err from mac_frame_parser block
3429  * diagnose bus bit 2 = Drop from mac_frame_parser block
3430  * diagnose bus bit 1 = Forward from mac_frame_parser block
3431  * diagnose bus bit 0 = rx_sof
3432  *
3433  * 0x14 Rx status to Umac
3434  * diagnose_bus bit 7 = rx_frame_stat_umac.crc16_error
3435  * diagnose bus bit 6 = rx_frame_stat_umac.res_frm_type_error
3436  * diagnose bus bit 5 = rx_frame_stat_umac.res_frm_version_error
3437  * diagnose bus bit 4 = rx_frame_stat_umac.dpanid_error
3438  * diagnose bus bit 3 = rx_frame_stat_umac.daddr_error
3439  * diagnose bus bit 2 = rx_frame_stat_umac.spanid_error
3440  * diagnose bus bit 1 = rx_frame_stat_umac.ispan_coord_error
3441  * diagnose bus bit 0 = rx_sof
3442  *
3443  * 0x15 Rx status to lmac
3444  * diagnose_bus bit 7 = rx_frame_stat.packet_valid
3445  * diagnose bus bit 6 = rx_frame_stat.rx_sof_e
3446  * diagnose bus bit 5 = rx_frame_stat.rx_eof_e
3447  * diagnose bus bit 4 = rx_frame_stat.wakeup_frame
3448  * diagnose bus bit 3-1 = rx_frame_stat.frame_type
3449  * diagnose bus bit 0 = rx_frame_stat.rx_sqnr_valid
3450  *
3451  * 0x16 Rx buffer control
3452  * diagnose_bus bit 7-4 = prov_from_swio.rx_read_buf_ptr
3453  * diagnose bus bit 3-0 = stat_to_swio.rx_write_buf_ptr
3454  *
3455  * 0x17 Rx interrupts
3456  * diagnose_bus bit 7 = stat_to_swio.rx_buf_avail_e
3457  * diagnose bus bit 6 = stat_to_swio.rx_buf_full
3458  * diagnose bus bit 5 = stat_to_swio.rx_buf_overflow_e
3459  * diagnose bus bit 4 = stat_to_swio.rx_sof_e
3460  * diagnose bus bit 3 = stat_to_swio.rxbyte_e
3461  * diagnose bus bit 2 = rx_frame_ctrl.rx_enable
3462  * diagnose bus bit 1 = rx_eof
3463  * diagnose bus bit 0 = rx_sof
3464  *
3465  * 0x18 diagnose_bus bit 7-3 =
3466  * Prt statements mac frame parser
3467  * 0 Reset
3468  * 1 Multipurpose frame with no dpanid and macImplicitBroadcast is false and not pan cooordinator dropped
3469  * 2 Multipurpose frame with no dest address and macImplicitBroadcast is false and not pan cooordinator dropped
3470  * 3 RX unsupported frame type detected
3471  * 4 RX non Beacon frame detected and dropped in RxBeaconOnly mode
3472  * 5 RX frame passed due to macAlwaysPassFrmType set
3473  * 6 RX unsupported da_mode = 01 for frame_version 0x0- detected
3474  * 7 RX unsupported sa_mode = 01 for frame_version 0x0- detected
3475  * 8 Data or command frame with no dpanid and macImplicitBroadcast is false and not pan cooordinator dropped
3476  * 9 Data or command frame with no dest address and macImplicitBroadcast is false and not pan cooordinator dropped
3477  * 10 RX unsupported frame_version detected
3478  * 11 Multipurpose frame with no dpanid and macImplicitBroadcast is false and not pan cooordinator dropped
3479  * 12 Multipurpose frame with no dest address and macImplicitBroadcast is false and not pan cooordinator dropped
3480  * 13 RX unsupported frame_version detected
3481  * 14 RX Destination PAN Id check failed
3482  * 15 RX Destination address (1 byte) check failed
3483  * 16 RX Destination address (2 byte) check failed
3484  * 17 RX Destination address (8 byte) check failed
3485  * 18 RX Source PAN Id check for Beacon frames failed
3486  * 19 RX Source PAN Id check failed
3487  * 20 Auxiliary Security Header security control word received
3488  * 21 Auxiliary Security Header unsupported_legacy received frame_version 00
3489  * 22 Auxiliary Security Header unsupported_legacy security frame_version 11
3490  * 23 Auxiliary Security Header frame counter field received
3491  * 24 Auxiliary Security Header Key identifier field received
3492  * 25 Errored Destination Wakeup frame found send to Umac, not indicated towards lmac controller
3493  * 26 MacAlwaysPassWakeUpFrames = 1, Wakeup frame found send to Umac, not indicated towards lmac controller
3494  * 27 Wakeup frame found send to lmac controller and Umac
3495  * 28 Wakeup frame found send to lmac controller, dropped towards Umac
3496  * 29 Command frame with data_request command received
3497  * 30 Coordinator realignment frame received
3498  * 31 Not Used
3499  * diagnose bus bit 2-0 = frame_type
3500  *
3501  * 0x19 diagnose_bus bit 7-4 =
3502  * Framestates mac frame parser
3503  * 0 idle_state
3504  * 1 fr_ctrl_state
3505  * 2 fr_ctrl_long_state
3506  * 3 seq_nr_state
3507  * 4 dest_pan_id_state
3508  * 5 dest_addr_state
3509  * 6 src_pan_id_state
3510  * 7 src_addr_state
3511  * 8 aux_sec_hdr_state
3512  * 9 hdr_ie_state
3513  * 10 pyld_ie_state
3514  * 11 ignore_state
3515  * 12-16 Not used
3516  * diagnose bus bit 3 = rx_mac_sof_e
3517  * diagnose bus bit 2-0 = frame_type
3518  *
3519  * 0x1a-0x1f Not Used
3520  * diagnose bus bit 7 - 0 = all '0'
3521  *
3522  * dbg_control in range 0x20 - 0x2f Debug tx pipeline
3523  * 0x20 Top and bottom interfaces tx datapath
3524  * diagnose_bus bit 7 = tx_mac_ld_strb
3525  * diagnose bus bit 6 = tx_mac_drdy
3526  * diagnose bus bit 5 = tx_valid
3527  * diagnose bus bit 4-1 = tx_data
3528  * diagnose bus bit 0 = symbol_ena
3529  *
3530  * 0x21 Control signals for tx datapath
3531  * diagnose_bus bit 7 = TxTransparentMode
3532  * diagnose bus bit 6 = ctrl_lmac_to_tx.CRC16_ena
3533  * diagnose bus bit 5 = ctrl_lmac_to_tx.tx_start
3534  * diagnose bus bit 4 = ctrl_lmac_to_tx.gen_ack
3535  * diagnose bus bit 3 = ctrl_lmac_to_tx.gen_wu
3536  * diagnose bus bit 2-1 = ctrl_lmac_to_tx.tx_frame_nmbr
3537  * diagnose bus bit 0 = tx_valid
3538  *
3539  * 0x22 Control signals for wakeup frames
3540  * diagnose_bus bit 7 = ctrl_lmac_to_tx.tx_start
3541  * diagnose bus bit 6 = ctrl_lmac_to_tx.gen_wu
3542  * diagnose bus bit 5-1 = ctrl_lmac_to_tx.gen_wu_RZ(4 DOWNTO 0)
3543  * diagnose bus bit 0 = ctrl_tx_to_lmac.tx_rz_zero
3544  *
3545  * 0x23 Data signals for wakeup frame
3546  * diagnose_bus bit 7 = ctrl_lmac_to_tx.tx_start
3547  * diagnose bus bit 6 = ctrl_lmac_to_tx.gen_wu
3548  * diagnose bus bit 5 = tx_valid
3549  * diagnose bus bit 4-1 = tx_data
3550  * diagnose bus bit 0 = ctrl_tx_to_lmac.tx_rz_zero
3551  *
3552  * 0x24 Data and control ack frame
3553  * diagnose_bus bit 7 = ctrl_lmac_to_tx.tx_start
3554  * diagnose bus bit 6 = ctrl_lmac_to_tx.gen_ack
3555  * diagnose bus bit 5 = tx_valid
3556  * diagnose bus bit 4-1 = tx_data
3557  * diagnose bus bit 0 = symbol_ena
3558  *
3559  * 0x25-0x2f Not Used
3560  * diagnose bus bit 7 - 0 = all '0'
3561  *
3562  * dbg_control in range 0x30 - 0x3f Debug lmac_controller
3563  * 0x30 Phy signals
3564  * diagnose_bus bit 7 = phy_en
3565  * diagnose bus bit 6 = tx_en
3566  * diagnose bus bit 5 = rx_en
3567  * diagnose bus bit 4-1 = phyattr(3 downto 0)
3568  * diagnose bus bit 0 = ed_request
3569  *
3570  * 0x31 Phy enable and detailed statemachine info
3571  * diagnose_bus bit 7 = phy_en
3572  * diagnose bus bit 6-0 = prt statements detailed statemachine info
3573  * 0 Reset
3574  * 1 MAIN_STATE_IDLE TX_ACKnowledgement frame skip CSMA_CA
3575  * 2 MAIN_STATE_IDLE : Wake-Up frame resides in buffer no
3576  * 3 MAIN_STATE_IDLE : TX frame in TSCH mode
3577  * 4 MAIN_STATE_IDLE : TX frame
3578  * 5 MAIN_STATE_IDLE : goto SINGLE_CCA
3579  * 6 MAIN_STATE_IDLE : goto Energy Detection
3580  * 7 MAIN_STATE_IDLE : goto RX
3581  * 8 MAIN_STATE_IDLE de-assert phy_en wait for
3582  * 9 MAIN_STATE_IDLE Start phy_en and assert phy_en wait for :
3583  * 10 MAIN_STATE_CSMA_CA_WAIT_FOR_METADATA framenr :
3584  * 11 MAIN_STATE_CSMA_CA framenr :
3585  * 12 MAIN_STATE_CSMA_CA start CSMA_CA
3586  * 14 MAIN_STATE_CSMA_CA skip CSMA_CA
3587  * 15 MAIN_STATE_WAIT_FOR_CSMA_CA csma_ca Failed for CSL mode
3588  * 16 MAIN_STATE_WAIT_FOR_CSMA_CA csma_ca Failed
3589  * 17 MAIN_STATE_WAIT_FOR_CSMA_CA csma_ca Success
3590  * 18 MAIN_STATE_SINGLE_CCA cca failed
3591  * 19 MAIN_STATE_SINGLE_CCA cca ok
3592  * 20 MAIN_STATE_WAIT_ACK_DELAY wait time elapsed
3593  * 21 MAIN_STATE_WAIT ACK_DELAY : Send Ack in TSCH mode
3594  * 22 MAIN_STATE_WAIT ACK_DELAY : Ack not scheduled in time in TSCH mode
3595  * 23 MAIN_STATE_TSCH_TX_FRAME macTSRxTx time elapsed
3596  * 24 MAIN_STATE_TX_FRAME it is CSL mode, start the WU seq for macWUPeriod
3597  * 25 MAIN_STATE_TX_FRAME1
3598  * 26 MAIN_STATE_TX_FRAME_W1 exit, waited for :
3599  * 27 MAIN_STATE_TX_FRAME_W2 exit, waited for :
3600  * 28 MAIN_STATE_TX_WAIT_LAST_SYMBOL exit
3601  * 29 MAIN_STATE_TX_RAMPDOWN_W exit, waited for :
3602  * 30 MAIN_STATE_TX_PHYTRXWAIT exit, waited for :
3603  * 31 MAIN_STATE_GEN_IFS , Ack with frame pending received
3604  * 32 MAIN_STATE_GEN_IFS , Ack requested but DisRXackReceivedca is set
3605  * 33 MAIN_STATE_GEN_IFS , instead of generating an IFS, switch the rx-on for an ACK
3606  * 34 MAIN_STATE_GEN_IFS , generating an SIFS (Short Inter Frame Space)
3607  * 35 MAIN_STATE_GEN_IFS , generating an LIFS (Long Inter Frame Space)
3608  * 36 MAIN_STATE_GEN_IFS_FINISH in CSL mode, 'cslperiod_timer_ready' is ready sent the data frame
3609  * 37 MAIN_STATE_GEN_IFS_FINISH in CSL mode, 'Rendezvous zero time not yet transmitted sent another WU frame
3610  * 38 MAIN_STATE_GEN_IFS_FINISH exit, corrected for :
3611  * 39 MAIN_STATE_GEN_IFS_FINISH in CSL mode, rx_resume_after_tx is set
3612  * 40 MAIN_STATE_SENT_STATUS CSLMode wu_sequence_done_flag :
3613  * 41 MAIN_STATE_ADD_DELAY exit, goto RX for frame pending time
3614  * 42 MAIN_STATE_ADD_DELAY exit, goto IDLE
3615  * 43 MAIN_STATE_RX switch the RX from off to on
3616  * 44 MAIN_STATE_RX_WAIT_PHYRXSTART waited for
3617  * 45 MAIN_STATE_RX_WAIT_PHYRXLATENCY start the MacAckDuration timer
3618  * 46 MAIN_STATE_RX_WAIT_PHYRXLATENCY start the ack wait timer
3619  * 47 MAIN_STATE_RX_WAIT_PHYRXLATENCY NORMAL mode : start rx_duration
3620  * 48 MAIN_STATE_RX_WAIT_PHYRXLATENCY TSCH mode : start macTSRxWait (macTSRxWait) timer
3621  * 49 MAIN_STATE_RX_WAIT_PHYRXLATENCY CSL mode : start the csl_rx_duration (macCSLsamplePeriod) timer
3622  * 50 MAIN_STATE_RX_WAIT_PHYRXLATENCY CSL mode : start the csl_rx_duration (macCSLdataPeriod) timer
3623  * 51 MAIN_STATE_RX_CHK_EXPIRED 1 ackwait_timer_ready or ack_received_ind
3624  * 52 MAIN_STATE_RX_CHK_EXPIRED 2 normal_mode. ACK with FP bit set, start frame pending timer
3625  * 54 MAIN_STATE_RX_CHK_EXPIRED 4 RxAlwaysOn is set to 0
3626  * 55 MAIN_STATE_RX_CHK_EXPIRED 5 TSCH mode valid frame rxed
3627  * 56 MAIN_STATE_RX_CHK_EXPIRED 6 TSCH mode macTSRxwait expired
3628  * 57 MAIN_STATE_RX_CHK_EXPIRED 7 macCSLsamplePeriod timer ready
3629  * 58 MAIN_STATE_RX_CHK_EXPIRED 8 csl_mode. Data frame recieved with FP bit set, increment RX duration time
3630  * 59 MAIN_STATE_RX_CHK_EXPIRED 9 CSL mode : Received wu frame in data listening period restart macCSLdataPeriod timer
3631  * 60 MAIN_STATE_RX_CHK_EXPIRED 10 csl_rx_duration_ready or csl data frame received:
3632  * 61 MAIN_STATE_RX_CHK_EXPIRED 11 normal_mode. FP bit is set, start frame pending timer
3633  * 62 MAIN_STATE_RX_CHK_EXPIRED 12 normal mode rx_duration_timer_ready and frame_pending_timer_ready
3634  * 63 MAIN_STATE_RX_CHK_EXPIRED 13 acknowledge frame requested
3635  * 64 MAIN_STATE_RX_CHK_EXPIRED 14 Interrupt to sent a frame. found_tx_packet
3636  * 65 MAIN_STATE_CSL_RX_IDLE_END RZ time is far away, switch receiver Off and wait for csl_rx_rz_time before switching on
3637  * 66 MAIN_STATE_CSL_RX_IDLE_END RZ time is not so far away, keep receiver On and wait for
3638  * 67 MAIN_STATE_RX_START_PHYRXSTOP ack with fp received keep rx on
3639  * 68 MAIN_STATE_RX_START_PHYRXSTOP switch the RX from on to off
3640  * 69 MAIN_STATE_RX_WAIT_PHYRXSTOP acknowledge done : switch back to finish TX
3641  * 70 MAIN_STATE_RX_WAIT_PHYRXSTOP switch the RX off
3642  * 71 MAIN_STATE_ED switch the RX from off to on
3643  * 72 MAIN_STATE_ED_WAIT_PHYRXSTART waited for phyRxStartup
3644  * 73 MAIN_STATE_ED_WAIT_EDSCANDURATION waited for EdScanDuration
3645  * 74 MAIN_STATE_ED_WAIT_PHYRXSTOP end of Energy Detection, got IDLE
3646  * 75 - 127 Not used
3647  *
3648  * 0x32 RX enable and detailed statemachine info
3649  * diagnose_bus bit 7 = rx_en
3650  * diagnose bus bit 6-0 = detailed statemachine info see dbg_control = 0x31
3651  *
3652  * 0x33 TX enable and detailed statemachine info
3653  * diagnose_bus bit 7 = tx_en
3654  * diagnose bus bit 6-0 = detailed statemachine info see dbg_control = 0x31
3655  *
3656  * 0x34 Phy enable, TX enable and Rx enable and state machine states
3657  * diagnose_bus bit 7 = phy_en
3658  * diagnose_bus bit 6 = tx_en
3659  * diagnose_bus bit 5 = rx_en
3660  * diagnose bus bit 4-0 = State machine states
3661  * 1 MAIN_STATE_IDLE
3662  * 2 MAIN_STATE_CSMA_CA_WAIT_FOR_METADATA
3663  * 3 MAIN_STATE_CSMA_CA
3664  * 4 MAIN_STATE_WAIT_FOR_CSMA_CA_0
3665  * 5 MAIN_STATE_WAIT_FOR_CSMA_CA
3666  * 6 MAIN_STATE_SINGLE_CCA
3667  * 7 MAIN_STATE_WAIT_ACK_DELAY
3668  * 8 MAIN_STATE_TSCH_TX_FRAME
3669  * 9 MAIN_STATE_TX_FRAME
3670  * 10 MAIN_STATE_TX_FRAME1
3671  * 11 MAIN_STATE_TX_FRAME_W1
3672  * 12 MAIN_STATE_TX_FRAME_W2
3673  * 13 MAIN_STATE_TX_WAIT_LAST_SYMBOL
3674  * 14 MAIN_STATE_TX_RAMPDOWN
3675  * 15 MAIN_STATE_TX_RAMPDOWN_W
3676  * 16 MAIN_STATE_TX_PHYTRXWAIT
3677  * 17 MAIN_STATE_GEN_IFS
3678  * 18 MAIN_STATE_GEN_IFS_FINISH
3679  * 19 MAIN_STATE_SENT_STATUS
3680  * 20 MAIN_STATE_ADD_DELAY
3681  * 21 MAIN_STATE_TSCH_RX_ACKDELAY
3682  * 22 MAIN_STATE_RX
3683  * 23 MAIN_STATE_RX_WAIT_PHYRXSTART
3684  * 24 MAIN_STATE_RX_WAIT_PHYRXLATENCY
3685  * 25 MAIN_STATE_RX_CHK_EXPIRED
3686  * 26 MAIN_STATE_CSL_RX_IDLE_END
3687  * 27 MAIN_STATE_RX_START_PHYRXSTOP
3688  * 28 MAIN_STATE_RX_WAIT_PHYRXSTOP
3689  * 29 MAIN_STATE_ED
3690  * 30 MAIN_STATE_ED_WAIT_PHYRXSTART
3691  * 31 MAIN_STATE_ED_WAIT_EDSCANDURATION
3692  *
3693  * 0x35 lmac controller to tx interface with wakeup
3694  * diagnose_bus bit 7 = tx_en
3695  * diagnose_bus bit 6 = rx_en
3696  * diagnose_bus bit 5 = ctrl_lmac_to_tx.gen_wu
3697  * diagnose_bus bit 4 = ctrl_lmac_to_tx.gen_ack
3698  * diagnose_bus bit 3-2 = ctrl_lmac_to_tx.tx_frame_nmbr
3699  * diagnose_bus bit 1 = ctrl_lmac_to_tx.tx_start
3700  * diagnose_bus bit 0 = ctrl_tx_to_lmac.tx_last_symbol
3701  *
3702  * 0x36 lmac controller to tx interface with frame pending
3703  * diagnose_bus bit 7 = tx_en
3704  * diagnose_bus bit 6 = rx_en
3705  * diagnose_bus bit 5 = ctrl_lmac_to_tx.gen.fp_bit
3706  * diagnose_bus bit 4 = ctrl_lmac_to_tx.gen_ack
3707  * diagnose_bus bit 3-2 = ctrl_lmac_to_tx.tx_frame_nmbr
3708  * diagnose_bus bit 1 = ctrl_lmac_to_tx.tx_start
3709  * diagnose_bus bit 0 = ctrl_tx_to_lmac.tx_last_symbol
3710  *
3711  * 0x37 rx pipepline to lmac controller interface
3712  * diagnose_bus bit 7 = tx_en
3713  * diagnose_bus bit 6 = rx_en
3714  * diagnose_bus bit 5 = ctrl_rx_to_lmac.rx_sof_e
3715  * diagnose_bus bit 4 = ctrl_rx_to_lmac.rx_eof_e
3716  * diagnose_bus bit 3 = ctrl_rx_to_lmac.packet_valid
3717  * diagnose_bus bit 2 = ack_received_ind
3718  * diagnose_bus bit 1 = ack_request_ind
3719  * diagnose_bus bit 0 = ctrl_rx_to_lmac.data_request_frame
3720  *
3721  * 0x38 csl start
3722  * diagnose_bus bit 7 = tx_en
3723  * diagnose_bus bit 6 = rx_en
3724  * diagnose_bus bit 5 = csl_start
3725  * diagnose_bus bit 4-1 = swio_always_on_to_lmac_ctrl.tx_flag_stat
3726  * diagnose_bus bit 0 = found_wu_packet;
3727  *
3728  * 0x39 Tsch TX ack timing
3729  * diagnose_bus bit 7-4 = swio_always_on_to_lmac_ctrl.tx_flag_stat
3730  * diagnose_bus bit 3 = tx_en
3731  * diagnose_bus bit 2 = rx_en
3732  * diagnose_bus bit 1 = ctrl_rx_to_lmac.packet_valid
3733  * diagnose_bus bit 0 = one_us_timer_ready
3734  *
3735  * 0x3a-0x3f Not used
3736  * diagnose bus bit 7 - 0 = all '0'
3737  *
3738  * dbg_control in range 0x40 - 0x4f Debug security
3739  * 0x40 Security control
3740  * diagnose_bus bit 7 = swio_to_security.secStart
3741  * diagnose_bus bit 6 = swio_to_security.secTxRxn
3742  * diagnose_bus bit 5 = swio_to_security.secAbort
3743  * diagnose_bus bit 4 = swio_to_security.secEncDecn
3744  * diagnose_bus bit 3 = swio_from_security.secBusy
3745  * diagnose_bus bit 2 = swio_from_security.secAuthFail
3746  * diagnose_bus bit 1 = swio_from_security.secReady_e
3747  * diagnose_bus bit 0 = '0'
3748  *
3749  * 0x41 Security ctlid access rx and tx
3750  * diagnose_bus bit 7 = tx_sec_ci.ld_strb
3751  * diagnose_bus bit 6 = tx_sec_ci.ctlid_rw
3752  * diagnose_bus bit 5 = tx_sec_ci.selectp
3753  * diagnose_bus bit 4 = tx_sec_co.d_rdy
3754  * diagnose_bus bit 3 = rx_sec_ci.ld_strb
3755  * diagnose_bus bit 2 = rx_sec_ci.ctlid_rw
3756  * diagnose_bus bit 1 = rx_sec_ci.selectp
3757  * diagnose_bus bit 0 = rx_sec_co.d_rdy
3758  *
3759  * 0x42 Security ctlid access tx with sec_wr_data_valid
3760  * diagnose_bus bit 7 = tx_sec_ci.ld_strb
3761  * diagnose_bus bit 6 = tx_sec_ci.ctlid_rw
3762  * diagnose_bus bit 5 = tx_sec_ci.selectp
3763  * diagnose_bus bit 4 = tx_sec_co.d_rdy
3764  * diagnose_bus bit 3-0 = sec_wr_data_valid
3765  *
3766  * 0x43 Security ctlid access rx with sec_wr_data_valid
3767  * diagnose_bus bit 7 = rx_sec_ci.ld_strb
3768  * diagnose_bus bit 6 = rx_sec_ci.ctlid_rw
3769  * diagnose_bus bit 5 = rx_sec_ci.selectp
3770  * diagnose_bus bit 4 = rx_sec_co.d_rdy
3771  * diagnose_bus bit 3-0 = sec_wr_data_valid
3772  *
3773  * 0x44-0x4f Not used
3774  * diagnose bus bit 7 - 0 = all '0'
3775  *
3776  * dbg_control in range 0x50 - 0x5f AHB bus
3777  * 0x50 ahb bus without hsize
3778  * diagnose_bus bit 7 = hsel
3779  * diagnose_bus bit 6-5 = htrans
3780  * diagnose_bus bit 4 = hwrite
3781  * diagnose_bus bit 3 = hready_in
3782  * diagnose_bus bit 2 = hready_out
3783  * diagnose_bus bit 1-0 = hresp
3784  *
3785  * 0x51 ahb bus without hwready_in and hresp(1)
3786  * diagnose_bus bit 7 = hsel
3787  * diagnose_bus bit 6-5 = htrans
3788  * diagnose_bus bit 4 = hwrite
3789  * diagnose_bus bit 3-2 = hhsize(1 downto 0)
3790  * diagnose_bus bit 1 = hready_out
3791  * diagnose_bus bit 0 = hresp(0)
3792  *
3793  * 0x52 Amba tx signals
3794  * diagnose_bus bit 7 = ai_tx.penable
3795  * diagnose_bus bit 6 = ai_tx.psel
3796  * diagnose_bus bit 5 = ai_tx.pwrite
3797  * diagnose_bus bit 4 = ao_tx.pready
3798  * diagnose_bus bit 3 = ao_tx.pslverr
3799  * diagnose_bus bit 2-1 = psize_tx
3800  * diagnose_bus bit 0 = hready_out
3801  *
3802  * 0x53 Amba rx signals
3803  * diagnose_bus bit 7 = ai_rx.penable
3804  * diagnose_bus bit 6 = ai_rx.psel
3805  * diagnose_bus bit 5 = ai_rx.pwrite
3806  * diagnose_bus bit 4 = ao_rx.pready
3807  * diagnose_bus bit 3 = ao_rx.pslverr
3808  * diagnose_bus bit 2-1 = psize_rx
3809  * diagnose_bus bit 0 = hready_out
3810  *
3811  * 0x54 Amba register map signals
3812  * diagnose_bus bit 7 = ai_reg.penable
3813  * diagnose_bus bit 6 = ai_reg.psel
3814  * diagnose_bus bit 5 = ai_reg.pwrite
3815  * diagnose_bus bit 4 = ao_reg.pready
3816  * diagnose_bus bit 3 = ao_reg.pslverr
3817  * diagnose_bus bit 2-1 = "00"
3818  * diagnose_bus bit 0 = hready_out
3819  *
3820  * 0x55-0x5f Not used
3821  * diagnose bus bit 7 - 0 = all '0'
3822  */
3823 #define IND_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_DBG_CONTROL IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_DEBUGCONTROL
3824 #define MSK_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_DBG_CONTROL 0xff
3825 #define OFF_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_DBG_CONTROL 0
3826 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_DBG_CONTROL 8
3827 
3828 /*
3829  *
3830  * REGISTER: ftdf_on_off_regmap_txbyte_e
3831  *
3832  * Initialization value: 0x0 Initialization mask: 0x3
3833  * Access mode: E-RCW (event read/clear on write 1)
3834  */
3835 #define IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_TXBYTE_E 0x40090394
3836 #define SIZE_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_TXBYTE_E 0x4
3837 #define MSK_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_TXBYTE_E 0x3
3838 
3839 /*
3840  *
3841  * Bit: ftdf_on_off_regmap_txbyte_e
3842  *
3843  * Indicates the first byte of a frame is transmitted
3844  */
3845 #define IND_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_TXBYTE_E IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_TXBYTE_E
3846 #define MSK_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_TXBYTE_E 0x1
3847 #define OFF_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_TXBYTE_E 0
3848 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_TXBYTE_E 1
3849 /*
3850  *
3851  * Bit: ftdf_on_off_regmap_tx_last_symbol_e
3852  *
3853  * Indicates the last symbol of a frame is transmitted
3854  */
3855 #define IND_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_TX_LAST_SYMBOL_E IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_TXBYTE_E
3856 #define MSK_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_TX_LAST_SYMBOL_E 0x2
3857 #define OFF_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_TX_LAST_SYMBOL_E 1
3858 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_TX_LAST_SYMBOL_E 1
3859 
3860 /*
3861  *
3862  * REGISTER: ftdf_on_off_regmap_txbyte_m
3863  *
3864  * Initialization value: 0x0 Initialization mask: 0x3
3865  * Access mode: EM-RW (event mask)
3866  */
3867 #define IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_TXBYTE_M 0x40090398
3868 #define SIZE_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_TXBYTE_M 0x4
3869 #define MSK_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_TXBYTE_M 0x3
3870 
3871 /*
3872  *
3873  * Bit: ftdf_on_off_regmap_txbyte_m
3874  *
3875  * Mask bit for event "txbyte_e".
3876  */
3877 #define IND_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_TXBYTE_M IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_TXBYTE_M
3878 #define MSK_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_TXBYTE_M 0x1
3879 #define OFF_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_TXBYTE_M 0
3880 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_TXBYTE_M 1
3881 /*
3882  *
3883  * Bit: ftdf_on_off_regmap_tx_last_symbol_m
3884  *
3885  * Mask bit for event "tx_last_symbol_e".
3886  */
3887 #define IND_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_TX_LAST_SYMBOL_M IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_TXBYTE_M
3888 #define MSK_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_TX_LAST_SYMBOL_M 0x2
3889 #define OFF_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_TX_LAST_SYMBOL_M 1
3890 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_TX_LAST_SYMBOL_M 1
3891 
3892 /*
3893  *
3894  * REGISTER: ftdf_on_off_regmap_tx_flag_s
3895  *
3896  * Initialization value: none.
3897  * Access mode: S-R (state - read)
3898  */
3899 #define IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_TX_FLAG_S 0x40090400
3900 #define SIZE_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_TX_FLAG_S 0x4
3901 #define MSK_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_TX_FLAG_S 0x1
3902 #define FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_TX_FLAG_S_NUM 0x4
3903 #define FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_TX_FLAG_S_INTVL 0x20
3904 #define FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_TX_FLAG_STAT_NUM 0x4
3905 #define FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_TX_FLAG_STAT_INTVL 0x20
3906 
3907 /*
3908  *
3909  * Bit: ftdf_on_off_regmap_tx_flag_stat
3910  *
3911  * Packet is ready for transmission
3912  */
3913 #define IND_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_TX_FLAG_STAT IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_TX_FLAG_S
3914 #define MSK_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_TX_FLAG_STAT 0x1
3915 #define OFF_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_TX_FLAG_STAT 0
3916 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_TX_FLAG_STAT 1
3917 
3918 /*
3919  *
3920  * REGISTER: ftdf_on_off_regmap_tx_flag_clear_e
3921  *
3922  * Initialization value: 0x0 Initialization mask: 0x1
3923  * Access mode: E-RCW (event read/clear on write 1)
3924  */
3925 #define IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_TX_FLAG_CLEAR_E 0x40090404
3926 #define SIZE_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_TX_FLAG_CLEAR_E 0x4
3927 #define MSK_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_TX_FLAG_CLEAR_E 0x1
3928 #define FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_TX_FLAG_CLEAR_E_NUM 0x4
3929 #define FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_TX_FLAG_CLEAR_E_INTVL 0x20
3930 #define FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_TX_FLAG_CLEAR_E_NUM 0x4
3931 #define FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_TX_FLAG_CLEAR_E_INTVL 0x20
3932 
3933 /*
3934  *
3935  * Bit: ftdf_on_off_regmap_tx_flag_clear_e
3936  *
3937  * When the LMAC clears the tx_flag_stat status event bit tx_flag_clear_e is set.
3938  */
3939 #define IND_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_TX_FLAG_CLEAR_E IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_TX_FLAG_CLEAR_E
3940 #define MSK_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_TX_FLAG_CLEAR_E 0x1
3941 #define OFF_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_TX_FLAG_CLEAR_E 0
3942 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_TX_FLAG_CLEAR_E 1
3943 
3944 /*
3945  *
3946  * REGISTER: ftdf_on_off_regmap_tx_flag_clear_m
3947  *
3948  * Initialization value: 0x0 Initialization mask: 0x1
3949  * Access mode: EM-RW (event mask)
3950  */
3951 #define IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_TX_FLAG_CLEAR_M 0x40090408
3952 #define SIZE_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_TX_FLAG_CLEAR_M 0x4
3953 #define MSK_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_TX_FLAG_CLEAR_M 0x1
3954 #define FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_TX_FLAG_CLEAR_M_NUM 0x4
3955 #define FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_TX_FLAG_CLEAR_M_INTVL 0x20
3956 #define FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_TX_FLAG_CLEAR_M_NUM 0x4
3957 #define FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_TX_FLAG_CLEAR_M_INTVL 0x20
3958 
3959 /*
3960  *
3961  * Bit: ftdf_on_off_regmap_tx_flag_clear_m
3962  *
3963  * Mask bit for event "tx_flag_clear_e".
3964  */
3965 #define IND_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_TX_FLAG_CLEAR_M IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_TX_FLAG_CLEAR_M
3966 #define MSK_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_TX_FLAG_CLEAR_M 0x1
3967 #define OFF_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_TX_FLAG_CLEAR_M 0
3968 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_TX_FLAG_CLEAR_M 1
3969 
3970 /*
3971  *
3972  * REGISTER: ftdf_on_off_regmap_tx_priority
3973  *
3974  * Initialization value: 0x0 Initialization mask: 0x1f
3975  * Access mode: C-RW (control - read/write)
3976  */
3977 #define IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_TX_PRIORITY 0x40090410
3978 #define SIZE_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_TX_PRIORITY 0x4
3979 #define MSK_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_TX_PRIORITY 0x1f
3980 #define FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_TX_PRIORITY_NUM 0x4
3981 #define FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_TX_PRIORITY_INTVL 0x20
3982 #define FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_TX_PRIORITY_NUM 0x4
3983 #define FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_TX_PRIORITY_INTVL 0x20
3984 #define FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_ISWAKEUP_NUM 0x4
3985 #define FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_ISWAKEUP_INTVL 0x20
3986 
3987 /*
3988  *
3989  * Field: ftdf_on_off_regmap_tx_priority
3990  *
3991  * Priority of packet
3992  */
3993 #define IND_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_TX_PRIORITY IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_TX_PRIORITY
3994 #define MSK_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_TX_PRIORITY 0xf
3995 #define OFF_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_TX_PRIORITY 0
3996 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_TX_PRIORITY 4
3997 /*
3998  *
3999  * Bit: ftdf_on_off_regmap_IsWakeUp
4000  *
4001  * A basic wake-up frame can be generated by the UMAC in the Tx buffer.
4002  * The meta data control bit IsWakeUp must be set to indicate that this is a Wake-up frame.
4003  */
4004 #define IND_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_ISWAKEUP IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_TX_PRIORITY
4005 #define MSK_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_ISWAKEUP 0x10
4006 #define OFF_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_ISWAKEUP 4
4007 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_ISWAKEUP 1
4008 
4009 /*
4010  *
4011  * REGISTER: ftdf_on_off_regmap_tx_set_os
4012  *
4013  * Initialization value: 0x0 Initialization mask: 0xf
4014  * Access mode: OS-W (one-shot - write)
4015  */
4016 #define IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_TX_SET_OS 0x40090480
4017 #define SIZE_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_TX_SET_OS 0x4
4018 #define MSK_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_TX_SET_OS 0xf
4019 
4020 /*
4021  *
4022  * Field: ftdf_on_off_regmap_tx_flag_set
4023  *
4024  * To set tx_flag_stat
4025  */
4026 #define IND_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_TX_FLAG_SET IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_TX_SET_OS
4027 #define MSK_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_TX_FLAG_SET 0xf
4028 #define OFF_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_TX_FLAG_SET 0
4029 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_TX_FLAG_SET 4
4030 
4031 /*
4032  *
4033  * REGISTER: ftdf_on_off_regmap_tx_clear_os
4034  *
4035  * Initialization value: 0x0 Initialization mask: 0xf
4036  * Access mode: OS-W (one-shot - write)
4037  */
4038 #define IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_TX_CLEAR_OS 0x40090484
4039 #define SIZE_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_TX_CLEAR_OS 0x4
4040 #define MSK_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_TX_CLEAR_OS 0xf
4041 
4042 /*
4043  *
4044  * Field: ftdf_on_off_regmap_tx_flag_clear
4045  *
4046  * To clear tx_flag_stat
4047  */
4048 #define IND_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_TX_FLAG_CLEAR IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_TX_CLEAR_OS
4049 #define MSK_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_TX_FLAG_CLEAR 0xf
4050 #define OFF_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_TX_FLAG_CLEAR 0
4051 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_TX_FLAG_CLEAR 4
4052 
4053 /*
4054  *
4055  * REGISTER: ftdf_always_on_regmap_WakeUpIntThr
4056  *
4057  * Initialization value: 0x0 Initialization mask: 0xffffffff
4058  * Access mode: C-RW (control - read/write)
4059  */
4060 #define IND_R_FTDF_ALWAYS_ON_REGMAP_WAKEUPINTTHR 0x40091000
4061 #define SIZE_R_FTDF_ALWAYS_ON_REGMAP_WAKEUPINTTHR 0x4
4062 #define MSK_R_FTDF_ALWAYS_ON_REGMAP_WAKEUPINTTHR 0xffffffff
4063 
4064 /*
4065  *
4066  * Field: ftdf_always_on_regmap_WakeUpIntThr
4067  *
4068  * Threshold for wake-up interrupt.
4069  */
4070 #define IND_F_FTDF_ALWAYS_ON_REGMAP_WAKEUPINTTHR IND_R_FTDF_ALWAYS_ON_REGMAP_WAKEUPINTTHR
4071 #define MSK_F_FTDF_ALWAYS_ON_REGMAP_WAKEUPINTTHR 0xffffffff
4072 #define OFF_F_FTDF_ALWAYS_ON_REGMAP_WAKEUPINTTHR 0
4073 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_ALWAYS_ON_REGMAP_WAKEUPINTTHR 32
4074 
4075 /*
4076  *
4077  * REGISTER: ftdf_always_on_regmap_wakeup_control
4078  *
4079  * Initialization value: 0x0 Initialization mask: 0x3
4080  * Access mode: C-RW (control - read/write)
4081  */
4082 #define IND_R_FTDF_ALWAYS_ON_REGMAP_WAKEUP_CONTROL 0x40091004
4083 #define SIZE_R_FTDF_ALWAYS_ON_REGMAP_WAKEUP_CONTROL 0x4
4084 #define MSK_R_FTDF_ALWAYS_ON_REGMAP_WAKEUP_CONTROL 0x3
4085 
4086 /*
4087  *
4088  * Bit: ftdf_always_on_regmap_WakeUpEnable
4089  *
4090  * If set, the WakeUpIntThr is enabled to generate an interrupt.
4091  */
4092 #define IND_F_FTDF_ALWAYS_ON_REGMAP_WAKEUPENABLE IND_R_FTDF_ALWAYS_ON_REGMAP_WAKEUP_CONTROL
4093 #define MSK_F_FTDF_ALWAYS_ON_REGMAP_WAKEUPENABLE 0x2
4094 #define OFF_F_FTDF_ALWAYS_ON_REGMAP_WAKEUPENABLE 1
4095 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_ALWAYS_ON_REGMAP_WAKEUPENABLE 1
4096 /*
4097  *
4098  * Bit: ftdf_always_on_regmap_WakeupTimerEnable
4099  *
4100  * A '1' Enables the wakeup timer.
4101  * Note that in on_off_regmap, the register WakeupTimerEnableStatus shows the status of this register after being clocked by LP_CLK.
4102  * Checking this register can be used as indication for software that this bit is effective in the desing.
4103  */
4104 #define IND_F_FTDF_ALWAYS_ON_REGMAP_WAKEUPTIMERENABLE IND_R_FTDF_ALWAYS_ON_REGMAP_WAKEUP_CONTROL
4105 #define MSK_F_FTDF_ALWAYS_ON_REGMAP_WAKEUPTIMERENABLE 0x1
4106 #define OFF_F_FTDF_ALWAYS_ON_REGMAP_WAKEUPTIMERENABLE 0
4107 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_ALWAYS_ON_REGMAP_WAKEUPTIMERENABLE 1
4108 #else // dg_configBLACK_ORCA_IC_REV != BLACK_ORCA_IC_REV_A
4109 /*
4110  *
4111  * REGISTER: ftdf_retention_ram_tx_fifo
4112  *
4113  * Initialization value: none.
4114  * Access mode: C-RW (control - read/write)
4115  */
4116 #define IND_R_FTDF_RETENTION_RAM_TX_FIFO 0x40080000
4117 #define SIZE_R_FTDF_RETENTION_RAM_TX_FIFO 0x4
4118 #define MSK_R_FTDF_RETENTION_RAM_TX_FIFO 0xffffffff
4119 #define FTDF_RETENTION_RAM_TX_FIFO_NUM_1D 0x4
4120 #define FTDF_RETENTION_RAM_TX_FIFO_INTVL_1D 0x80
4121 #define FTDF_RETENTION_RAM_TX_FIFO_NUM_2D 0x20
4122 #define FTDF_RETENTION_RAM_TX_FIFO_INTVL_2D 0x4
4123 #define FTDF_RETENTION_RAM_TX_FIFO_NUM_1D 0x4
4124 #define FTDF_RETENTION_RAM_TX_FIFO_INTVL_1D 0x80
4125 #define FTDF_RETENTION_RAM_TX_FIFO_NUM_2D 0x20
4126 #define FTDF_RETENTION_RAM_TX_FIFO_INTVL_2D 0x4
4127 
4128 /*
4129  *
4130  * Field: ftdf_retention_ram_tx_fifo
4131  *
4132  * Transmit fifo buffer, contains 32 addresses per entry (32b x 32a = 128B). There are 4 entries supported.
4133  * Note that, despite the name, this fifo is NOT retained when the LMAC is put into deep-sleep!
4134  */
4135 #define IND_F_FTDF_RETENTION_RAM_TX_FIFO IND_R_FTDF_RETENTION_RAM_TX_FIFO
4136 #define MSK_F_FTDF_RETENTION_RAM_TX_FIFO 0xffffffff
4137 #define OFF_F_FTDF_RETENTION_RAM_TX_FIFO 0
4138 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_RETENTION_RAM_TX_FIFO 32
4139 
4140 /*
4141  *
4142  * REGISTER: ftdf_retention_ram_tx_meta_data_0
4143  *
4144  * Initialization value: none.
4145  * Access mode: C-RW (control - read/write)
4146  */
4147 #define IND_R_FTDF_RETENTION_RAM_TX_META_DATA_0 0x40080200
4148 #define SIZE_R_FTDF_RETENTION_RAM_TX_META_DATA_0 0x4
4149 #define MSK_R_FTDF_RETENTION_RAM_TX_META_DATA_0 0x57ffffff
4150 #define FTDF_RETENTION_RAM_TX_META_DATA_0_NUM 0x4
4151 #define FTDF_RETENTION_RAM_TX_META_DATA_0_INTVL 0x10
4152 #define FTDF_RETENTION_RAM_FRAME_LENGTH_NUM 0x4
4153 #define FTDF_RETENTION_RAM_FRAME_LENGTH_INTVL 0x10
4154 #define FTDF_RETENTION_RAM_PHYATTR_NUM 0x4
4155 #define FTDF_RETENTION_RAM_PHYATTR_INTVL 0x10
4156 #define FTDF_RETENTION_RAM_FRAMETYPE_NUM 0x4
4157 #define FTDF_RETENTION_RAM_FRAMETYPE_INTVL 0x10
4158 #define FTDF_RETENTION_RAM_CSMACA_ENA_NUM 0x4
4159 #define FTDF_RETENTION_RAM_CSMACA_ENA_INTVL 0x10
4160 #define FTDF_RETENTION_RAM_ACKREQUEST_NUM 0x4
4161 #define FTDF_RETENTION_RAM_ACKREQUEST_INTVL 0x10
4162 #define FTDF_RETENTION_RAM_CRC16_ENA_NUM 0x4
4163 #define FTDF_RETENTION_RAM_CRC16_ENA_INTVL 0x10
4164 
4165 /*
4166  *
4167  * Field: ftdf_retention_ram_frame_length
4168  *
4169  * Tx meta data per entry: Frame length (in bytes)
4170  */
4171 #define IND_F_FTDF_RETENTION_RAM_FRAME_LENGTH IND_R_FTDF_RETENTION_RAM_TX_META_DATA_0
4172 #define MSK_F_FTDF_RETENTION_RAM_FRAME_LENGTH 0x7f
4173 #define OFF_F_FTDF_RETENTION_RAM_FRAME_LENGTH 0
4174 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_RETENTION_RAM_FRAME_LENGTH 7
4175 /*
4176  *
4177  * Field: ftdf_retention_ram_phyAttr
4178  *
4179  * Tx meta data per entry: during the Tx-on phase, the control register phyRxAttr[16] sources the PHYATTR output signal to the DPHY.
4180  */
4181 #define IND_F_FTDF_RETENTION_RAM_PHYATTR IND_R_FTDF_RETENTION_RAM_TX_META_DATA_0
4182 #define MSK_F_FTDF_RETENTION_RAM_PHYATTR 0x7fff80
4183 #define OFF_F_FTDF_RETENTION_RAM_PHYATTR 7
4184 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_RETENTION_RAM_PHYATTR 16
4185 /*
4186  *
4187  * Field: ftdf_retention_ram_frametype
4188  *
4189  * Tx meta data per entry: the frame type of the data to be transmitted (Data/Cmd/Ack/wakeup frame/etc.).
4190  */
4191 #define IND_F_FTDF_RETENTION_RAM_FRAMETYPE IND_R_FTDF_RETENTION_RAM_TX_META_DATA_0
4192 #define MSK_F_FTDF_RETENTION_RAM_FRAMETYPE 0x3800000
4193 #define OFF_F_FTDF_RETENTION_RAM_FRAMETYPE 23
4194 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_RETENTION_RAM_FRAMETYPE 3
4195 /*
4196  *
4197  * Bit: ftdf_retention_ram_CsmaCa_ena
4198  *
4199  * Tx meta data per entry: '1' indicates that a CSMA-CA is required for the transmission of this packet.
4200  */
4201 #define IND_F_FTDF_RETENTION_RAM_CSMACA_ENA IND_R_FTDF_RETENTION_RAM_TX_META_DATA_0
4202 #define MSK_F_FTDF_RETENTION_RAM_CSMACA_ENA 0x4000000
4203 #define OFF_F_FTDF_RETENTION_RAM_CSMACA_ENA 26
4204 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_RETENTION_RAM_CSMACA_ENA 1
4205 /*
4206  *
4207  * Bit: ftdf_retention_ram_AckRequest
4208  *
4209  * Tx meta data per entry: '1' indicates that an acknowledge is expected from the recipient of this packet.
4210  */
4211 #define IND_F_FTDF_RETENTION_RAM_ACKREQUEST IND_R_FTDF_RETENTION_RAM_TX_META_DATA_0
4212 #define MSK_F_FTDF_RETENTION_RAM_ACKREQUEST 0x10000000
4213 #define OFF_F_FTDF_RETENTION_RAM_ACKREQUEST 28
4214 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_RETENTION_RAM_ACKREQUEST 1
4215 /*
4216  *
4217  * Bit: ftdf_retention_ram_CRC16_ena
4218  *
4219  * Tx meta data per entry: Indicates whether CRC16 insertion must be enabled or not.
4220  * 0 : No hardware inserted CRC16
4221  * 1 : Hardware inserts CRC16
4222  */
4223 #define IND_F_FTDF_RETENTION_RAM_CRC16_ENA IND_R_FTDF_RETENTION_RAM_TX_META_DATA_0
4224 #define MSK_F_FTDF_RETENTION_RAM_CRC16_ENA 0x40000000
4225 #define OFF_F_FTDF_RETENTION_RAM_CRC16_ENA 30
4226 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_RETENTION_RAM_CRC16_ENA 1
4227 
4228 /*
4229  *
4230  * REGISTER: ftdf_retention_ram_tx_meta_data_1
4231  *
4232  * Initialization value: none.
4233  * Access mode: C-RW (control - read/write)
4234  */
4235 #define IND_R_FTDF_RETENTION_RAM_TX_META_DATA_1 0x40080204
4236 #define SIZE_R_FTDF_RETENTION_RAM_TX_META_DATA_1 0x4
4237 #define MSK_R_FTDF_RETENTION_RAM_TX_META_DATA_1 0xff
4238 #define FTDF_RETENTION_RAM_TX_META_DATA_1_NUM 0x4
4239 #define FTDF_RETENTION_RAM_TX_META_DATA_1_INTVL 0x10

4241 #define FTDF_RETENTION_RAM_MACSN_INTVL 0x10

4275  */

4286  * Access mode: S-R (state - read)
4287  */
4288 #define IND_R_FTDF_RETENTION_RAM_TX_RETURN_STATUS_1 0x40080244
4289 #define SIZE_R_FTDF_RETENTION_RAM_TX_RETURN_STATUS_1 0x4
4290 #define MSK_R_FTDF_RETENTION_RAM_TX_RETURN_STATUS_1 0x1f
4291 #define FTDF_RETENTION_RAM_TX_RETURN_STATUS_1_NUM 0x4
4292 #define FTDF_RETENTION_RAM_TX_RETURN_STATUS_1_INTVL 0x10
4293 #define FTDF_RETENTION_RAM_ACKFAIL_NUM 0x4
4294 #define FTDF_RETENTION_RAM_ACKFAIL_INTVL 0x10
4295 #define FTDF_RETENTION_RAM_CSMACAFAIL_NUM 0x4

4298 #define FTDF_RETENTION_RAM_CSMACANRRETRIES_INTVL 0x10
4299 
4300 /*
4301  *
4302  * Bit: ftdf_retention_ram_AckFail
4303  *
4304  * Tx return status per entry: Acknowledgement status
4305  * 0 : SUCCESS
4306  * 1 : FAIL
4307  */
4308 #define IND_F_FTDF_RETENTION_RAM_ACKFAIL IND_R_FTDF_RETENTION_RAM_TX_RETURN_STATUS_1
4309 #define MSK_F_FTDF_RETENTION_RAM_ACKFAIL 0x1
4310 #define OFF_F_FTDF_RETENTION_RAM_ACKFAIL 0
4311 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_RETENTION_RAM_ACKFAIL 1
4312 /*
4313  *
4314  * Bit: ftdf_retention_ram_CsmaCaFail
4315  *
4316  * Tx return status per entry: CSMA-CA status
4317  * 0 : SUCCESS
4318  * 1 : FAIL
4319  */
4320 #define IND_F_FTDF_RETENTION_RAM_CSMACAFAIL IND_R_FTDF_RETENTION_RAM_TX_RETURN_STATUS_1
4321 #define MSK_F_FTDF_RETENTION_RAM_CSMACAFAIL 0x2
4322 #define OFF_F_FTDF_RETENTION_RAM_CSMACAFAIL 1
4323 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_RETENTION_RAM_CSMACAFAIL 1
4324 /*
4325  *
4326  * Field: ftdf_retention_ram_CsmaCaNrRetries
4327  *
4328  * Tx return status per entry: Number of CSMA-CA retries before this frame has been transmitted
4329  */
4330 #define IND_F_FTDF_RETENTION_RAM_CSMACANRRETRIES IND_R_FTDF_RETENTION_RAM_TX_RETURN_STATUS_1
4331 #define MSK_F_FTDF_RETENTION_RAM_CSMACANRRETRIES 0x1c
4332 #define OFF_F_FTDF_RETENTION_RAM_CSMACANRRETRIES 2
4333 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_RETENTION_RAM_CSMACANRRETRIES 3
4334 
4335 /*

4340  * Access mode: S-R (state - read)
4341  */
4342 #define IND_R_FTDF_RETENTION_RAM_RX_META_0 0x40080280
4343 #define SIZE_R_FTDF_RETENTION_RAM_RX_META_0 0x4
4344 #define MSK_R_FTDF_RETENTION_RAM_RX_META_0 0xffffffff
4345 #define FTDF_RETENTION_RAM_RX_META_0_NUM 0x8
