4348 #define FTDF_RETENTION_RAM_RX_TIMESTAMP_INTVL 0x10
4349 
4350 /*
4351  *
4352  * Field: ftdf_retention_ram_rx_timestamp
4353  *
4354  * Rx meta data per entry: Timestamp taken when frame was received
4355  */
4356 #define IND_F_FTDF_RETENTION_RAM_RX_TIMESTAMP IND_R_FTDF_RETENTION_RAM_RX_META_0
4357 #define MSK_F_FTDF_RETENTION_RAM_RX_TIMESTAMP 0xffffffff
4358 #define OFF_F_FTDF_RETENTION_RAM_RX_TIMESTAMP 0
4359 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_RETENTION_RAM_RX_TIMESTAMP 32
4360 
4361 /*
4362  *
4363  * REGISTER: ftdf_retention_ram_rx_meta_1
4364  *
4365  * Initialization value: none.
4366  * Access mode: S-R (state - read)
4367  */
4368 #define IND_R_FTDF_RETENTION_RAM_RX_META_1 0x40080284
4369 #define SIZE_R_FTDF_RETENTION_RAM_RX_META_1 0x4
4370 #define MSK_R_FTDF_RETENTION_RAM_RX_META_1 0xfffd
4371 #define FTDF_RETENTION_RAM_RX_META_1_NUM 0x8
4372 #define FTDF_RETENTION_RAM_RX_META_1_INTVL 0x10
4373 #define FTDF_RETENTION_RAM_CRC16_ERROR_NUM 0x8
4374 #define FTDF_RETENTION_RAM_CRC16_ERROR_INTVL 0x10
4375 #define FTDF_RETENTION_RAM_RES_FRM_TYPE_ERROR_NUM 0x8
4376 #define FTDF_RETENTION_RAM_RES_FRM_TYPE_ERROR_INTVL 0x10
4377 #define FTDF_RETENTION_RAM_RES_FRM_VERSION_ERROR_NUM 0x8
4378 #define FTDF_RETENTION_RAM_RES_FRM_VERSION_ERROR_INTVL 0x10
4379 #define FTDF_RETENTION_RAM_DPANID_ERROR_NUM 0x8
4380 #define FTDF_RETENTION_RAM_DPANID_ERROR_INTVL 0x10
4381 #define FTDF_RETENTION_RAM_DADDR_ERROR_NUM 0x8
4382 #define FTDF_RETENTION_RAM_DADDR_ERROR_INTVL 0x10
4383 #define FTDF_RETENTION_RAM_SPANID_ERROR_NUM 0x8
4384 #define FTDF_RETENTION_RAM_SPANID_ERROR_INTVL 0x10
4385 #define FTDF_RETENTION_RAM_ISPANID_COORD_ERROR_NUM 0x8
4386 #define FTDF_RETENTION_RAM_ISPANID_COORD_ERROR_INTVL 0x10
4387 #define FTDF_RETENTION_RAM_QUALITY_INDICATOR_NUM 0x8
4388 #define FTDF_RETENTION_RAM_QUALITY_INDICATOR_INTVL 0x10
4389 
4390 /*
4391  *
4392  * Bit: ftdf_retention_ram_crc16_error
4393  *
4394  * Rx meta data per entry: if set, a CRC error has occurred in this frame, applicable for transparent mode only
4395  */
4396 #define IND_F_FTDF_RETENTION_RAM_CRC16_ERROR IND_R_FTDF_RETENTION_RAM_RX_META_1
4397 #define MSK_F_FTDF_RETENTION_RAM_CRC16_ERROR 0x1
4398 #define OFF_F_FTDF_RETENTION_RAM_CRC16_ERROR 0
4399 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_RETENTION_RAM_CRC16_ERROR 1
4400 /*
4401  *
4402  * Bit: ftdf_retention_ram_res_frm_type_error
4403  *
4404  * Rx meta data per entry: if set to '1' this frame is a not supported frame type, applicable when frame is not discarded
4405  */
4406 #define IND_F_FTDF_RETENTION_RAM_RES_FRM_TYPE_ERROR IND_R_FTDF_RETENTION_RAM_RX_META_1
4407 #define MSK_F_FTDF_RETENTION_RAM_RES_FRM_TYPE_ERROR 0x4
4408 #define OFF_F_FTDF_RETENTION_RAM_RES_FRM_TYPE_ERROR 2
4409 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_RETENTION_RAM_RES_FRM_TYPE_ERROR 1
4410 /*
4411  *
4412  * Bit: ftdf_retention_ram_res_frm_version_error
4413  *
4414  * Rx meta data per entry: if set to '1' this frame is a not supported frame version, applicable when frame is not discarded.
4415  */
4416 #define IND_F_FTDF_RETENTION_RAM_RES_FRM_VERSION_ERROR IND_R_FTDF_RETENTION_RAM_RX_META_1
4417 #define MSK_F_FTDF_RETENTION_RAM_RES_FRM_VERSION_ERROR 0x8
4418 #define OFF_F_FTDF_RETENTION_RAM_RES_FRM_VERSION_ERROR 3
4419 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_RETENTION_RAM_RES_FRM_VERSION_ERROR 1
4420 /*
4421  *
4422  * Bit: ftdf_retention_ram_dpanid_error
4423  *
4424  * Rx meta data per entry: if set to '1', a destination PAN ID error has occurred, applicable when frame is not discarded
4425  */
4426 #define IND_F_FTDF_RETENTION_RAM_DPANID_ERROR IND_R_FTDF_RETENTION_RAM_RX_META_1
4427 #define MSK_F_FTDF_RETENTION_RAM_DPANID_ERROR 0x10
4428 #define OFF_F_FTDF_RETENTION_RAM_DPANID_ERROR 4
4429 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_RETENTION_RAM_DPANID_ERROR 1
4430 /*
4431  *
4432  * Bit: ftdf_retention_ram_daddr_error
4433  *
4434  * Rx meta data per entry: if set to '1', a destination Address error has occurred, applicable when frame is not discarded
4435  */
4436 #define IND_F_FTDF_RETENTION_RAM_DADDR_ERROR IND_R_FTDF_RETENTION_RAM_RX_META_1
4437 #define MSK_F_FTDF_RETENTION_RAM_DADDR_ERROR 0x20
4438 #define OFF_F_FTDF_RETENTION_RAM_DADDR_ERROR 5
4439 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_RETENTION_RAM_DADDR_ERROR 1
4440 /*
4441  *
4442  * Bit: ftdf_retention_ram_spanid_error
4443  *
4444  * Rx meta data per entry: if set to '1', a PAN ID error has occurred, applicable when frame is not discarded
4445  */
4446 #define IND_F_FTDF_RETENTION_RAM_SPANID_ERROR IND_R_FTDF_RETENTION_RAM_RX_META_1
4447 #define MSK_F_FTDF_RETENTION_RAM_SPANID_ERROR 0x40
4448 #define OFF_F_FTDF_RETENTION_RAM_SPANID_ERROR 6
4449 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_RETENTION_RAM_SPANID_ERROR 1
4450 /*
4451  *
4452  * Bit: ftdf_retention_ram_ispanid_coord_error
4453  *
4454  * Rx meta data per entry: if set to '1', the received frame is not for PAN coordinator, applicable when frame is not discarded
4455  */
4456 #define IND_F_FTDF_RETENTION_RAM_ISPANID_COORD_ERROR IND_R_FTDF_RETENTION_RAM_RX_META_1
4457 #define MSK_F_FTDF_RETENTION_RAM_ISPANID_COORD_ERROR 0x80
4458 #define OFF_F_FTDF_RETENTION_RAM_ISPANID_COORD_ERROR 7
4459 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_RETENTION_RAM_ISPANID_COORD_ERROR 1
4460 /*
4461  *
4462  * Field: ftdf_retention_ram_quality_indicator
4463  *
4464  * Rx meta data per entry: the Link Quality Indication value during reception of this frame.
4465  *
4466  * # $software_scratch@retention_ram
4467  * # TX ram not used by hardware, can be used by software as scratch ram with retention.
4468  */
4469 #define IND_F_FTDF_RETENTION_RAM_QUALITY_INDICATOR IND_R_FTDF_RETENTION_RAM_RX_META_1
4470 #define MSK_F_FTDF_RETENTION_RAM_QUALITY_INDICATOR 0xff00
4471 #define OFF_F_FTDF_RETENTION_RAM_QUALITY_INDICATOR 8
4472 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_RETENTION_RAM_QUALITY_INDICATOR 8
4473 
4474 /*
4475  *
4476  * REGISTER: ftdf_rx_ram_rx_fifo
4477  *
4478  * Initialization value: none.
4479  * Access mode: C-RW (control - read/write)
4480  */
4481 #define IND_R_FTDF_RX_RAM_RX_FIFO 0x40088000
4482 #define SIZE_R_FTDF_RX_RAM_RX_FIFO 0x4
4483 #define MSK_R_FTDF_RX_RAM_RX_FIFO 0xffffffff
4484 #define FTDF_RX_RAM_RX_FIFO_NUM_1D 0x8
4485 #define FTDF_RX_RAM_RX_FIFO_INTVL_1D 0x80
4486 #define FTDF_RX_RAM_RX_FIFO_NUM_2D 0x20
4487 #define FTDF_RX_RAM_RX_FIFO_INTVL_2D 0x4
4488 #define FTDF_RX_RAM_RX_FIFO_NUM_1D 0x8
4489 #define FTDF_RX_RAM_RX_FIFO_INTVL_1D 0x80
4490 #define FTDF_RX_RAM_RX_FIFO_NUM_2D 0x20
4491 #define FTDF_RX_RAM_RX_FIFO_INTVL_2D 0x4
4492 
4493 /*
4494  *
4495  * Field: ftdf_rx_ram_rx_fifo
4496  *
4497  * Receive fifo ram, contains 32 addresses per entry (32b x 32a = 128B). There are 8 entries supported.
4498  */
4499 #define IND_F_FTDF_RX_RAM_RX_FIFO IND_R_FTDF_RX_RAM_RX_FIFO
4500 #define MSK_F_FTDF_RX_RAM_RX_FIFO 0xffffffff
4501 #define OFF_F_FTDF_RX_RAM_RX_FIFO 0
4502 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_RX_RAM_RX_FIFO 32
4503 
4504 /*
4505  *
4506  * REGISTER: ftdf_on_off_regmap_Rel_Name
4507  *
4508  * Initialization value: none.
4509  * Access mode: S-R (state - read)
4510  */
4511 #define IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_REL_NAME 0x40090000
4512 #define SIZE_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_REL_NAME 0x4
4513 #define MSK_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_REL_NAME 0xffffffff
4514 #define FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_REL_NAME_NUM 0x4
4515 #define FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_REL_NAME_INTVL 0x4
4516 #define FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_REL_NAME_NUM 0x4
4517 #define FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_REL_NAME_INTVL 0x4
4518 
4519 /*
4520  *
4521  * Field: ftdf_on_off_regmap_Rel_Name
4522  *
4523  * A 4 words wide register, showing in ASCII the name of the release, eg. "ftdf_107".
4524  */
4525 #define IND_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_REL_NAME IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_REL_NAME
4526 #define MSK_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_REL_NAME 0xffffffff
4527 #define OFF_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_REL_NAME 0
4528 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_REL_NAME 32
4529 
4530 /*
4531  *
4532  * REGISTER: ftdf_on_off_regmap_BuildTime
4533  *
4534  * Initialization value: none.
4535  * Access mode: S-R (state - read)
4536  */
4537 #define IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_BUILDTIME 0x40090010
4538 #define SIZE_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_BUILDTIME 0x4
4539 #define MSK_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_BUILDTIME 0xffffffff
4540 #define FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_BUILDTIME_NUM 0x4
4541 #define FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_BUILDTIME_INTVL 0x4
4542 #define FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_BUILDTIME_NUM 0x4
4543 #define FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_BUILDTIME_INTVL 0x4
4544 
4545 /*
4546  *
4547  * Field: ftdf_on_off_regmap_BuildTime
4548  *
4549  * A 4 words wide register, showing in ASCII the build date (dd mmm yy) and time (hh:mm) of device, eg. "01 Dec 14 14:10 ".
4550  */
4551 #define IND_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_BUILDTIME IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_BUILDTIME
4552 #define MSK_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_BUILDTIME 0xffffffff
4553 #define OFF_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_BUILDTIME 0
4554 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_BUILDTIME 32
4555 
4556 /*
4557  *
4558  * REGISTER: ftdf_on_off_regmap_glob_control_0
4559  *
4560  * Initialization value: 0xff00 Initialization mask: 0x6ff0e
4561  * Access mode: C-RW (control - read/write)
4562  */
4563 #define IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_GLOB_CONTROL_0 0x40090020
4564 #define SIZE_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_GLOB_CONTROL_0 0x4
4565 #define MSK_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_GLOB_CONTROL_0 0x6ff0e
4566 
4567 /*
4568  *
4569  * Bit: ftdf_on_off_regmap_IsPANCoordinator
4570  *
4571  * Enable/disable receiver check on address fields (0=enabled, 1=disabled)
4572  */
4573 #define IND_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_ISPANCOORDINATOR IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_GLOB_CONTROL_0
4574 #define MSK_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_ISPANCOORDINATOR 0x2
4575 #define OFF_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_ISPANCOORDINATOR 1
4576 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_ISPANCOORDINATOR 1
4577 /*
4578  *
4579  * Bit: ftdf_on_off_regmap_rx_dma_req
4580  *
4581  * Source of the RX_DMA_REQ output pin of this block.
4582  */
4583 #define IND_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_RX_DMA_REQ IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_GLOB_CONTROL_0
4584 #define MSK_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_RX_DMA_REQ 0x4
4585 #define OFF_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_RX_DMA_REQ 2
4586 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_RX_DMA_REQ 1
4587 /*
4588  *
4589  * Bit: ftdf_on_off_regmap_tx_dma_req
4590  *
4591  * Source of the TX_DMA_REQ output pin of this block.
4592  */
4593 #define IND_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_TX_DMA_REQ IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_GLOB_CONTROL_0
4594 #define MSK_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_TX_DMA_REQ 0x8
4595 #define OFF_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_TX_DMA_REQ 3
4596 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_TX_DMA_REQ 1
4597 /*
4598  *
4599  * Field: ftdf_on_off_regmap_macSimpleAddress
4600  *
4601  * Simple address of the PAN coordinator
4602  */
4603 #define IND_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_MACSIMPLEADDRESS IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_GLOB_CONTROL_0
4604 #define MSK_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_MACSIMPLEADDRESS 0xff00
4605 #define OFF_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_MACSIMPLEADDRESS 8
4606 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_MACSIMPLEADDRESS 8
4607 /*
4608  *
4609  * Bit: ftdf_on_off_regmap_macLEenabled
4610  *
4611  * If set to '1', the Low Energy mode (also called CSL) is enabled
4612  */
4613 #define IND_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_MACLEENABLED IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_GLOB_CONTROL_0
4614 #define MSK_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_MACLEENABLED 0x20000
4615 #define OFF_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_MACLEENABLED 17
4616 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_MACLEENABLED 1
4617 /*
4618  *
4619  * Bit: ftdf_on_off_regmap_macTSCHenabled
4620  *
4621  * If set to '1', the TSCH mode is enabled
4622  */
4623 #define IND_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_MACTSCHENABLED IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_GLOB_CONTROL_0
4624 #define MSK_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_MACTSCHENABLED 0x40000
4625 #define OFF_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_MACTSCHENABLED 18
4626 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_MACTSCHENABLED 1
4627 
4628 /*
4629  *
4630  * REGISTER: ftdf_on_off_regmap_glob_control_1
4631  *
4632  * Initialization value: 0xffffffff Initialization mask: 0xffffffff
4633  * Access mode: C-RW (control - read/write)
4634  */
4635 #define IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_GLOB_CONTROL_1 0x40090024
4636 #define SIZE_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_GLOB_CONTROL_1 0x4
4637 #define MSK_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_GLOB_CONTROL_1 0xffffffff
4638 
4639 /*
4640  *
4641  * Field: ftdf_on_off_regmap_macPANId
4642  *
4643  * The PAN ID of this device.
4644  * The value 0xFFFF indicates that the device is not associated to a PAN.
4645  */
4646 #define IND_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_MACPANID IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_GLOB_CONTROL_1
4647 #define MSK_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_MACPANID 0xffff
4648 #define OFF_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_MACPANID 0
4649 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_MACPANID 16
4650 /*
4651  *
4652  * Field: ftdf_on_off_regmap_macShortAddress
4653  *
4654  * The short address of the device. The values 0xFFFF and 0xFFFE indicate that no IEEE Short Address is available.
4655  */
4656 #define IND_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_MACSHORTADDRESS IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_GLOB_CONTROL_1
4657 #define MSK_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_MACSHORTADDRESS 0xffff0000
4658 #define OFF_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_MACSHORTADDRESS 16
4659 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_MACSHORTADDRESS 16
4660 
4661 /*
4662  *
4663  * REGISTER: ftdf_on_off_regmap_glob_control_2
4664  *
4665  * Initialization value: 0xffffffff Initialization mask: 0xffffffff
4666  * Access mode: C-RW (control - read/write)
4667  */
4668 #define IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_GLOB_CONTROL_2 0x40090028
4669 #define SIZE_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_GLOB_CONTROL_2 0x4
4670 #define MSK_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_GLOB_CONTROL_2 0xffffffff
4671 
4672 /*
4673  *
4674  * Field: ftdf_on_off_regmap_aExtendedAddress_l
4675  *
4676  * Unique device address, 48 bits wide, lowest 32 bit
4677  */
4678 #define IND_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_AEXTENDEDADDRESS_L IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_GLOB_CONTROL_2
4679 #define MSK_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_AEXTENDEDADDRESS_L 0xffffffff
4680 #define OFF_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_AEXTENDEDADDRESS_L 0
4681 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_AEXTENDEDADDRESS_L 32
4682 
4683 /*
4684  *
4685  * REGISTER: ftdf_on_off_regmap_glob_control_3
4686  *
4687  * Initialization value: 0xffffffff Initialization mask: 0xffffffff
4688  * Access mode: C-RW (control - read/write)
4689  */
4690 #define IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_GLOB_CONTROL_3 0x4009002c
4691 #define SIZE_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_GLOB_CONTROL_3 0x4
4692 #define MSK_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_GLOB_CONTROL_3 0xffffffff
4693 
4694 /*
4695  *
4696  * Field: ftdf_on_off_regmap_aExtendedAddress_h
4697  *
4698  * Unique device address, 48 bits wide, highest 16 bit
4699  */
4700 #define IND_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_AEXTENDEDADDRESS_H IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_GLOB_CONTROL_3
4701 #define MSK_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_AEXTENDEDADDRESS_H 0xffffffff
4702 #define OFF_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_AEXTENDEDADDRESS_H 0
4703 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_AEXTENDEDADDRESS_H 32
4704 
4705 /*
4706  *
4707  * REGISTER: ftdf_on_off_regmap_lmac_control_0
4708  *
4709  * Initialization value: 0x0 Initialization mask: 0xfbfffffe
4710  * Access mode: C-RW (control - read/write)
4711  */
4712 #define IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMAC_CONTROL_0 0x40090030
4713 #define SIZE_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMAC_CONTROL_0 0x4
4714 #define MSK_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMAC_CONTROL_0 0xfbfffffe
4715 
4716 /*
4717  *
4718  * Field: ftdf_on_off_regmap_RxonDuration
4719  *
4720  * The time (in symbol periods) the Rx must be on after setting RxEnable to '1'.
4721  */
4722 #define IND_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_RXONDURATION IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMAC_CONTROL_0
4723 #define MSK_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_RXONDURATION 0x1fffffe
4724 #define OFF_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_RXONDURATION 1
4725 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_RXONDURATION 24
4726 /*
4727  *
4728  * Bit: ftdf_on_off_regmap_RxAlwaysOn
4729  *
4730  * If set to '1', the receiver shall be always on if RxEnable is set to '1'.
4731  */
4732 #define IND_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_RXALWAYSON IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMAC_CONTROL_0
4733 #define MSK_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_RXALWAYSON 0x2000000
4734 #define OFF_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_RXALWAYSON 25
4735 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_RXALWAYSON 1
4736 /*
4737  *
4738  * Field: ftdf_on_off_regmap_pti_rx
4739  *
4740  * This value will be used during receiving frames, during the auto ACK (when the AR bit is set in the received frame, see [FR0655] and further), a single CCA and ED scan.
4741  * In TSCH mode this register will be used during the time slot in which frames can be received and consequently an Enhanced ACK can be transmitted.
4742  */
4743 #define IND_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_PTI_RX IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMAC_CONTROL_0
4744 #define MSK_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_PTI_RX 0x78000000
4745 #define OFF_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_PTI_RX 27
4746 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_PTI_RX 4
4747 /*
4748  *
4749  * Bit: ftdf_on_off_regmap_keep_phy_en
4750  *
4751  * When the transmit or receive action is ready (LmacReady4Sleep is set), the PHY_EN signal is cleared unless the control register keep_phy_en is set to '1'.
4752  * When the control register keep_phy_en is set to '1', the signal PHY_EN shall remain being set until the keep_phy_en is cleared.
4753  * This will help control the behavior of the arbiter between the LMAC and the DPHY.
4754  */
4755 #define IND_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_KEEP_PHY_EN IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMAC_CONTROL_0
4756 #define MSK_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_KEEP_PHY_EN 0x80000000
4757 #define OFF_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_KEEP_PHY_EN 31
4758 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_KEEP_PHY_EN 1
4759 
4760 /*
4761  *
4762  * REGISTER: ftdf_on_off_regmap_TxPipePropDelay
4763  *
4764  * Initialization value: 0x0 Initialization mask: 0xff
4765  * Access mode: C-RW (control - read/write)
4766  */
4767 #define IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_TXPIPEPROPDELAY 0x40090034
4768 #define SIZE_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_TXPIPEPROPDELAY 0x4
4769 #define MSK_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_TXPIPEPROPDELAY 0xff
4770 
4771 /*
4772  *
4773  * Field: ftdf_on_off_regmap_TxPipePropDelay
4774  *
4775  * Propagation delay (in us) of the tx pipe, between start of transmission (indicated by setting tx_flag_status) to the DPHY.
4776  * The reset value is 0 us, which is also the closest value to the real implementation figure.
4777  */
4778 #define IND_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_TXPIPEPROPDELAY IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_TXPIPEPROPDELAY
4779 #define MSK_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_TXPIPEPROPDELAY 0xff
4780 #define OFF_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_TXPIPEPROPDELAY 0
4781 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_TXPIPEPROPDELAY 8
4782 
4783 /*
4784  *
4785  * REGISTER: ftdf_on_off_regmap_MacAckWaitDuration
4786  *
4787  * Initialization value: 0x36 Initialization mask: 0xff
4788  * Access mode: C-RW (control - read/write)
4789  */
4790 #define IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_MACACKWAITDURATION 0x40090038
4791 #define SIZE_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_MACACKWAITDURATION 0x4
4792 #define MSK_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_MACACKWAITDURATION 0xff
4793 
4794 /*
4795  *
4796  * Field: ftdf_on_off_regmap_MacAckWaitDuration
4797  *
4798  * Maximum time (in symbol periods) to wait for an ACK response after transmitting a frame with the AR bit set to '1'.
4799  * This value is used in the normal mode for the wait of an ACK response, irrespective if the ACK is a normal ACK or an Enhanced ACK.
4800  */
4801 #define IND_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_MACACKWAITDURATION IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_MACACKWAITDURATION
4802 #define MSK_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_MACACKWAITDURATION 0xff
4803 #define OFF_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_MACACKWAITDURATION 0
4804 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_MACACKWAITDURATION 8
4805 
4806 /*
4807  *
4808  * REGISTER: ftdf_on_off_regmap_MacEnhAckWaitDuration
4809  *
4810  * Initialization value: 0x360 Initialization mask: 0xffff
4811  * Access mode: C-RW (control - read/write)
4812  */
4813 #define IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_MACENHACKWAITDURATION 0x4009003c
4814 #define SIZE_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_MACENHACKWAITDURATION 0x4
4815 #define MSK_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_MACENHACKWAITDURATION 0xffff
4816 
4817 /*
4818  *
4819  * Field: ftdf_on_off_regmap_MacEnhAckWaitDuration
4820  *
4821  * Maximum time (in us) to wait for an Enhanced ACK response after transmitting a frame with the AR bit set to '1'.
4822  * This value is used in the LE/CSL mode for the wait of an ACK response (which is always an Enhanced ACK).
4823  */
4824 #define IND_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_MACENHACKWAITDURATION IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_MACENHACKWAITDURATION
4825 #define MSK_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_MACENHACKWAITDURATION 0xffff
4826 #define OFF_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_MACENHACKWAITDURATION 0
4827 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_MACENHACKWAITDURATION 16
4828 
4829 /*
4830  *
4831  * REGISTER: ftdf_on_off_regmap_lmac_control_1
4832  *
4833  * Initialization value: 0x0 Initialization mask: 0xffff
4834  * Access mode: C-RW (control - read/write)
4835  */
4836 #define IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMAC_CONTROL_1 0x40090040
4837 #define SIZE_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMAC_CONTROL_1 0x4
4838 #define MSK_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMAC_CONTROL_1 0xffff
4839 
4840 /*
4841  *
4842  * Field: ftdf_on_off_regmap_phyRxAttr
4843  *
4844  * Value of the PHYATTR bus to DPHY during Rx operation.
4845  */
4846 #define IND_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_PHYRXATTR IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMAC_CONTROL_1
4847 #define MSK_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_PHYRXATTR 0xffff
4848 #define OFF_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_PHYRXATTR 0
4849 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_PHYRXATTR 16
4850 
4851 /*
4852  *
4853  * REGISTER: ftdf_on_off_regmap_lmac_control_2
4854  *
4855  * Initialization value: 0x0 Initialization mask: 0xffffff01
4856  * Access mode: C-RW (control - read/write)
4857  */
4858 #define IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMAC_CONTROL_2 0x40090044
4859 #define SIZE_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMAC_CONTROL_2 0x4
4860 #define MSK_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMAC_CONTROL_2 0xffffff01
4861 
4862 /*
4863  *
4864  * Bit: ftdf_on_off_regmap_EdScanEnable
4865  *
4866  * If set to '1', the Energy Detect scan will be performed when RxEnable is set to '1' rather than starting a receive action.
4867  * The length of this scan is defined by EdScanDuration.
4868  */
4869 #define IND_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_EDSCANENABLE IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMAC_CONTROL_2
4870 #define MSK_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_EDSCANENABLE 0x1
4871 #define OFF_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_EDSCANENABLE 0
4872 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_EDSCANENABLE 1
4873 /*
4874  *
4875  * Field: ftdf_on_off_regmap_EdScanDuration
4876  *
4877  * The length of ED scan in symbol periods.
4878  */
4879 #define IND_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_EDSCANDURATION IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMAC_CONTROL_2
4880 #define MSK_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_EDSCANDURATION 0xffffff00
4881 #define OFF_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_EDSCANDURATION 8
4882 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_EDSCANDURATION 24
4883 
4884 /*
4885  *
4886  * REGISTER: ftdf_on_off_regmap_lmac_control_3
4887  *
4888  * Initialization value: 0x70004c4 Initialization mask: 0xfffffff
4889  * Access mode: C-RW (control - read/write)
4890  */
4891 #define IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMAC_CONTROL_3 0x40090048
4892 #define SIZE_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMAC_CONTROL_3 0x4
4893 #define MSK_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMAC_CONTROL_3 0xfffffff
4894 
4895 /*
4896  *
4897  * Field: ftdf_on_off_regmap_macMaxFrameTotalWaitTime
4898  *
4899  * Max time to wait (in symbol periods) for a requested Data Frame or an announced broadcast frame, triggered by the FP bit in the received frame was set to '1'.
4900  */
4901 #define IND_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_MACMAXFRAMETOTALWAITTIME IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMAC_CONTROL_3
4902 #define MSK_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_MACMAXFRAMETOTALWAITTIME 0xffff
4903 #define OFF_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_MACMAXFRAMETOTALWAITTIME 0
4904 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_MACMAXFRAMETOTALWAITTIME 16
4905 /*
4906  *
4907  * Field: ftdf_on_off_regmap_CcaIdleWait
4908  *
4909  * Time to wait (in us) after CCA returned "medium idle" before starting TX-ON.
4910  * Notes:
4911  * 1) extra wait times are involved before a packet is really transmitted, see the relevant timing figures.
4912  * 2) not applicable in TSCH mode since there macTSRxTx shall be used.
4913  */
4914 #define IND_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_CCAIDLEWAIT IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMAC_CONTROL_3
4915 #define MSK_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_CCAIDLEWAIT 0xff0000
4916 #define OFF_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_CCAIDLEWAIT 16
4917 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_CCAIDLEWAIT 8
4918 /*
4919  *
4920  * Bit: ftdf_on_off_regmap_Addr_tab_match_FP_value
4921  *
4922  * In case the received source address matches with one of the Exp_SA registers, the value of the control register Addr_tap_match_FP_value will be inserted on the position of the FP bit.
4923  * In case there is no match found, the inverse value of Addr_tap_match_FP_value will be inserted.
4924  */
4925 #define IND_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_ADDR_TAB_MATCH_FP_VALUE IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMAC_CONTROL_3
4926 #define MSK_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_ADDR_TAB_MATCH_FP_VALUE 0x1000000
4927 #define OFF_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_ADDR_TAB_MATCH_FP_VALUE 24
4928 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_ADDR_TAB_MATCH_FP_VALUE 1
4929 /*
4930  *
4931  * Bit: ftdf_on_off_regmap_FP_override
4932  *
4933  * In case the control register FP_override is set, the value of the control register FP_force_value will always be the value of the FP bit in the automatic ACK response frame.
4934  */
4935 #define IND_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_FP_OVERRIDE IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMAC_CONTROL_3
4936 #define MSK_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_FP_OVERRIDE 0x2000000
4937 #define OFF_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_FP_OVERRIDE 25
4938 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_FP_OVERRIDE 1
4939 /*
4940  *
4941  * Bit: ftdf_on_off_regmap_FP_force_value
4942  *
4943  * In case the control register FP_override is set, the value of the control register FP_force_value will always be the value of the FP bit in the automatic ACK response frame.
4944  */
4945 #define IND_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_FP_FORCE_VALUE IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMAC_CONTROL_3
4946 #define MSK_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_FP_FORCE_VALUE 0x4000000
4947 #define OFF_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_FP_FORCE_VALUE 26
4948 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_FP_FORCE_VALUE 1
4949 /*
4950  *
4951  * Bit: ftdf_on_off_regmap_FTDF_LPDP_Enable
4952  *
4953  * If set, not only is FP_override and SA matching done on data_request frames but to all command and data frame types (in normal mode)
4954  */
4955 #define IND_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_FTDF_LPDP_ENABLE IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMAC_CONTROL_3
4956 #define MSK_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_FTDF_LPDP_ENABLE 0x8000000
4957 #define OFF_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_FTDF_LPDP_ENABLE 27
4958 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_FTDF_LPDP_ENABLE 1
4959 
4960 /*
4961  *
4962  * REGISTER: ftdf_on_off_regmap_lmac_control_os
4963  *
4964  * Initialization value: 0x0 Initialization mask: 0x1f
4965  * Access mode: OS-W (one-shot - write)
4966  */
4967 #define IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMAC_CONTROL_OS 0x40090050
4968 #define SIZE_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMAC_CONTROL_OS 0x4
4969 #define MSK_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMAC_CONTROL_OS 0x1f
4970 
4971 /*
4972  *
4973  * Bit: ftdf_on_off_regmap_getGeneratorVal
4974  *
4975  * If set to '1', the current values of the Wake-up (event) counter/generator (EventCurrVal) and Timestamp (symbol) counter/generator (TimeStampCurrVal and TimeStampCurrPhaseVal) will be captured.
4976  * Note that this capture actually has been done when getGeneratorVal_e is set (assuming it was cleared in advance).
4977  */
4978 #define IND_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_GETGENERATORVAL IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMAC_CONTROL_OS
4979 #define MSK_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_GETGENERATORVAL 0x1
4980 #define OFF_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_GETGENERATORVAL 0
4981 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_GETGENERATORVAL 1
4982 /*
4983  *
4984  * Bit: ftdf_on_off_regmap_RxEnable
4985  *
4986  * If set, receiving data may be done
4987  */
4988 #define IND_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_RXENABLE IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMAC_CONTROL_OS
4989 #define MSK_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_RXENABLE 0x2
4990 #define OFF_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_RXENABLE 1
4991 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_RXENABLE 1
4992 /*
4993  *
4994  * Bit: ftdf_on_off_regmap_SingleCCA
4995  *
4996  * If set to '1', a single CCA will be performed.
4997  * This can be used when e.g. the TSCH timing is not performed by the LMAC but completely by software.
4998  */
4999 #define IND_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_SINGLECCA IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMAC_CONTROL_OS
5000 #define MSK_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_SINGLECCA 0x4
5001 #define OFF_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_SINGLECCA 2
5002 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_SINGLECCA 1
5003 /*
5004  *
5005  * Bit: ftdf_on_off_regmap_Csma_Ca_resume_set
5006  *
5007  * If set, Csma_Ca_resume_stat is set
5008  */
5009 #define IND_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_CSMA_CA_RESUME_SET IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMAC_CONTROL_OS
5010 #define MSK_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_CSMA_CA_RESUME_SET 0x8
5011 #define OFF_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_CSMA_CA_RESUME_SET 3
5012 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_CSMA_CA_RESUME_SET 1
5013 /*
5014  *
5015  * Bit: ftdf_on_off_regmap_Csma_Ca_resume_clear
5016  *
5017  * If set, Csma_Ca_resume_stat is cleared
5018  */
5019 #define IND_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_CSMA_CA_RESUME_CLEAR IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMAC_CONTROL_OS
5020 #define MSK_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_CSMA_CA_RESUME_CLEAR 0x10
5021 #define OFF_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_CSMA_CA_RESUME_CLEAR 4
5022 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_CSMA_CA_RESUME_CLEAR 1
5023 
5024 /*
5025  *
5026  * REGISTER: ftdf_on_off_regmap_lmac_control_status
5027  *
5028  * Initialization value: none.
5029  * Access mode: S-R (state - read)
5030  */
5031 #define IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMAC_CONTROL_STATUS 0x40090054
5032 #define SIZE_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMAC_CONTROL_STATUS 0x4
5033 #define MSK_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMAC_CONTROL_STATUS 0xff0fff46
5034 
5035 /*
5036  *
5037  * Bit: ftdf_on_off_regmap_LmacReady4sleep
5038  *
5039  * If set to '1' this register indicates that the LMAC is ready to go to sleep.
5040  */
5041 #define IND_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMACREADY4SLEEP IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMAC_CONTROL_STATUS
5042 #define MSK_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMACREADY4SLEEP 0x2
5043 #define OFF_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMACREADY4SLEEP 1
5044 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMACREADY4SLEEP 1
5045 /*
5046  *
5047  * Bit: ftdf_on_off_regmap_CCAStat
5048  *
5049  * The value of a single CCA, valid when CCAstat_e is set to '1'.
5050  */
5051 #define IND_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_CCASTAT IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMAC_CONTROL_STATUS
5052 #define MSK_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_CCASTAT 0x4
5053 #define OFF_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_CCASTAT 2
5054 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_CCASTAT 1
5055 /*
5056  *
5057  * Bit: ftdf_on_off_regmap_WakeupTimerEnableStatus
5058  *
5059  * Status of WakeupTimerEnable after being clocked by LP_CLK (showing it's effective value).
5060  * WakeupTimerEnableStatus can be set by setting the one-shot register WakeupTimerEnable_set and cleared by setting the one-shot register WakeupTimerEnable_clear.
5061  * When WakeupTimerEnableStatus is set (after being cleared), the event counter will be reset to 0x0.
5062  *
5063  * This status can be used by software since WakeupTimerEnable is used in the slow LP_CLK area.
5064  * Rather than waiting for a certain number of LP_CLK periods, simply scanning this status (or enable the interrupt created by WakeupTimerEnableStatus_e) will allow software to determine if this signal has been effected.
5065  * Note that the rising edge of WakeupTimerEnable will reset the Wake-up (event) counter.
5066  */
5067 #define IND_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_WAKEUPTIMERENABLESTATUS IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMAC_CONTROL_STATUS
5068 #define MSK_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_WAKEUPTIMERENABLESTATUS 0x40
5069 #define OFF_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_WAKEUPTIMERENABLESTATUS 6
5070 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_WAKEUPTIMERENABLESTATUS 1
5071 /*
5072  *
5073  * Field: ftdf_on_off_regmap_EdScanValue
5074  *
5075  * The result of an ED scan.
5076  */
5077 #define IND_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_EDSCANVALUE IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMAC_CONTROL_STATUS
5078 #define MSK_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_EDSCANVALUE 0xff00
5079 #define OFF_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_EDSCANVALUE 8
5080 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_EDSCANVALUE 8
5081 /*
5082  *
5083  * Field: ftdf_on_off_regmap_Csma_Ca_NB_stat
5084  *
5085  * Current status of the Number of Backoffs.
5086  */
5087 #define IND_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_CSMA_CA_NB_STAT IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMAC_CONTROL_STATUS
5088 #define MSK_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_CSMA_CA_NB_STAT 0x70000
5089 #define OFF_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_CSMA_CA_NB_STAT 16
5090 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_CSMA_CA_NB_STAT 3
5091 /*
5092  *
5093  * Bit: ftdf_on_off_regmap_Csma_Ca_resume_stat
5094  *
5095  * In case Csma_Ca_resume_stat is set the LMAC will
5096  * - use the value of Csma_Ca_NB_val in the CSMA-CA process rather than the initial value 0d.
5097  * - immediately perform CCA after the sleep, not waiting for the backoff time.
5098  * - reset Csma_Ca_resume_stat when it resumes CSMA-CA after the sleep.
5099  */
5100 #define IND_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_CSMA_CA_RESUME_STAT IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMAC_CONTROL_STATUS
5101 #define MSK_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_CSMA_CA_RESUME_STAT 0x80000
5102 #define OFF_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_CSMA_CA_RESUME_STAT 19
5103 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_CSMA_CA_RESUME_STAT 1
5104 /*
5105  *
5106  * Field: ftdf_on_off_regmap_Csma_Ca_BO_stat
5107  *
5108  * The value of the currently calculated BackOff value. To be used for the sleep time calculation in case of sleep during the BackOff time.
5109  */
5110 #define IND_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_CSMA_CA_BO_STAT IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMAC_CONTROL_STATUS
5111 #define MSK_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_CSMA_CA_BO_STAT 0xff000000
5112 #define OFF_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_CSMA_CA_BO_STAT 24
5113 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_CSMA_CA_BO_STAT 8
5114 
5115 /*
5116  *
5117  * REGISTER: ftdf_on_off_regmap_EventCurrVal
5118  *
5119  * Initialization value: none.
5120  * Access mode: S-R (state - read)
5121  */
5122 #define IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_EVENTCURRVAL 0x40090058
5123 #define SIZE_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_EVENTCURRVAL 0x4
5124 #define MSK_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_EVENTCURRVAL 0x1ffffff
5125 
5126 /*
5127  *
5128  * Field: ftdf_on_off_regmap_EventCurrVal
5129  *
5130  * The value of the captured Event generator (Wake-up counter) (initiated by getGeneratorVal, valid when getGeneratorVal_e is set).
5131  */
5132 #define IND_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_EVENTCURRVAL IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_EVENTCURRVAL
5133 #define MSK_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_EVENTCURRVAL 0x1ffffff
5134 #define OFF_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_EVENTCURRVAL 0
5135 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_EVENTCURRVAL 25
5136 
5137 /*
5138  *
5139  * REGISTER: ftdf_on_off_regmap_TimeStampCurrVal
5140  *
5141  * Initialization value: none.
5142  * Access mode: S-R (state - read)
5143  */
5144 #define IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_TIMESTAMPCURRVAL 0x4009005c
5145 #define SIZE_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_TIMESTAMPCURRVAL 0x4
5146 #define MSK_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_TIMESTAMPCURRVAL 0xffffffff
5147 
5148 /*
5149  *
5150  * Field: ftdf_on_off_regmap_TimeStampCurrVal
5151  *
5152  * The value of captured timestamp generator (symbol counter) (initiated by getGeneratorVal, valid when getGeneratorVal_e is set)
5153  */
5154 #define IND_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_TIMESTAMPCURRVAL IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_TIMESTAMPCURRVAL
5155 #define MSK_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_TIMESTAMPCURRVAL 0xffffffff
5156 #define OFF_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_TIMESTAMPCURRVAL 0
5157 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_TIMESTAMPCURRVAL 32
5158 
5159 /*
5160  *
5161  * REGISTER: ftdf_on_off_regmap_TimeStampCurrPhaseVal
5162  *
5163  * Initialization value: none.
5164  * Access mode: S-R (state - read)
5165  */
5166 #define IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_TIMESTAMPCURRPHASEVAL 0x40090074
5167 #define SIZE_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_TIMESTAMPCURRPHASEVAL 0x4
5168 #define MSK_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_TIMESTAMPCURRPHASEVAL 0xff
5169 
5170 /*
5171  *
5172  * Field: ftdf_on_off_regmap_TimeStampCurrPhaseVal
5173  *
5174  * Value of captured timestamp generator phase within a symbol (initiated by getGeneratorVal, valid when getGeneratorVal_e is set)
5175  */
5176 #define IND_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_TIMESTAMPCURRPHASEVAL IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_TIMESTAMPCURRPHASEVAL
5177 #define MSK_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_TIMESTAMPCURRPHASEVAL 0xff
5178 #define OFF_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_TIMESTAMPCURRPHASEVAL 0
5179 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_TIMESTAMPCURRPHASEVAL 8
5180 
5181 /*
5182  *
5183  * REGISTER: ftdf_on_off_regmap_macTSTxAckDelayVal
5184  *
5185  * Initialization value: none.
5186  * Access mode: S-R (state - read)
5187  */
5188 #define IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_MACTSTXACKDELAYVAL 0x40090078
5189 #define SIZE_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_MACTSTXACKDELAYVAL 0x4
5190 #define MSK_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_MACTSTXACKDELAYVAL 0xffff
5191 
5192 /*
5193  *
5194  * Field: ftdf_on_off_regmap_macTSTxAckDelayVal
5195  *
5196  * The time (in us) left until the ack frame is sent by the lmac.
5197  * This can be used by software to determine if there is enough time left to send the, by software created, Enhanced ACK frame.
5198  */
5199 #define IND_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_MACTSTXACKDELAYVAL IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_MACTSTXACKDELAYVAL
5200 #define MSK_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_MACTSTXACKDELAYVAL 0xffff
5201 #define OFF_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_MACTSTXACKDELAYVAL 0
5202 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_MACTSTXACKDELAYVAL 16
5203 
5204 /*
5205  *
5206  * REGISTER: ftdf_on_off_regmap_lmac_control_4
5207  *
5208  * Initialization value: 0x0 Initialization mask: 0xffffffff
5209  * Access mode: C-RW (control - read/write)
5210  */
5211 #define IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMAC_CONTROL_4 0x40090060
5212 #define SIZE_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMAC_CONTROL_4 0x4
5213 #define MSK_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMAC_CONTROL_4 0xffffffff
5214 
5215 /*
5216  *
5217  * Field: ftdf_on_off_regmap_phySleepWait
5218  *
5219  * The minume time (in us) required between the clear to '0' and set to '1' of PHY_EN.
5220  * When the signal PHY_EN is deasserted, it will not be asserted within the time phySleepWait.
5221  */
5222 #define IND_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_PHYSLEEPWAIT IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMAC_CONTROL_4
5223 #define MSK_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_PHYSLEEPWAIT 0xff
5224 #define OFF_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_PHYSLEEPWAIT 0
5225 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_PHYSLEEPWAIT 8
5226 /*
5227  *
5228  * Field: ftdf_on_off_regmap_RxPipePropDelay
5229  *
5230  * The control register RxPipePropDelay indicates the propagation delay in ~s of the Rx pipeline between the last symbol being captured at the DPHY interface and the "data valid" indication to the LMAC controller.
5231  */
5232 #define IND_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_RXPIPEPROPDELAY IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMAC_CONTROL_4
5233 #define MSK_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_RXPIPEPROPDELAY 0xff00
5234 #define OFF_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_RXPIPEPROPDELAY 8
5235 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_RXPIPEPROPDELAY 8
5236 /*
5237  *
5238  * Field: ftdf_on_off_regmap_phyAckAttr
5239  *
5240  * During transmission of an ACK frame, phyAckAttr is used as PHYATTR on the DPHY interface.
5241  */
5242 #define IND_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_PHYACKATTR IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMAC_CONTROL_4
5243 #define MSK_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_PHYACKATTR 0xffff0000
5244 #define OFF_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_PHYACKATTR 16
5245 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_PHYACKATTR 16
5246 
5247 /*
5248  *
5249  * REGISTER: ftdf_on_off_regmap_lmac_control_5
5250  *
5251  * Initialization value: 0x8c0 Initialization mask: 0xffff0fff
5252  * Access mode: C-RW (control - read/write)
5253  */
5254 #define IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMAC_CONTROL_5 0x40090064
5255 #define SIZE_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMAC_CONTROL_5 0x4
5256 #define MSK_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMAC_CONTROL_5 0xffff0fff
5257 
5258 /*
5259  *
5260  * Field: ftdf_on_off_regmap_Ack_Response_Delay
5261  *
5262  * In order to have some flexibility the control register Ack_Response_Delay indicates the Acknowledge response time in ~s.
5263  * The default value shall is 192 ~s (12 symbols).
5264  */
5265 #define IND_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_ACK_RESPONSE_DELAY IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMAC_CONTROL_5
5266 #define MSK_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_ACK_RESPONSE_DELAY 0xff
5267 #define OFF_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_ACK_RESPONSE_DELAY 0
5268 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_ACK_RESPONSE_DELAY 8
5269 /*
5270  *
5271  * Field: ftdf_on_off_regmap_CcaStatWait
5272  *
5273  * The output CCASTAT is valid after 8 symbols + phyRxStartup.
5274  * The 8 symbols are programmable by control registerCcaStatWait (in symbol periods).
5275  * Default value is 8d.
5276  */
5277 #define IND_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_CCASTATWAIT IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMAC_CONTROL_5
5278 #define MSK_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_CCASTATWAIT 0xf00
5279 #define OFF_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_CCASTATWAIT 8
5280 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_CCASTATWAIT 4
5281 /*
5282  *
5283  * Field: ftdf_on_off_regmap_phyCsmaCaAttr
5284  *
5285  * During CSMA-CA or CCA, the control register phyCsmaCaAttr is used to source PHYATT on the DPHY interface.
5286  */
5287 #define IND_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_PHYCSMACAATTR IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMAC_CONTROL_5
5288 #define MSK_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_PHYCSMACAATTR 0xffff0000
5289 #define OFF_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_PHYCSMACAATTR 16
5290 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_PHYCSMACAATTR 16
5291 
5292 /*
5293  *
5294  * REGISTER: ftdf_on_off_regmap_lmac_control_6
5295  *
5296  * Initialization value: 0xc0c28 Initialization mask: 0xffffff
5297  * Access mode: C-RW (control - read/write)
5298  */
5299 #define IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMAC_CONTROL_6 0x40090068
5300 #define SIZE_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMAC_CONTROL_6 0x4
5301 #define MSK_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMAC_CONTROL_6 0xffffff
5302 
5303 /*
5304  *
5305  * Field: ftdf_on_off_regmap_LifsPeriod
5306  *
5307  * The Long IFS period is programmable by LifsPeriod (in symbols).
5308  * The default is 40 symbols (640 us),
5309  */
5310 #define IND_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LIFSPERIOD IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMAC_CONTROL_6
5311 #define MSK_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LIFSPERIOD 0xff
5312 #define OFF_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LIFSPERIOD 0
5313 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LIFSPERIOD 8
5314 /*
5315  *
5316  * Field: ftdf_on_off_regmap_SifsPeriod
5317  *
5318  * The Short IFS period is programmable by SifsPeriod (in symbols).
5319  * The default is 12 symbols (192 is).
5320  */
5321 #define IND_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_SIFSPERIOD IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMAC_CONTROL_6
5322 #define MSK_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_SIFSPERIOD 0xff00
5323 #define OFF_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_SIFSPERIOD 8
5324 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_SIFSPERIOD 8
5325 /*
5326  *
5327  * Field: ftdf_on_off_regmap_WUifsPeriod
5328  *
5329  * The WakeUp IFS period is programmable by WUifsPeriod (in symbols).
5330  * The default is 12 symbols (192 us).
5331  */
5332 #define IND_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_WUIFSPERIOD IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMAC_CONTROL_6
5333 #define MSK_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_WUIFSPERIOD 0xff0000
5334 #define OFF_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_WUIFSPERIOD 16
5335 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_WUIFSPERIOD 8
5336 
5337 /*
5338  *
5339  * REGISTER: ftdf_on_off_regmap_lmac_control_11
5340  *
5341  * Initialization value: 0xff000000 Initialization mask: 0xff0fffff
5342  * Access mode: C-RW (control - read/write)
5343  */
5344 #define IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMAC_CONTROL_11 0x4009006c
5345 #define SIZE_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMAC_CONTROL_11 0x4
5346 #define MSK_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMAC_CONTROL_11 0xff0fffff
5347 
5348 /*
5349  *
5350  * Field: ftdf_on_off_regmap_macRxTotalCycleTime
5351  *
5352  * In CSL mode it can be decided to disable the PHY Rx (Rx-off) after reception of a Wake-up frame and enable the PHY Rx (Rx-on) when the data frame is to be expected, based on the received RZ time.
5353  * In order to make it easier to calculate if it is efficient to switch to Rx-off and Rx-on again, a control register indicates the time needed to disable and enable the PHY Rx: macRxTotalCycleTime (resolution is 10 symbol periods)
5354  */
5355 #define IND_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_MACRXTOTALCYCLETIME IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMAC_CONTROL_11
5356 #define MSK_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_MACRXTOTALCYCLETIME 0xffff
5357 #define OFF_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_MACRXTOTALCYCLETIME 0
5358 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_MACRXTOTALCYCLETIME 16
5359 /*
5360  *
5361  * Bit: ftdf_on_off_regmap_macDisCaRxOfftoRZ
5362  *
5363  * The switching off and on of the PHY Rx (see macRxTotalCycleTime) can be disabled whith the control register macDisCaRxOfftoRZ.
5364  * 0 : Disabled
5365  * 1 : Enabled
5366  */
5367 #define IND_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_MACDISCARXOFFTORZ IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMAC_CONTROL_11
5368 #define MSK_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_MACDISCARXOFFTORZ 0x10000
5369 #define OFF_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_MACDISCARXOFFTORZ 16
5370 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_MACDISCARXOFFTORZ 1
5371 /*
5372  *
5373  * Field: ftdf_on_off_regmap_Csma_Ca_NB_val
5374  *
5375  * Number of backoffs value in case of a CSMA-CA resume action.
5376  */
5377 #define IND_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_CSMA_CA_NB_VAL IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMAC_CONTROL_11
5378 #define MSK_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_CSMA_CA_NB_VAL 0xe0000
5379 #define OFF_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_CSMA_CA_NB_VAL 17
5380 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_CSMA_CA_NB_VAL 3
5381 /*
5382  *
5383  * Field: ftdf_on_off_regmap_Csma_Ca_BO_threshold
5384  *
5385  * If the backoff time calculated in the CSMA-CA procedure as described in [FR3280] is equal to or higher than the control register Csma_Ca_BO_threshold[8] (resolution 320us, see [FR3290]) the event register Csma_Ca_BO_thr_e will be set and an interrupt.
5386  * In case Csma_Ca_BO_threshold equals 0xFF no check will be performed and consequently Csma_Ca_BO_thr_e will not be set and no interrupt will be generated.
5387  */
5388 #define IND_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_CSMA_CA_BO_THRESHOLD IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMAC_CONTROL_11
5389 #define MSK_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_CSMA_CA_BO_THRESHOLD 0xff000000
5390 #define OFF_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_CSMA_CA_BO_THRESHOLD 24
5391 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_CSMA_CA_BO_THRESHOLD 8
5392 
5393 /*
5394  *
5395  * REGISTER: ftdf_on_off_regmap_lmac_control_delta
5396  *
5397  * Initialization value: 0x0 Initialization mask: 0x7e
5398  * Access mode: D-RCW (delta read/clear on write 1)
5399  */
5400 #define IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMAC_CONTROL_DELTA 0x40090070
5401 #define SIZE_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMAC_CONTROL_DELTA 0x4
5402 #define MSK_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMAC_CONTROL_DELTA 0x7e
5403 
5404 /*
5405  *
5406  * Bit: ftdf_on_off_regmap_LmacReady4sleep_d
5407  *
5408  * Delta bit for register "LmacReady4sleep".
5409  * This delta bit is set to '1' on each change of this status, contributes to ftdf_ce[3].
5410  */
5411 #define IND_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMACREADY4SLEEP_D IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMAC_CONTROL_DELTA
5412 #define MSK_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMACREADY4SLEEP_D 0x2
5413 #define OFF_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMACREADY4SLEEP_D 1
5414 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMACREADY4SLEEP_D 1
5415 /*
5416  *
5417  * Bit: ftdf_on_off_regmap_SyncTimeStamp_e
5418  *
5419  * The SyncTimeStamp_e event is set to '1' when the TimeStampgenerator is loaded with SyncTimeStampVal.
5420  * This occurs at the rising edge of lp_clk when SyncTimeStampEna is set and the value of the Event generator is equal to the value SyncTimestampThr.
5421  * This event bit contributes to ftdf_ce[3].
5422  */
5423 #define IND_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_SYNCTIMESTAMP_E IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMAC_CONTROL_DELTA
5424 #define MSK_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_SYNCTIMESTAMP_E 0x4
5425 #define OFF_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_SYNCTIMESTAMP_E 2
5426 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_SYNCTIMESTAMP_E 1
5427 /*
5428  *
5429  * Bit: ftdf_on_off_regmap_SymbolTimeThr_e
5430  *
5431  * Event, set to '1' when the symboltime counter matched SymbolTimeThr
5432  * This event bit contributes to ftdf_ce[3].
5433  */
5434 #define IND_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_SYMBOLTIMETHR_E IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMAC_CONTROL_DELTA
5435 #define MSK_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_SYMBOLTIMETHR_E 0x8
5436 #define OFF_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_SYMBOLTIMETHR_E 3
5437 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_SYMBOLTIMETHR_E 1
5438 /*
5439  *
5440  * Bit: ftdf_on_off_regmap_SymbolTime2Thr_e
5441  *
5442  * Event, set to '1' when the symboltime counter matched SymbolTime2Thr
5443  * This event bit contributes to ftdf_ce[3].
5444  */
5445 #define IND_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_SYMBOLTIME2THR_E IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMAC_CONTROL_DELTA
5446 #define MSK_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_SYMBOLTIME2THR_E 0x10
5447 #define OFF_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_SYMBOLTIME2THR_E 4
5448 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_SYMBOLTIME2THR_E 1
5449 /*
5450  *
5451  * Bit: ftdf_on_off_regmap_getGeneratorVal_e
5452  *
5453  * Event, set to '1' to indicate that the the getGeneratorVal request is completed.
5454  * This event bit contributes to ftdf_ce[3].
5455  */
5456 #define IND_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_GETGENERATORVAL_E IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMAC_CONTROL_DELTA
5457 #define MSK_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_GETGENERATORVAL_E 0x20
5458 #define OFF_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_GETGENERATORVAL_E 5
5459 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_GETGENERATORVAL_E 1
5460 /*
5461  *
5462  * Bit: ftdf_on_off_regmap_WakeupTimerEnableStatus_d
5463  *
5464  * Delta which indicates that WakeupTimerEnableStatus has changed
5465  * This delta bit is set to '1' on each change of this status, contributes to ftdf_ce[3].
5466  */
5467 #define IND_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_WAKEUPTIMERENABLESTATUS_D IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMAC_CONTROL_DELTA
5468 #define MSK_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_WAKEUPTIMERENABLESTATUS_D 0x40
5469 #define OFF_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_WAKEUPTIMERENABLESTATUS_D 6
5470 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_WAKEUPTIMERENABLESTATUS_D 1
5471 
5472 /*
5473  *
5474  * REGISTER: ftdf_on_off_regmap_lmac_control_mask
5475  *
5476  * Initialization value: 0x0 Initialization mask: 0x7e
5477  * Access mode: DM-RW (delta mask)
5478  */
5479 #define IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMAC_CONTROL_MASK 0x40090080
5480 #define SIZE_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMAC_CONTROL_MASK 0x4
5481 #define MSK_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMAC_CONTROL_MASK 0x7e
5482 
5483 /*
5484  *
5485  * Bit: ftdf_on_off_regmap_LmacReady4sleep_m
5486  *
5487  * Mask bit for delta bit "LmacReady4sleep_d".
5488  * The mask bit is masking when cleared to '0' (default value) and will enable the contribution to the interrupt when set to '1'.
5489  */
5490 #define IND_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMACREADY4SLEEP_M IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMAC_CONTROL_MASK
5491 #define MSK_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMACREADY4SLEEP_M 0x2
5492 #define OFF_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMACREADY4SLEEP_M 1
5493 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMACREADY4SLEEP_M 1
5494 /*
5495  *
5496  * Bit: ftdf_on_off_regmap_SyncTimeStamp_m
5497  *
5498  * Mask bit for event register SyncTimeStamp_e.
5499  * The mask bit is masking when cleared to '0' (default value) and will enable the contribution to the interrupt when set to '1'.
5500  */
5501 #define IND_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_SYNCTIMESTAMP_M IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMAC_CONTROL_MASK
5502 #define MSK_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_SYNCTIMESTAMP_M 0x4
5503 #define OFF_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_SYNCTIMESTAMP_M 2
5504 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_SYNCTIMESTAMP_M 1
5505 /*
5506  *
5507  * Bit: ftdf_on_off_regmap_SymbolTimeThr_m
5508  *
5509  * Mask for SymbolTimeThr_e
5510  * The mask bit is masking when cleared to '0' (default value) and will enable the contribution to the interrupt when set to '1'.
5511  */
5512 #define IND_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_SYMBOLTIMETHR_M IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMAC_CONTROL_MASK
5513 #define MSK_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_SYMBOLTIMETHR_M 0x8
5514 #define OFF_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_SYMBOLTIMETHR_M 3
5515 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_SYMBOLTIMETHR_M 1
5516 /*
5517  *
5518  * Bit: ftdf_on_off_regmap_SymbolTime2Thr_m
5519  *
5520  * Mask for SymbolTime2Thr_e
5521  * The mask bit is masking when cleared to '0' (default value) and will enable the contribution to the interrupt when set to '1'.
5522  */
5523 #define IND_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_SYMBOLTIME2THR_M IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMAC_CONTROL_MASK
5524 #define MSK_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_SYMBOLTIME2THR_M 0x10
5525 #define OFF_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_SYMBOLTIME2THR_M 4
5526 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_SYMBOLTIME2THR_M 1
5527 /*
5528  *
5529  * Bit: ftdf_on_off_regmap_getGeneratorVal_m
5530  *
5531  * Mask for getGeneratorVal_e
5532  * The mask bit is masking when cleared to '0' (default value) and will enable the contribution to the interrupt when set to '1'.
5533  */
5534 #define IND_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_GETGENERATORVAL_M IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMAC_CONTROL_MASK
5535 #define MSK_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_GETGENERATORVAL_M 0x20
5536 #define OFF_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_GETGENERATORVAL_M 5
5537 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_GETGENERATORVAL_M 1
5538 /*
5539  *
5540  * Bit: ftdf_on_off_regmap_WakeupTimerEnableStatus_m
5541  *
5542  * Mask for WakeupTimerEnableStatus_d
5543  * The mask bit is masking when cleared to '0' (default value) and will enable the contribution to the interrupt when set to '1'.
5544  */
5545 #define IND_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_WAKEUPTIMERENABLESTATUS_M IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMAC_CONTROL_MASK
5546 #define MSK_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_WAKEUPTIMERENABLESTATUS_M 0x40
5547 #define OFF_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_WAKEUPTIMERENABLESTATUS_M 6
5548 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_WAKEUPTIMERENABLESTATUS_M 1
5549 
5550 /*
5551  *
5552  * REGISTER: ftdf_on_off_regmap_lmac_event
5553  *
5554  * Initialization value: 0x0 Initialization mask: 0xf
5555  * Access mode: E-RCW (event read/clear on write 1)
5556  */
5557 #define IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMAC_EVENT 0x40090090
5558 #define SIZE_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMAC_EVENT 0x4
5559 #define MSK_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMAC_EVENT 0xf
5560 
5561 /*
5562  *
5563  * Bit: ftdf_on_off_regmap_EdScanReady_e
5564  *
5565  * The event EdScanReady_e is set to '1' to notify that the ED scan is ready.
5566  * This event bit contributes to ftdf_ce[1].
5567  */
5568 #define IND_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_EDSCANREADY_E IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMAC_EVENT
5569 #define MSK_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_EDSCANREADY_E 0x1
5570 #define OFF_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_EDSCANREADY_E 0
5571 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_EDSCANREADY_E 1
5572 /*
5573  *
5574  * Bit: ftdf_on_off_regmap_CCAstat_e
5575  *
5576  * If set to '1', the single CCA is ready
5577  * This event bit contributes to ftdf_ce[1].
5578  */
5579 #define IND_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_CCASTAT_E IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMAC_EVENT
5580 #define MSK_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_CCASTAT_E 0x2
5581 #define OFF_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_CCASTAT_E 1
5582 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_CCASTAT_E 1
5583 /*
5584  *
5585  * Bit: ftdf_on_off_regmap_RxTimerExpired_e
5586  *
5587  * Set to '1' if one of the timers enabling the Rx-on mode expires without having received any valid frame.
5588  * This event bit contributes to ftdf_ce[1].
5589  */
5590 #define IND_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_RXTIMEREXPIRED_E IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMAC_EVENT
5591 #define MSK_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_RXTIMEREXPIRED_E 0x4
5592 #define OFF_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_RXTIMEREXPIRED_E 2
5593 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_RXTIMEREXPIRED_E 1
5594 /*
5595  *
5596  * Bit: ftdf_on_off_regmap_Csma_Ca_BO_thr_e
5597  *
5598  * If set, the calculated backoff time is more than Csma_Ca_BO_threshold.
5599  * This event bit contributes to ftdf_ce[1].
5600  */
5601 #define IND_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_CSMA_CA_BO_THR_E IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMAC_EVENT
5602 #define MSK_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_CSMA_CA_BO_THR_E 0x8
5603 #define OFF_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_CSMA_CA_BO_THR_E 3
5604 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_CSMA_CA_BO_THR_E 1
5605 
5606 /*
5607  *
5608  * REGISTER: ftdf_on_off_regmap_lmac_mask
5609  *
5610  * Initialization value: 0x0 Initialization mask: 0xf
5611  * Access mode: EM-RW (event mask)
5612  */
5613 #define IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMAC_MASK 0x40090094
5614 #define SIZE_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMAC_MASK 0x4
5615 #define MSK_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMAC_MASK 0xf
5616 
5617 /*
5618  *
5619  * Bit: ftdf_on_off_regmap_EdScanReady_m
5620  *
5621  * Mask bit for event "EdScanReady_e"
5622  * The mask bit is masking when cleared to '0' (default value) and will enable the contribution to the interrupt when set to '1'.
5623  */
5624 #define IND_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_EDSCANREADY_M IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMAC_MASK
5625 #define MSK_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_EDSCANREADY_M 0x1
5626 #define OFF_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_EDSCANREADY_M 0
5627 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_EDSCANREADY_M 1
5628 /*
5629  *
5630  * Bit: ftdf_on_off_regmap_CCAstat_m
5631  *
5632  * Mask bit for event "CCAstat_e"
5633  * The mask bit is masking when cleared to '0' (default value) and will enable the contribution to the interrupt when set to '1'.
5634  */
5635 #define IND_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_CCASTAT_M IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMAC_MASK
5636 #define MSK_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_CCASTAT_M 0x2
5637 #define OFF_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_CCASTAT_M 1
5638 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_CCASTAT_M 1
5639 /*
5640  *
5641  * Bit: ftdf_on_off_regmap_RxTimerExpired_m
5642  *
5643  * Mask bit for event "RxTimerExpired_e"
5644  * The mask bit is masking when cleared to '0' (default value) and will enable the contribution to the interrupt when set to '1'.
5645  */
5646 #define IND_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_RXTIMEREXPIRED_M IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMAC_MASK
5647 #define MSK_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_RXTIMEREXPIRED_M 0x4
5648 #define OFF_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_RXTIMEREXPIRED_M 2
5649 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_RXTIMEREXPIRED_M 1
5650 /*
5651  *
5652  * Bit: ftdf_on_off_regmap_Csma_Ca_BO_thr_m
5653  *
5654  * Mask bit for event "Csma_Ca_BO_thr_e"
5655  * The mask bit is masking when cleared to '0' (default value) and will enable the contribution to the interrupt when set to '1'.
5656  */
5657 #define IND_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_CSMA_CA_BO_THR_M IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMAC_MASK
5658 #define MSK_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_CSMA_CA_BO_THR_M 0x8
5659 #define OFF_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_CSMA_CA_BO_THR_M 3
5660 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_CSMA_CA_BO_THR_M 1
5661 
5662 /*
5663  *
5664  * REGISTER: ftdf_on_off_regmap_lmac_manual_1
5665  *
5666  * Initialization value: 0x0 Initialization mask: 0xffff0fff
5667  * Access mode: C-RW (control - read/write)
5668  */
5669 #define IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMAC_MANUAL_1 0x400900a0
5670 #define SIZE_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMAC_MANUAL_1 0x4
5671 #define MSK_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMAC_MANUAL_1 0xffff0fff
5672 
5673 /*
5674  *
5675  * Bit: ftdf_on_off_regmap_lmac_manual_mode
5676  *
5677  * If the control register lmac_manual_mode is set to '1', the LMAC controller control signals should be controlled by the lmac_manual_control registers
5678  */
5679 #define IND_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMAC_MANUAL_MODE IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMAC_MANUAL_1
5680 #define MSK_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMAC_MANUAL_MODE 0x1
5681 #define OFF_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMAC_MANUAL_MODE 0
5682 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMAC_MANUAL_MODE 1
5683 /*
5684  *
5685  * Bit: ftdf_on_off_regmap_lmac_manual_phy_en
5686  *
5687  * lmac_manual_phy_en controls the PHY_EN interface signal when lmac_manual_mode is set to '1'.
5688  */
5689 #define IND_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMAC_MANUAL_PHY_EN IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMAC_MANUAL_1
5690 #define MSK_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMAC_MANUAL_PHY_EN 0x2
5691 #define OFF_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMAC_MANUAL_PHY_EN 1
5692 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMAC_MANUAL_PHY_EN 1
5693 /*
5694  *
5695  * Bit: ftdf_on_off_regmap_lmac_manual_tx_en
5696  *
5697  * lmac_manual_tx_en controls the TX_EN interface signal when lmac_manual_mode is set to '1'.
5698  */
5699 #define IND_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMAC_MANUAL_TX_EN IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMAC_MANUAL_1
5700 #define MSK_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMAC_MANUAL_TX_EN 0x4
5701 #define OFF_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMAC_MANUAL_TX_EN 2
5702 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMAC_MANUAL_TX_EN 1
5703 /*
5704  *
5705  * Bit: ftdf_on_off_regmap_lmac_manual_rx_en
5706  *
5707  * lmac_manual_rx_en controls the RX_EN interface signal when lmac_manual_mode is set to '1'.
5708  */
5709 #define IND_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMAC_MANUAL_RX_EN IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMAC_MANUAL_1
5710 #define MSK_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMAC_MANUAL_RX_EN 0x8
5711 #define OFF_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMAC_MANUAL_RX_EN 3
5712 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMAC_MANUAL_RX_EN 1
5713 /*
5714  *
5715  * Bit: ftdf_on_off_regmap_lmac_manual_rx_pipe_en
5716  *
5717  * lmac_manual_rx_pipe_en controls the rx_enable signal towards the rx pipeline when lmac_manual_mode is set to '1'.
5718  */
5719 #define IND_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMAC_MANUAL_RX_PIPE_EN IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMAC_MANUAL_1
5720 #define MSK_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMAC_MANUAL_RX_PIPE_EN 0x10
5721 #define OFF_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMAC_MANUAL_RX_PIPE_EN 4
5722 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMAC_MANUAL_RX_PIPE_EN 1
5723 /*
5724  *
5725  * Bit: ftdf_on_off_regmap_lmac_manual_ed_request
5726  *
5727  * lmac_manual_ed_request controls the ED_REQUEST interface signal when lmac_manual_mode is set to '1'.
5728  */
5729 #define IND_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMAC_MANUAL_ED_REQUEST IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMAC_MANUAL_1
5730 #define MSK_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMAC_MANUAL_ED_REQUEST 0x20
5731 #define OFF_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMAC_MANUAL_ED_REQUEST 5
5732 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMAC_MANUAL_ED_REQUEST 1
5733 /*
5734  *
5735  * Field: ftdf_on_off_regmap_lmac_manual_tx_frm_nr
5736  *
5737  * lmac_manual_tx_frm_nr controls the entry in the tx buffer to be transmitted when lmac_manual_mode is set to '1'.
5738  */
5739 #define IND_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMAC_MANUAL_TX_FRM_NR IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMAC_MANUAL_1
5740 #define MSK_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMAC_MANUAL_TX_FRM_NR 0xc0
5741 #define OFF_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMAC_MANUAL_TX_FRM_NR 6
5742 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMAC_MANUAL_TX_FRM_NR 2
5743 /*
5744  *
5745  * Field: ftdf_on_off_regmap_lmac_manual_pti
5746  *
5747  * lmac_manual_pti controls the PTI interface signal when lmac_manual_mode is set to '1'.
5748  */
5749 #define IND_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMAC_MANUAL_PTI IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMAC_MANUAL_1
5750 #define MSK_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMAC_MANUAL_PTI 0xf00
5751 #define OFF_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMAC_MANUAL_PTI 8
5752 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMAC_MANUAL_PTI 4
5753 /*
5754  *
5755  * Field: ftdf_on_off_regmap_lmac_manual_phy_attr
5756  *
5757  * lmac_manual_phy_attr controls the PHY_ATTR interface signal when lmac_manual_mode is set to '1'.
5758  */
5759 #define IND_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMAC_MANUAL_PHY_ATTR IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMAC_MANUAL_1
5760 #define MSK_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMAC_MANUAL_PHY_ATTR 0xffff0000
5761 #define OFF_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMAC_MANUAL_PHY_ATTR 16
5762 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMAC_MANUAL_PHY_ATTR 16
5763 
5764 /*
5765  *
5766  * REGISTER: ftdf_on_off_regmap_lmac_manual_os
5767  *
5768  * Initialization value: 0x0 Initialization mask: 0x1
5769  * Access mode: OS-W (one-shot - write)
5770  */
5771 #define IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMAC_MANUAL_OS 0x400900a4
5772 #define SIZE_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMAC_MANUAL_OS 0x4
5773 #define MSK_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMAC_MANUAL_OS 0x1
5774 
5775 /*
5776  *
5777  * Bit: ftdf_on_off_regmap_lmac_manual_tx_start
5778  *
5779  * One shot register which triggers the transmission of a frame from the tx buffer in lmac_manual_mode to '1'.
5780  */
5781 #define IND_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMAC_MANUAL_TX_START IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMAC_MANUAL_OS
5782 #define MSK_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMAC_MANUAL_TX_START 0x1
5783 #define OFF_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMAC_MANUAL_TX_START 0
5784 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMAC_MANUAL_TX_START 1
5785 
5786 /*
5787  *
5788  * REGISTER: ftdf_on_off_regmap_lmac_manual_status
5789  *
5790  * Initialization value: none.
5791  * Access mode: S-R (state - read)
5792  */
5793 #define IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMAC_MANUAL_STATUS 0x400900a8
5794 #define SIZE_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMAC_MANUAL_STATUS 0x4
5795 #define MSK_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMAC_MANUAL_STATUS 0xff01
5796 
5797 /*
5798  *
5799  * Bit: ftdf_on_off_regmap_lmac_manual_cca_stat
5800  *
5801  * lmac_manual_cca_stat shows the status of the CCA_STAT DPHY interface signal.
5802  */
5803 #define IND_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMAC_MANUAL_CCA_STAT IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMAC_MANUAL_STATUS
5804 #define MSK_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMAC_MANUAL_CCA_STAT 0x1
5805 #define OFF_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMAC_MANUAL_CCA_STAT 0
5806 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMAC_MANUAL_CCA_STAT 1
5807 /*
5808  *
5809  * Field: ftdf_on_off_regmap_lmac_manual_ed_stat
5810  *
5811  * lmac_manual_ed_stat shows the status of the ED_STAT DPHY interface signal.
5812  */
5813 #define IND_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMAC_MANUAL_ED_STAT IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMAC_MANUAL_STATUS
5814 #define MSK_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMAC_MANUAL_ED_STAT 0xff00
5815 #define OFF_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMAC_MANUAL_ED_STAT 8
5816 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMAC_MANUAL_ED_STAT 8
5817 
5818 /*
5819  *
5820  * REGISTER: ftdf_on_off_regmap_lmac_control_7
5821  *
5822  * Initialization value: 0x420000 Initialization mask: 0xffffffff
5823  * Access mode: C-RW (control - read/write)
5824  */
5825 #define IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMAC_CONTROL_7 0x40090100
5826 #define SIZE_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMAC_CONTROL_7 0x4
5827 #define MSK_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMAC_CONTROL_7 0xffffffff
5828 
5829 /*
5830  *
5831  * Field: ftdf_on_off_regmap_macWUPeriod
5832  *
5833  * In CSL mode, the Wake-up duration in symbol periods. During this period, Wake-up frames will be transmitted.
5834  */
5835 #define IND_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_MACWUPERIOD IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMAC_CONTROL_7
5836 #define MSK_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_MACWUPERIOD 0xffff
5837 #define OFF_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_MACWUPERIOD 0
5838 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_MACWUPERIOD 16
5839 /*
5840  *
5841  * Field: ftdf_on_off_regmap_macCSLsamplePeriod
5842  *
5843  * In CSL mode, when performing a idle listening, the receiver is enabled for at least macCSLsamplePeriod (in symbol oeriods).
5844  */
5845 #define IND_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_MACCSLSAMPLEPERIOD IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMAC_CONTROL_7
5846 #define MSK_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_MACCSLSAMPLEPERIOD 0xffff0000
5847 #define OFF_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_MACCSLSAMPLEPERIOD 16
5848 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_MACCSLSAMPLEPERIOD 16
5849 
5850 /*
5851  *
5852  * REGISTER: ftdf_on_off_regmap_lmac_control_8
5853  *
5854  * Initialization value: 0x0 Initialization mask: 0xffffffff
5855  * Access mode: C-RW (control - read/write)
5856  */
5857 #define IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMAC_CONTROL_8 0x40090104
5858 #define SIZE_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMAC_CONTROL_8 0x4
5859 #define MSK_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMAC_CONTROL_8 0xffffffff
5860 
5861 /*
5862  *
5863  * Field: ftdf_on_off_regmap_macCSLstartSampleTime
5864  *
5865  * In CSL mode, the control register macCSLstartSampleTime indicates the TimeStamp generator time (in symbol periods) when to start listening (called "idle listening") or transmitting (when tx_flag_status is set).
5866  */
5867 #define IND_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_MACCSLSTARTSAMPLETIME IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMAC_CONTROL_8
5868 #define MSK_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_MACCSLSTARTSAMPLETIME 0xffffffff
5869 #define OFF_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_MACCSLSTARTSAMPLETIME 0
5870 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_MACCSLSTARTSAMPLETIME 32
5871 
5872 /*
5873  *
5874  * REGISTER: ftdf_on_off_regmap_lmac_control_9
5875  *
5876  * Initialization value: 0x42 Initialization mask: 0xffffffff
5877  * Access mode: C-RW (control - read/write)
5878  */
5879 #define IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMAC_CONTROL_9 0x40090108
5880 #define SIZE_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMAC_CONTROL_9 0x4
5881 #define MSK_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMAC_CONTROL_9 0xffffffff
5882 
5883 /*
5884  *
5885  * Field: ftdf_on_off_regmap_macCSLdataPeriod
5886  *
5887  * In CSL mode, after the wake-up sequence a data frame is expected. The receiver will be enabled for at least a period of macCSLdataPeriod (in symbol periods).
5888  */
5889 #define IND_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_MACCSLDATAPERIOD IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMAC_CONTROL_9
5890 #define MSK_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_MACCSLDATAPERIOD 0xffff
5891 #define OFF_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_MACCSLDATAPERIOD 0
5892 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_MACCSLDATAPERIOD 16
5893 /*
5894  *
5895  * Field: ftdf_on_off_regmap_macCSLFramePendingWaitT
5896  *
5897  * In CSL mode, if a non Wake-up frame with Frame Pending bit = '1' is received, the receiver is enabled for at least an extra period of macCSLFramePendingWaitT (in symbol periods) after the end of the received frame.
5898  * The time the Enhanced ACK transmission lasts (if applicable) is included in this time.
5899  */
5900 #define IND_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_MACCSLFRAMEPENDINGWAITT IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMAC_CONTROL_9
5901 #define MSK_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_MACCSLFRAMEPENDINGWAITT 0xffff0000
5902 #define OFF_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_MACCSLFRAMEPENDINGWAITT 16
5903 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_MACCSLFRAMEPENDINGWAITT 16
5904 
5905 /*
5906  *
5907  * REGISTER: ftdf_on_off_regmap_lmac_control_10
5908  *
5909  * Initialization value: 0x20000000 Initialization mask: 0xf00f00ff
5910  * Access mode: C-RW (control - read/write)
5911  */
5912 #define IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMAC_CONTROL_10 0x4009010c
5913 #define SIZE_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMAC_CONTROL_10 0x4
5914 #define MSK_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMAC_CONTROL_10 0xf00f00ff
5915 
5916 /*
5917  *
5918  * Field: ftdf_on_off_regmap_macRZzeroVal
5919  *
5920  * In CSL mode, if the current RZtime is less or Equal to macRZzeroVal an RZtime with value zero is inserted in the wakeup frame. So this is by default the last Wake-up frame of a Wake-up sequence.
5921  */
5922 #define IND_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_MACRZZEROVAL IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMAC_CONTROL_10
5923 #define MSK_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_MACRZZEROVAL 0xf0000000
5924 #define OFF_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_MACRZZEROVAL 28
5925 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_MACRZZEROVAL 4
5926 /*
5927  *
5928  * Field: ftdf_on_off_regmap_macCSLmarginRZ
5929  *
5930  * In CSL mode, the software can set the margin for the expected frame by control register macCSLmarginRZ (in 10 symbol periods).
5931  * The LMAC will make sure that the receiver is ready to receive data this amount of time earlier than to be expected by the received RZ time.
5932  */
5933 #define IND_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_MACCSLMARGINRZ IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMAC_CONTROL_10
5934 #define MSK_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_MACCSLMARGINRZ 0xf0000
5935 #define OFF_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_MACCSLMARGINRZ 16
5936 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_MACCSLMARGINRZ 4
5937 /*
5938  *
5939  * Field: ftdf_on_off_regmap_macWURZCorrection
5940  *
5941  * In CSL mode, this register shall be used if the Wake-up frame to be transmitted is larger than 15 octets.
5942  * It shall indicate the amount of extra data in a Wake-up frame after the RZ position in the frame (in 10 symbol periods).
5943  * This correction is needed to make sure that the correct RZ time is filled in by the LMAC.
5944  */
5945 #define IND_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_MACWURZCORRECTION IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMAC_CONTROL_10
5946 #define MSK_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_MACWURZCORRECTION 0xff
5947 #define OFF_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_MACWURZCORRECTION 0
5948 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_MACWURZCORRECTION 8
5949 
5950 /*
5951  *
5952  * REGISTER: ftdf_on_off_regmap_security_0
5953  *
5954  * Initialization value: 0x0 Initialization mask: 0xff7f0f02
5955  * Access mode: C-RW (control - read/write)
5956  */
5957 #define IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_SECURITY_0 0x40090110
5958 #define SIZE_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_SECURITY_0 0x4
5959 #define MSK_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_SECURITY_0 0xff7f0f02
5960 
5961 /*
5962  *
5963  * Bit: ftdf_on_off_regmap_secTxRxn
5964  *
5965  * Encryption/decryption mode: see register "secEntry".
5966  */
5967 #define IND_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_SECTXRXN IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_SECURITY_0
5968 #define MSK_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_SECTXRXN 0x2
5969 #define OFF_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_SECTXRXN 1
5970 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_SECTXRXN 1
5971 /*
5972  *
5973  * Field: ftdf_on_off_regmap_secEntry
5974  *
5975  * Encryption/decryption mode: the software indicates by the control registers secEntry and secTxRxn which entry to use and if it's from the Tx or Rx buffer ('1' resp. '0').
5976  */
5977 #define IND_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_SECENTRY IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_SECURITY_0
5978 #define MSK_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_SECENTRY 0xf00
5979 #define OFF_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_SECENTRY 8
5980 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_SECENTRY 4
5981 /*
5982  *
5983  * Field: ftdf_on_off_regmap_secAlength
5984  *
5985  * Encryption/decryption mode: the length of the a_data is indicated by control register secAlength (in bytes).
5986  * The end of the a_data is the start point of the m_data. So secAlength must also be set if security level==4.
5987  */
5988 #define IND_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_SECALENGTH IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_SECURITY_0
5989 #define MSK_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_SECALENGTH 0x7f0000
5990 #define OFF_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_SECALENGTH 16
5991 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_SECALENGTH 7
5992 /*
5993  *
5994  * Field: ftdf_on_off_regmap_secMlength
5995  *
5996  * Encryption/decryption mode: the length of the m_data is indicated by control register secMlength (in bytes).
5997  */
5998 #define IND_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_SECMLENGTH IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_SECURITY_0
5999 #define MSK_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_SECMLENGTH 0x7f000000
6000 #define OFF_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_SECMLENGTH 24
6001 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_SECMLENGTH 7
6002 /*
6003  *
6004  * Bit: ftdf_on_off_regmap_secEncDecn
6005  *
6006  * Encryption/decryption mode: the control register secEncDecn indicates whether to encrypt ('1') or decrypt ('0') the data.
6007  */
6008 #define IND_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_SECENCDECN IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_SECURITY_0
6009 #define MSK_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_SECENCDECN 0x80000000
6010 #define OFF_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_SECENCDECN 31
6011 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_SECENCDECN 1
6012 
6013 /*
6014  *
6015  * REGISTER: ftdf_on_off_regmap_security_1
6016  *
6017  * Initialization value: 0x0 Initialization mask: 0xffff
6018  * Access mode: C-RW (control - read/write)
6019  */
6020 #define IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_SECURITY_1 0x40090114
6021 #define SIZE_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_SECURITY_1 0x4
6022 #define MSK_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_SECURITY_1 0xffff
6023 
6024 /*
6025  *
6026  * Field: ftdf_on_off_regmap_secAuthFlags
6027  *
6028  * Encryption/decryption mode: register secAuthFlags contains the authentication flags fields.
6029  * bit[7] is '0'
6030  * bit[6] is "A_data present"
6031  * bit[5:3]: 3-bit security level of m_data
6032  * bit[2:0]: 3-bit security level of a_data.
6033  */
6034 #define IND_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_SECAUTHFLAGS IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_SECURITY_1
6035 #define MSK_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_SECAUTHFLAGS 0xff
6036 #define OFF_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_SECAUTHFLAGS 0
6037 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_SECAUTHFLAGS 8
6038 /*
6039  *
6040  * Field: ftdf_on_off_regmap_secEncrFlags
6041  *
6042  * Encryption/decryption mode: register secEncrFlags contains the encryption flags field.
6043  * Bits [2:0] are the 3-bit encoding flags of a_data, the other bits msut be set to '0'.
6044  */
6045 #define IND_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_SECENCRFLAGS IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_SECURITY_1
6046 #define MSK_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_SECENCRFLAGS 0xff00
6047 #define OFF_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_SECENCRFLAGS 8
6048 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_SECENCRFLAGS 8
6049 
6050 /*
6051  *
6052  * REGISTER: ftdf_on_off_regmap_secKey_0
6053  *
6054  * Initialization value: 0x0 Initialization mask: 0xffffffff
6055  * Access mode: C-RW (control - read/write)
6056  */
6057 #define IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_SECKEY_0 0x40090118
6058 #define SIZE_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_SECKEY_0 0x4
6059 #define MSK_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_SECKEY_0 0xffffffff
6060 
6061 /*
6062  *
6063  * Field: ftdf_on_off_regmap_secKey_0
6064  *
6065  * Encryption/decryption mode: Registers secKey[0..3] contain the key to be used.
6066  */
6067 #define IND_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_SECKEY_0 IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_SECKEY_0
6068 #define MSK_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_SECKEY_0 0xffffffff
6069 #define OFF_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_SECKEY_0 0
6070 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_SECKEY_0 32
6071 
6072 /*
6073  *
6074  * REGISTER: ftdf_on_off_regmap_secKey_1
6075  *
6076  * Initialization value: 0x0 Initialization mask: 0xffffffff
6077  * Access mode: C-RW (control - read/write)
6078  */
6079 #define IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_SECKEY_1 0x4009011c
6080 #define SIZE_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_SECKEY_1 0x4
6081 #define MSK_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_SECKEY_1 0xffffffff
6082 
6083 /*
6084  *
6085  * Field: ftdf_on_off_regmap_secKey_1
6086  *
6087  * Encryption/decryption mode: see register "secKey_0"
6088  */
6089 #define IND_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_SECKEY_1 IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_SECKEY_1
6090 #define MSK_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_SECKEY_1 0xffffffff
6091 #define OFF_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_SECKEY_1 0
6092 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_SECKEY_1 32
6093 
6094 /*
6095  *
6096  * REGISTER: ftdf_on_off_regmap_secKey_2
6097  *
6098  * Initialization value: 0x0 Initialization mask: 0xffffffff
6099  * Access mode: C-RW (control - read/write)
6100  */
6101 #define IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_SECKEY_2 0x40090120
6102 #define SIZE_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_SECKEY_2 0x4
6103 #define MSK_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_SECKEY_2 0xffffffff
6104 
6105 /*
6106  *
6107  * Field: ftdf_on_off_regmap_secKey_2
6108  *
6109  * Encryption/decryption mode: see register "secKey_0"
6110  */
6111 #define IND_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_SECKEY_2 IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_SECKEY_2
6112 #define MSK_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_SECKEY_2 0xffffffff
6113 #define OFF_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_SECKEY_2 0

6122  */

6124 #define SIZE_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_SECKEY_3 0x4
6125 #define MSK_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_SECKEY_3 0xffffffff
6126 
6127 /*
6128  *
6129  * Field: ftdf_on_off_regmap_secKey_3
6130  *

6132  */
6133 #define IND_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_SECKEY_3 IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_SECKEY_3
6134 #define MSK_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_SECKEY_3 0xffffffff
6135 #define OFF_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_SECKEY_3 0

6138 /*
6139  *
6140  * REGISTER: ftdf_on_off_regmap_secNonce_0
6141  *
6142  * Initialization value: 0x0 Initialization mask: 0xffffffff
6143  * Access mode: C-RW (control - read/write)
6144  */
6145 #define IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_SECNONCE_0 0x40090128
6146 #define SIZE_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_SECNONCE_0 0x4
6147 #define MSK_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_SECNONCE_0 0xffffffff
6148 
6149 /*
6150  *
6151  * Field: ftdf_on_off_regmap_secNonce_0
6152  *
6153  * Encryption/decryption mode: register secNonce[0..3] contains the Nonce to be used for encryption/decryption.
6154  */
6155 #define IND_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_SECNONCE_0 IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_SECNONCE_0
6156 #define MSK_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_SECNONCE_0 0xffffffff
6157 #define OFF_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_SECNONCE_0 0

6162  * REGISTER: ftdf_on_off_regmap_secNonce_1

6165  * Access mode: C-RW (control - read/write)
6166  */
6167 #define IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_SECNONCE_1 0x4009012c
6168 #define SIZE_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_SECNONCE_1 0x4

6187  * Access mode: C-RW (control - read/write)
6188  */
6189 #define IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_SECNONCE_2 0x40090130
6190 #define SIZE_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_SECNONCE_2 0x4
6191 #define MSK_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_SECNONCE_2 0xffffffff
6192 
6193 /*
6194  *
6195  * Field: ftdf_on_off_regmap_secNonce_2
6196  *

6198  */
6199 #define IND_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_SECNONCE_2 IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_SECNONCE_2
6200 #define MSK_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_SECNONCE_2 0xffffffff

6207  *

6209  * Access mode: C-RW (control - read/write)
6210  */

6212 #define SIZE_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_SECNONCE_3 0x4

6216  *
6217  * Field: ftdf_on_off_regmap_secNonce_3
6218  *
