6220  */
6221 #define IND_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_SECNONCE_3 IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_SECNONCE_3
6222 #define MSK_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_SECNONCE_3 0xff
6223 #define OFF_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_SECNONCE_3 0
6224 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_SECNONCE_3 8
6225 
6226 /*
6227  *
6228  * REGISTER: ftdf_on_off_regmap_security_os
6229  *
6230  * Initialization value: 0x0 Initialization mask: 0x3
6231  * Access mode: OS-W (one-shot - write)
6232  */
6233 #define IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_SECURITY_OS 0x40090138
6234 #define SIZE_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_SECURITY_OS 0x4
6235 #define MSK_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_SECURITY_OS 0x3
6236 
6237 /*
6238  *
6239  * Bit: ftdf_on_off_regmap_secAbort
6240  *
6241  * Encryption/decryption mode: see register "Nonce_0"
6242  */
6243 #define IND_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_SECABORT IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_SECURITY_OS
6244 #define MSK_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_SECABORT 0x1
6245 #define OFF_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_SECABORT 0
6246 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_SECABORT 1
6247 /*
6248  *
6249  * Bit: ftdf_on_off_regmap_secStart
6250  *
6251  * Encryption/decryption mode: one_shot register to start the encryption, decryption and authentication support task.
6252  */
6253 #define IND_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_SECSTART IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_SECURITY_OS
6254 #define MSK_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_SECSTART 0x2
6255 #define OFF_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_SECSTART 1
6256 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_SECSTART 1
6257 
6258 /*
6259  *
6260  * REGISTER: ftdf_on_off_regmap_security_status
6261  *
6262  * Initialization value: none.
6263  * Access mode: S-R (state - read)
6264  */
6265 #define IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_SECURITY_STATUS 0x40090140
6266 #define SIZE_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_SECURITY_STATUS 0x4
6267 #define MSK_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_SECURITY_STATUS 0x3
6268 
6269 /*
6270  *
6271  * Bit: ftdf_on_off_regmap_secBusy
6272  *
6273  * Encryption/decryption mode: register "secBusy" indicates if the encryption/decryption process is still running.
6274  */
6275 #define IND_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_SECBUSY IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_SECURITY_STATUS
6276 #define MSK_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_SECBUSY 0x1
6277 #define OFF_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_SECBUSY 0
6278 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_SECBUSY 1
6279 /*
6280  *
6281  * Bit: ftdf_on_off_regmap_secAuthFail
6282  *
6283  * Encryption/decryption mode: in case of decryption, the status bit secAuthFail will be set when the authentication has failed.
6284  */
6285 #define IND_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_SECAUTHFAIL IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_SECURITY_STATUS
6286 #define MSK_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_SECAUTHFAIL 0x2
6287 #define OFF_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_SECAUTHFAIL 1
6288 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_SECAUTHFAIL 1
6289 
6290 /*
6291  *
6292  * REGISTER: ftdf_on_off_regmap_security_event
6293  *
6294  * Initialization value: 0x0 Initialization mask: 0x1
6295  * Access mode: E-RCW (event read/clear on write 1)
6296  */
6297 #define IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_SECURITY_EVENT 0x40090150
6298 #define SIZE_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_SECURITY_EVENT 0x4
6299 #define MSK_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_SECURITY_EVENT 0x1
6300 
6301 /*
6302  *
6303  * Bit: ftdf_on_off_regmap_secReady_e
6304  *
6305  * Encryption/decryption mode: the Event bit secReady_e is set to '1' when the authentication process is ready (i.e. secBusy is cleared).
6306  * This event bit contributes to ftdf_ce[3].
6307  */
6308 #define IND_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_SECREADY_E IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_SECURITY_EVENT
6309 #define MSK_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_SECREADY_E 0x1
6310 #define OFF_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_SECREADY_E 0
6311 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_SECREADY_E 1
6312 
6313 /*
6314  *
6315  * REGISTER: ftdf_on_off_regmap_security_eventmask
6316  *
6317  * Initialization value: 0x0 Initialization mask: 0x1
6318  * Access mode: EM-RW (event mask)
6319  */
6320 #define IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_SECURITY_EVENTMASK 0x40090154
6321 #define SIZE_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_SECURITY_EVENTMASK 0x4
6322 #define MSK_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_SECURITY_EVENTMASK 0x1
6323 
6324 /*
6325  *
6326  * Bit: ftdf_on_off_regmap_secReady_m
6327  *
6328  * Mask bit for event "secReady_e".
6329  * The mask bit is masking when cleared to '0' (default value) and will enable the contribution to the interrupt when set to '1'.
6330  */
6331 #define IND_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_SECREADY_M IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_SECURITY_EVENTMASK
6332 #define MSK_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_SECREADY_M 0x1
6333 #define OFF_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_SECREADY_M 0
6334 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_SECREADY_M 1
6335 
6336 /*
6337  *
6338  * REGISTER: ftdf_on_off_regmap_tsch_control_0
6339  *
6340  * Initialization value: 0x89803e8 Initialization mask: 0xffffffff
6341  * Access mode: C-RW (control - read/write)
6342  */
6343 #define IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_TSCH_CONTROL_0 0x40090160
6344 #define SIZE_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_TSCH_CONTROL_0 0x4
6345 #define MSK_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_TSCH_CONTROL_0 0xffffffff
6346 
6347 /*
6348  *
6349  * Field: ftdf_on_off_regmap_macTSTxAckDelay
6350  *
6351  * TSCH mode: the time between the end of a Rx frame and the start of an Enhanced Acknowlegde frame.
6352  */
6353 #define IND_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_MACTSTXACKDELAY IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_TSCH_CONTROL_0
6354 #define MSK_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_MACTSTXACKDELAY 0xffff
6355 #define OFF_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_MACTSTXACKDELAY 0
6356 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_MACTSTXACKDELAY 16
6357 /*
6358  *
6359  * Field: ftdf_on_off_regmap_macTSRxWait
6360  *
6361  * TSCH mode: The times to wait for start of frame
6362  */
6363 #define IND_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_MACTSRXWAIT IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_TSCH_CONTROL_0
6364 #define MSK_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_MACTSRXWAIT 0xffff0000
6365 #define OFF_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_MACTSRXWAIT 16
6366 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_MACTSRXWAIT 16
6367 
6368 /*
6369  *
6370  * REGISTER: ftdf_on_off_regmap_tsch_control_1
6371  *
6372  * Initialization value: 0xc0 Initialization mask: 0xffff
6373  * Access mode: C-RW (control - read/write)
6374  */
6375 #define IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_TSCH_CONTROL_1 0x40090164
6376 #define SIZE_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_TSCH_CONTROL_1 0x4
6377 #define MSK_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_TSCH_CONTROL_1 0xffff
6378 
6379 /*
6380  *
6381  * Field: ftdf_on_off_regmap_macTSRxTx
6382  *
6383  * TSCH mode: The time between the CCA and the TX of a frame
6384  */
6385 #define IND_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_MACTSRXTX IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_TSCH_CONTROL_1
6386 #define MSK_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_MACTSRXTX 0xffff
6387 #define OFF_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_MACTSRXTX 0
6388 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_MACTSRXTX 16
6389 
6390 /*
6391  *
6392  * REGISTER: ftdf_on_off_regmap_tsch_control_2
6393  *
6394  * Initialization value: 0x1900320 Initialization mask: 0xffffffff
6395  * Access mode: C-RW (control - read/write)
6396  */
6397 #define IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_TSCH_CONTROL_2 0x40090168
6398 #define SIZE_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_TSCH_CONTROL_2 0x4
6399 #define MSK_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_TSCH_CONTROL_2 0xffffffff
6400 
6401 /*
6402  *
6403  * Field: ftdf_on_off_regmap_macTSRxAckDelay
6404  *
6405  * TSCH mode: End of frame to when the transmitter shall listen for Acknowledgement
6406  */
6407 #define IND_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_MACTSRXACKDELAY IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_TSCH_CONTROL_2
6408 #define MSK_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_MACTSRXACKDELAY 0xffff
6409 #define OFF_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_MACTSRXACKDELAY 0
6410 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_MACTSRXACKDELAY 16
6411 /*
6412  *
6413  * Field: ftdf_on_off_regmap_macTSAckWait
6414  *
6415  * TSCH mode: The minimum time to wait for start of an Acknowledgement
6416  */
6417 #define IND_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_MACTSACKWAIT IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_TSCH_CONTROL_2
6418 #define MSK_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_MACTSACKWAIT 0xffff0000
6419 #define OFF_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_MACTSACKWAIT 16
6420 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_MACTSACKWAIT 16
6421 
6422 /*
6423  *
6424  * REGISTER: ftdf_on_off_regmap_phy_parameters_0
6425  *
6426  * Initialization value: 0x76543210 Initialization mask: 0x77777777
6427  * Access mode: C-RW (control - read/write)
6428  */
6429 #define IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_PHY_PARAMETERS_0 0x40090180
6430 #define SIZE_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_PHY_PARAMETERS_0 0x4
6431 #define MSK_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_PHY_PARAMETERS_0 0x77777777
6432 
6433 /*
6434  *
6435  * Field: ftdf_on_off_regmap_rxBitPos_0
6436  *
6437  * DPHY interface: control rxBitPos(8)(3) controls the position that a bit should have at the DPHY interface.
6438  * So the default values are rxBitPos_0 = 0, rxBitPos_1 = 1, rxBitPos_2 = 2, etc.
6439  *
6440  * Note1 that this is a conversion from rx DPHY interface to the internal data byte
6441  * So
6442  * for(n=7;n>=0;n--)
6443  * rx_data(n) = dphy_bit(tx_BitPos(n))
6444  * endfor
6445  *
6446  * Note2 that rxBitPos and txBitPos must have inverse functions.
6447  */
6448 #define IND_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_RXBITPOS_0 IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_PHY_PARAMETERS_0
6449 #define MSK_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_RXBITPOS_0 0x7
6450 #define OFF_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_RXBITPOS_0 0
6451 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_RXBITPOS_0 3
6452 /*
6453  *
6454  * Field: ftdf_on_off_regmap_rxBitPos_1
6455  *
6456  * DPHY interface: see rxBitPos_0
6457  */
6458 #define IND_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_RXBITPOS_1 IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_PHY_PARAMETERS_0
6459 #define MSK_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_RXBITPOS_1 0x70
6460 #define OFF_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_RXBITPOS_1 4
6461 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_RXBITPOS_1 3
6462 /*
6463  *
6464  * Field: ftdf_on_off_regmap_rxBitPos_2
6465  *
6466  * DPHY interface: see rxBitPos_0
6467  */
6468 #define IND_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_RXBITPOS_2 IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_PHY_PARAMETERS_0
6469 #define MSK_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_RXBITPOS_2 0x700
6470 #define OFF_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_RXBITPOS_2 8
6471 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_RXBITPOS_2 3
6472 /*
6473  *
6474  * Field: ftdf_on_off_regmap_rxBitPos_3
6475  *
6476  * DPHY interface: see rxBitPos_0
6477  */
6478 #define IND_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_RXBITPOS_3 IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_PHY_PARAMETERS_0
6479 #define MSK_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_RXBITPOS_3 0x7000
6480 #define OFF_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_RXBITPOS_3 12
6481 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_RXBITPOS_3 3
6482 /*
6483  *
6484  * Field: ftdf_on_off_regmap_rxBitPos_4
6485  *
6486  * DPHY interface: see rxBitPos_0
6487  */
6488 #define IND_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_RXBITPOS_4 IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_PHY_PARAMETERS_0
6489 #define MSK_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_RXBITPOS_4 0x70000
6490 #define OFF_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_RXBITPOS_4 16
6491 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_RXBITPOS_4 3
6492 /*
6493  *
6494  * Field: ftdf_on_off_regmap_rxBitPos_5
6495  *
6496  * DPHY interface: see rxBitPos_0
6497  */
6498 #define IND_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_RXBITPOS_5 IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_PHY_PARAMETERS_0
6499 #define MSK_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_RXBITPOS_5 0x700000
6500 #define OFF_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_RXBITPOS_5 20
6501 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_RXBITPOS_5 3
6502 /*
6503  *
6504  * Field: ftdf_on_off_regmap_rxBitPos_6
6505  *
6506  * DPHY interface: see rxBitPos_0
6507  */
6508 #define IND_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_RXBITPOS_6 IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_PHY_PARAMETERS_0
6509 #define MSK_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_RXBITPOS_6 0x7000000
6510 #define OFF_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_RXBITPOS_6 24
6511 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_RXBITPOS_6 3
6512 /*
6513  *
6514  * Field: ftdf_on_off_regmap_rxBitPos_7
6515  *
6516  * DPHY interface: see rxBitPos_0
6517  */
6518 #define IND_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_RXBITPOS_7 IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_PHY_PARAMETERS_0
6519 #define MSK_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_RXBITPOS_7 0x70000000
6520 #define OFF_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_RXBITPOS_7 28
6521 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_RXBITPOS_7 3
6522 
6523 /*
6524  *
6525  * REGISTER: ftdf_on_off_regmap_phy_parameters_1
6526  *
6527  * Initialization value: 0x76543210 Initialization mask: 0x77777777
6528  * Access mode: C-RW (control - read/write)
6529  */
6530 #define IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_PHY_PARAMETERS_1 0x40090184
6531 #define SIZE_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_PHY_PARAMETERS_1 0x4
6532 #define MSK_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_PHY_PARAMETERS_1 0x77777777
6533 
6534 /*
6535  *
6536  * Field: ftdf_on_off_regmap_txBitPos_0
6537  *
6538  * DPHY interface: control txBitPos(8)(3) controls the position that a bit should have at the DPHY interface.
6539  * So the default values are txBitPos_0 = 0, txBitPos_1 = 1, txBitPos_2 = 2, etc.
6540  *
6541  * Note1 that this is a conversion from internal data byte to the DPHY interface.
6542  * So
6543  * for(n=7;n>=0;n--)
6544  * tx_dphy_bit(n) = tx_data(tx_BitPos(n))
6545  * endfor
6546  *
6547  * Note2 that txBitPos and rxBitPos must have inverse functions.
6548  */
6549 #define IND_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_TXBITPOS_0 IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_PHY_PARAMETERS_1
6550 #define MSK_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_TXBITPOS_0 0x7
6551 #define OFF_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_TXBITPOS_0 0
6552 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_TXBITPOS_0 3
6553 /*
6554  *
6555  * Field: ftdf_on_off_regmap_txBitPos_1
6556  *
6557  * DPHY interface: see txBitPos_0
6558  */
6559 #define IND_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_TXBITPOS_1 IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_PHY_PARAMETERS_1
6560 #define MSK_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_TXBITPOS_1 0x70
6561 #define OFF_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_TXBITPOS_1 4
6562 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_TXBITPOS_1 3
6563 /*
6564  *
6565  * Field: ftdf_on_off_regmap_txBitPos_2
6566  *
6567  * DPHY interface: see txBitPos_0
6568  */
6569 #define IND_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_TXBITPOS_2 IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_PHY_PARAMETERS_1
6570 #define MSK_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_TXBITPOS_2 0x700
6571 #define OFF_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_TXBITPOS_2 8
6572 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_TXBITPOS_2 3
6573 /*
6574  *
6575  * Field: ftdf_on_off_regmap_txBitPos_3
6576  *
6577  * DPHY interface: see txBitPos_0
6578  */
6579 #define IND_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_TXBITPOS_3 IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_PHY_PARAMETERS_1
6580 #define MSK_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_TXBITPOS_3 0x7000
6581 #define OFF_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_TXBITPOS_3 12
6582 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_TXBITPOS_3 3
6583 /*
6584  *
6585  * Field: ftdf_on_off_regmap_txBitPos_4
6586  *
6587  * DPHY interface: see txBitPos_0
6588  */
6589 #define IND_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_TXBITPOS_4 IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_PHY_PARAMETERS_1
6590 #define MSK_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_TXBITPOS_4 0x70000
6591 #define OFF_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_TXBITPOS_4 16
6592 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_TXBITPOS_4 3
6593 /*
6594  *
6595  * Field: ftdf_on_off_regmap_txBitPos_5
6596  *
6597  * DPHY interface: see txBitPos_0
6598  */
6599 #define IND_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_TXBITPOS_5 IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_PHY_PARAMETERS_1
6600 #define MSK_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_TXBITPOS_5 0x700000
6601 #define OFF_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_TXBITPOS_5 20
6602 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_TXBITPOS_5 3
6603 /*
6604  *
6605  * Field: ftdf_on_off_regmap_txBitPos_6
6606  *
6607  * DPHY interface: see txBitPos_0
6608  */
6609 #define IND_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_TXBITPOS_6 IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_PHY_PARAMETERS_1
6610 #define MSK_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_TXBITPOS_6 0x7000000
6611 #define OFF_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_TXBITPOS_6 24
6612 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_TXBITPOS_6 3
6613 /*
6614  *
6615  * Field: ftdf_on_off_regmap_txBitPos_7
6616  *
6617  * DPHY interface: see txBitPos_0
6618  */
6619 #define IND_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_TXBITPOS_7 IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_PHY_PARAMETERS_1
6620 #define MSK_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_TXBITPOS_7 0x70000000
6621 #define OFF_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_TXBITPOS_7 28
6622 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_TXBITPOS_7 3
6623 
6624 /*
6625  *
6626  * REGISTER: ftdf_on_off_regmap_phy_parameters_2
6627  *
6628  * Initialization value: 0x0 Initialization mask: 0xffffffff
6629  * Access mode: C-RW (control - read/write)
6630  */
6631 #define IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_PHY_PARAMETERS_2 0x40090188
6632 #define SIZE_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_PHY_PARAMETERS_2 0x4
6633 #define MSK_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_PHY_PARAMETERS_2 0xffffffff
6634 
6635 /*
6636  *
6637  * Field: ftdf_on_off_regmap_phyTxStartup
6638  *
6639  * DPHY interface: the phy wait time (in us) before transmission of a frame may start.
6640  */
6641 #define IND_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_PHYTXSTARTUP IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_PHY_PARAMETERS_2
6642 #define MSK_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_PHYTXSTARTUP 0xff
6643 #define OFF_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_PHYTXSTARTUP 0
6644 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_PHYTXSTARTUP 8
6645 /*
6646  *
6647  * Field: ftdf_on_off_regmap_phyTxLatency
6648  *
6649  * DPHY interface: phy delay (in us) between DPHY interface and air interface.
6650  */
6651 #define IND_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_PHYTXLATENCY IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_PHY_PARAMETERS_2
6652 #define MSK_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_PHYTXLATENCY 0xff00
6653 #define OFF_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_PHYTXLATENCY 8
6654 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_PHYTXLATENCY 8
6655 /*
6656  *
6657  * Field: ftdf_on_off_regmap_phyTxFinish
6658  *
6659  * DPHY interface: Phy wait time (in us) before deasserting TX_EN after deasserting TX_VALID.
6660  */
6661 #define IND_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_PHYTXFINISH IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_PHY_PARAMETERS_2
6662 #define MSK_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_PHYTXFINISH 0xff0000
6663 #define OFF_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_PHYTXFINISH 16
6664 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_PHYTXFINISH 8
6665 /*
6666  *
6667  * Field: ftdf_on_off_regmap_phyTRxWait
6668  *
6669  * DPHY interface: Phy wait time (in us) between deassertion of TX_EN and assertion of RX_EN or vice versa.
6670  */
6671 #define IND_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_PHYTRXWAIT IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_PHY_PARAMETERS_2
6672 #define MSK_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_PHYTRXWAIT 0xff000000
6673 #define OFF_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_PHYTRXWAIT 24
6674 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_PHYTRXWAIT 8
6675 
6676 /*
6677  *
6678  * REGISTER: ftdf_on_off_regmap_phy_parameters_3
6679  *
6680  * Initialization value: 0x1000000 Initialization mask: 0x1ffffff
6681  * Access mode: C-RW (control - read/write)
6682  */
6683 #define IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_PHY_PARAMETERS_3 0x4009018c
6684 #define SIZE_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_PHY_PARAMETERS_3 0x4
6685 #define MSK_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_PHY_PARAMETERS_3 0x1ffffff
6686 
6687 /*
6688  *
6689  * Field: ftdf_on_off_regmap_phyRxStartup
6690  *
6691  * DPHY interface: Phy wait time (in us) before receiving of a frame may start.
6692  */
6693 #define IND_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_PHYRXSTARTUP IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_PHY_PARAMETERS_3
6694 #define MSK_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_PHYRXSTARTUP 0xff
6695 #define OFF_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_PHYRXSTARTUP 0
6696 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_PHYRXSTARTUP 8
6697 /*
6698  *
6699  * Field: ftdf_on_off_regmap_phyRxLatency
6700  *
6701  * DPHY interface: Phy delay (in us) between air and DPHY interface.
6702  */
6703 #define IND_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_PHYRXLATENCY IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_PHY_PARAMETERS_3
6704 #define MSK_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_PHYRXLATENCY 0xff00
6705 #define OFF_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_PHYRXLATENCY 8
6706 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_PHYRXLATENCY 8
6707 /*
6708  *
6709  * Field: ftdf_on_off_regmap_phyEnable
6710  *
6711  * DPHY interface: Asserting the DPHY interface signals TX_EN or RX_EN does not take place within the time phyEnable after asserting the signal PHY_EN.
6712  * (in us).
6713  */
6714 #define IND_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_PHYENABLE IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_PHY_PARAMETERS_3
6715 #define MSK_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_PHYENABLE 0xff0000
6716 #define OFF_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_PHYENABLE 16
6717 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_PHYENABLE 8
6718 /*
6719  *
6720  * Bit: ftdf_on_off_regmap_use_legacy_phy_en
6721  *
6722  * If the control register use_legacy_phy_en is set (default), the output signal PHY_TRANSACTION will be sourced by PHY_EN rather than PHY_TRANSACTION.
6723  */
6724 #define IND_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_USE_LEGACY_PHY_EN IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_PHY_PARAMETERS_3
6725 #define MSK_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_USE_LEGACY_PHY_EN 0x1000000
6726 #define OFF_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_USE_LEGACY_PHY_EN 24
6727 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_USE_LEGACY_PHY_EN 1
6728 
6729 /*
6730  *
6731  * REGISTER: ftdf_on_off_regmap_rx_control_0
6732  *
6733  * Initialization value: 0x0 Initialization mask: 0xfffffff
6734  * Access mode: C-RW (control - read/write)
6735  */
6736 #define IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_RX_CONTROL_0 0x40090200
6737 #define SIZE_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_RX_CONTROL_0 0x4
6738 #define MSK_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_RX_CONTROL_0 0xfffffff
6739 
6740 /*
6741  *
6742  * Bit: ftdf_on_off_regmap_DbgRxTransparentMode
6743  *
6744  * If set yo '1', Rx pipe is fully set in transparent mode (for debug purpose).
6745  */
6746 #define IND_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_DBGRXTRANSPARENTMODE IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_RX_CONTROL_0
6747 #define MSK_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_DBGRXTRANSPARENTMODE 0x1
6748 #define OFF_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_DBGRXTRANSPARENTMODE 0
6749 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_DBGRXTRANSPARENTMODE 1
6750 /*
6751  *
6752  * Bit: ftdf_on_off_regmap_RxBeaconOnly
6753  *
6754  * If set to '1', only Beacons frames are accepted
6755  */
6756 #define IND_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_RXBEACONONLY IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_RX_CONTROL_0
6757 #define MSK_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_RXBEACONONLY 0x2
6758 #define OFF_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_RXBEACONONLY 1
6759 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_RXBEACONONLY 1
6760 /*
6761  *
6762  * Bit: ftdf_on_off_regmap_RxCoordRealignOnly
6763  *
6764  * If set to '1', only Coordinator Realignment frames are accepted
6765  */
6766 #define IND_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_RXCOORDREALIGNONLY IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_RX_CONTROL_0
6767 #define MSK_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_RXCOORDREALIGNONLY 0x4
6768 #define OFF_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_RXCOORDREALIGNONLY 2
6769 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_RXCOORDREALIGNONLY 1
6770 /*
6771  *
6772  * Field: ftdf_on_off_regmap_rx_read_buf_ptr
6773  *
6774  * Indication where new data will be read
6775  * All four bits shall be used when using these pointer values (0d - 15d).
6776  * However, the Receive Packet buffer has a size of 8 entries.
6777  * So reading the Receive Packet buffer entries shall use the mod8 of the pointer values.
6778  */
6779 #define IND_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_RX_READ_BUF_PTR IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_RX_CONTROL_0
6780 #define MSK_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_RX_READ_BUF_PTR 0x78
6781 #define OFF_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_RX_READ_BUF_PTR 3
6782 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_RX_READ_BUF_PTR 4
6783 /*
6784  *
6785  * Bit: ftdf_on_off_regmap_DisRxFrmPendingca
6786  *
6787  * Whan the control register DisRxFrmPendingCa is set to '1', the notification of the received FP bit to the LMAC Controller is disabled and thus no consequent actions will take place.
6788  */
6789 #define IND_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_DISRXFRMPENDINGCA IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_RX_CONTROL_0
6790 #define MSK_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_DISRXFRMPENDINGCA 0x80
6791 #define OFF_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_DISRXFRMPENDINGCA 7
6792 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_DISRXFRMPENDINGCA 1
6793 /*
6794  *
6795  * Bit: ftdf_on_off_regmap_DisRxAckRequestca
6796  *
6797  * When the control register DisRxAckRequestca is set to '1' all consequent actions for a received Acknowledge Request bit are disabled.
6798  */
6799 #define IND_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_DISRXACKREQUESTCA IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_RX_CONTROL_0
6800 #define MSK_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_DISRXACKREQUESTCA 0x100
6801 #define OFF_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_DISRXACKREQUESTCA 8
6802 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_DISRXACKREQUESTCA 1
6803 /*
6804  *
6805  * Bit: ftdf_on_off_regmap_macAlwaysPassCrcerror
6806  *
6807  * If set to '1', a FCS error will not drop the frame. However, an FCS error will be reported in the Rx meta data (crc16_error is set to '1').
6808  */
6809 #define IND_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_MACALWAYSPASSCRCERROR IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_RX_CONTROL_0
6810 #define MSK_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_MACALWAYSPASSCRCERROR 0x200
6811 #define OFF_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_MACALWAYSPASSCRCERROR 9
6812 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_MACALWAYSPASSCRCERROR 1
6813 /*
6814  *
6815  * Bit: ftdf_on_off_regmap_DisDataRequestca
6816  *
6817  * When the control register DisDataRequestCa is set, the notification of the received Data Request is disabled.
6818  */
6819 #define IND_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_DISDATAREQUESTCA IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_RX_CONTROL_0
6820 #define MSK_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_DISDATAREQUESTCA 0x400
6821 #define OFF_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_DISDATAREQUESTCA 10
6822 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_DISDATAREQUESTCA 1
6823 /*
6824  *
6825  * Bit: ftdf_on_off_regmap_macAlwaysPassResFrameVersion
6826  *
6827  * If set to '1', a packet with a reserved FrameVersion shall not be dropped
6828  */
6829 #define IND_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_MACALWAYSPASSRESFRAMEVERSION IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_RX_CONTROL_0
6830 #define MSK_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_MACALWAYSPASSRESFRAMEVERSION 0x800
6831 #define OFF_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_MACALWAYSPASSRESFRAMEVERSION 11
6832 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_MACALWAYSPASSRESFRAMEVERSION 1
6833 /*
6834  *
6835  * Bit: ftdf_on_off_regmap_macAlwaysPassWrongDPANId
6836  *
6837  * If register macAlwaysPassWrongDPANId is set to '1', packet with a wrong Destiantion PanID will not be dropped.
6838  * However, in case of an FCS error, the packet is dropped.
6839  */
6840 #define IND_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_MACALWAYSPASSWRONGDPANID IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_RX_CONTROL_0
6841 #define MSK_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_MACALWAYSPASSWRONGDPANID 0x1000
6842 #define OFF_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_MACALWAYSPASSWRONGDPANID 12
6843 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_MACALWAYSPASSWRONGDPANID 1
6844 /*
6845  *
6846  * Bit: ftdf_on_off_regmap_macAlwaysPassWrongDAddr
6847  *
6848  * If set to '1', a packet with a wrong DAddr is not dropped
6849  */
6850 #define IND_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_MACALWAYSPASSWRONGDADDR IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_RX_CONTROL_0
6851 #define MSK_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_MACALWAYSPASSWRONGDADDR 0x2000
6852 #define OFF_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_MACALWAYSPASSWRONGDADDR 13
6853 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_MACALWAYSPASSWRONGDADDR 1
6854 /*
6855  *
6856  * Bit: ftdf_on_off_regmap_macAlwaysPassBeaconWrongPANId
6857  *
6858  * If the control register macAlwaysPassBeaconWrongPANId is set, the frame is not dropped in case of a mismatch in PAN-ID, irrespective of the setting of RxBeaconOnly.
6859  */
6860 #define IND_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_MACALWAYSPASSBEACONWRONGPANID IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_RX_CONTROL_0
6861 #define MSK_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_MACALWAYSPASSBEACONWRONGPANID 0x4000
6862 #define OFF_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_MACALWAYSPASSBEACONWRONGPANID 14
6863 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_MACALWAYSPASSBEACONWRONGPANID 1
6864 /*
6865  *
6866  * Bit: ftdf_on_off_regmap_macAlwaysPassToPanCoordinator
6867  *
6868  * When the control register macAlwaysPassToPanCoordinator is set to '1', the frame is not dropped due to a span_coord_error.
6869  * However, in case of an FCS error, the packet is dropped.
6870  */
6871 #define IND_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_MACALWAYSPASSTOPANCOORDINATOR IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_RX_CONTROL_0
6872 #define MSK_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_MACALWAYSPASSTOPANCOORDINATOR 0x8000
6873 #define OFF_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_MACALWAYSPASSTOPANCOORDINATOR 15
6874 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_MACALWAYSPASSTOPANCOORDINATOR 1
6875 /*
6876  *
6877  * Field: ftdf_on_off_regmap_macAlwaysPassFrmType
6878  *
6879  * The control registers macAlwaysPassFrmType[7:0], shall control if this Frame Type shall be dropped.
6880  * If a bit is set to '1', the Frame Type corresponding with the bit position is not dropped, even in case of a CRC error.
6881  * Example:
6882  * if bit 3 is set to '1', Frame Type 3 shall not be dropped.
6883  * If there is a FCS error, the error shall be reported in the Rx meta data (crc16_error is set to '1').
6884  */
6885 #define IND_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_MACALWAYSPASSFRMTYPE IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_RX_CONTROL_0
6886 #define MSK_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_MACALWAYSPASSFRMTYPE 0xff0000
6887 #define OFF_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_MACALWAYSPASSFRMTYPE 16
6888 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_MACALWAYSPASSFRMTYPE 8
6889 /*
6890  *
6891  * Bit: ftdf_on_off_regmap_macAlwaysPassWakeUp
6892  *
6893  * In CSL mode, if the control register macAlwaysPassWakeUp is set to '1', received Wake- up frames for this device are put into the Rx packet buffer without notifying the LMAC Controller (part of transparent mode control).
6894  */
6895 #define IND_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_MACALWAYSPASSWAKEUP IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_RX_CONTROL_0
6896 #define MSK_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_MACALWAYSPASSWAKEUP 0x1000000
6897 #define OFF_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_MACALWAYSPASSWAKEUP 24
6898 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_MACALWAYSPASSWAKEUP 1
6899 /*
6900  *
6901  * Bit: ftdf_on_off_regmap_macPassWakeUp
6902  *
6903  * In CSL mode, if set to '1', WakeUp frames will be put into the Rx buffer.
6904  * This can be useful for software to parse the WakeUp frame.
6905  */
6906 #define IND_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_MACPASSWAKEUP IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_RX_CONTROL_0
6907 #define MSK_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_MACPASSWAKEUP 0x2000000
6908 #define OFF_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_MACPASSWAKEUP 25
6909 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_MACPASSWAKEUP 1
6910 /*
6911  *
6912  * Bit: ftdf_on_off_regmap_macImplicitBroadcast
6913  *
6914  * If set to '1', Frame Version 2 frames without Daddr or DPANId shall be accepted.
6915  */
6916 #define IND_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_MACIMPLICITBROADCAST IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_RX_CONTROL_0
6917 #define MSK_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_MACIMPLICITBROADCAST 0x4000000
6918 #define OFF_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_MACIMPLICITBROADCAST 26
6919 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_MACIMPLICITBROADCAST 1
6920 /*
6921  *
6922  * Bit: ftdf_on_off_regmap_DisRxAckReceivedca
6923  *
6924  * If set to '1', the LMAC controller shall ignore all consequent actions upon a set AR bit in the transmitted frame (e.g. enabling Rx-on mode after the transmission and wait for an ACK).
6925  */
6926 #define IND_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_DISRXACKRECEIVEDCA IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_RX_CONTROL_0
6927 #define MSK_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_DISRXACKRECEIVEDCA 0x8000000
6928 #define OFF_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_DISRXACKRECEIVEDCA 27
6929 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_DISRXACKRECEIVEDCA 1
6930 
6931 /*
6932  *
6933  * REGISTER: ftdf_on_off_regmap_rx_event
6934  *
6935  * Initialization value: 0x0 Initialization mask: 0xf
6936  * Access mode: E-RCW2 (event read/clear on write 1)
6937  */
6938 #define IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_RX_EVENT 0x40090204
6939 #define SIZE_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_RX_EVENT 0x4
6940 #define MSK_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_RX_EVENT 0xf
6941 
6942 /*
6943  *
6944  * Bit: ftdf_on_off_regmap_RxSof_e
6945  *
6946  * Set to '1' when RX_SOF has been detected.
6947  * This event bit contributes to ftdf_ce[1].
6948  */
6949 #define IND_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_RXSOF_E IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_RX_EVENT
6950 #define MSK_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_RXSOF_E 0x1
6951 #define OFF_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_RXSOF_E 0
6952 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_RXSOF_E 1
6953 /*
6954  *
6955  * Bit: ftdf_on_off_regmap_rx_overflow_e
6956  *
6957  * If set to '1' it indicates that the Rx packet buffer has an overflow.
6958  * This event bit contributes to ftdf_ce[1].
6959  */
6960 #define IND_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_RX_OVERFLOW_E IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_RX_EVENT
6961 #define MSK_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_RX_OVERFLOW_E 0x2
6962 #define OFF_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_RX_OVERFLOW_E 1
6963 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_RX_OVERFLOW_E 1
6964 /*
6965  *
6966  * Bit: ftdf_on_off_regmap_rx_buf_avail_e
6967  *
6968  * If set to '1' it indicates that a new valid packet completely has been received
6969  * This event bit contributes to ftdf_ce[1].
6970  */
6971 #define IND_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_RX_BUF_AVAIL_E IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_RX_EVENT
6972 #define MSK_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_RX_BUF_AVAIL_E 0x4
6973 #define OFF_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_RX_BUF_AVAIL_E 2
6974 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_RX_BUF_AVAIL_E 1
6975 /*
6976  *
6977  * Bit: ftdf_on_off_regmap_rxbyte_e
6978  *
6979  * If set to '1' it indicates that the first byte of a new packet has been received
6980  * This event bit contributes to ftdf_ce[1].
6981  */
6982 #define IND_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_RXBYTE_E IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_RX_EVENT
6983 #define MSK_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_RXBYTE_E 0x8
6984 #define OFF_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_RXBYTE_E 3
6985 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_RXBYTE_E 1
6986 
6987 /*
6988  *
6989  * REGISTER: ftdf_on_off_regmap_rx_mask
6990  *
6991  * Initialization value: 0x0 Initialization mask: 0xf
6992  * Access mode: EM-RW (event mask)
6993  */
6994 #define IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_RX_MASK 0x40090208
6995 #define SIZE_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_RX_MASK 0x4
6996 #define MSK_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_RX_MASK 0xf
6997 
6998 /*
6999  *
7000  * Bit: ftdf_on_off_regmap_RxSof_m
7001  *
7002  * Mask bit for event "RxSof_e".
7003  * The mask bit is masking when cleared to '0' (default value) and will enable the contribution to the interrupt when set to '1'.
7004  */
7005 #define IND_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_RXSOF_M IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_RX_MASK
7006 #define MSK_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_RXSOF_M 0x1
7007 #define OFF_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_RXSOF_M 0
7008 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_RXSOF_M 1
7009 /*
7010  *
7011  * Bit: ftdf_on_off_regmap_rx_overflow_m
7012  *
7013  * Mask bit for event " rx_overflow_e".
7014  * The mask bit is masking when cleared to '0' (default value) and will enable the contribution to the interrupt when set to '1'.
7015  */
7016 #define IND_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_RX_OVERFLOW_M IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_RX_MASK
7017 #define MSK_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_RX_OVERFLOW_M 0x2
7018 #define OFF_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_RX_OVERFLOW_M 1
7019 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_RX_OVERFLOW_M 1
7020 /*
7021  *
7022  * Bit: ftdf_on_off_regmap_rx_buf_avail_m
7023  *
7024  * Mask bit for event "rx_buf_avail_e".
7025  * The mask bit is masking when cleared to '0' (default value) and will enable the contribution to the interrupt when set to '1'.
7026  */
7027 #define IND_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_RX_BUF_AVAIL_M IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_RX_MASK
7028 #define MSK_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_RX_BUF_AVAIL_M 0x4
7029 #define OFF_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_RX_BUF_AVAIL_M 2
7030 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_RX_BUF_AVAIL_M 1
7031 /*
7032  *
7033  * Bit: ftdf_on_off_regmap_rxbyte_m
7034  *
7035  * Mask bit for event "rxbyte_e".
7036  * The mask bit is masking when cleared to '0' (default value) and will enable the contribution to the interrupt when set to '1'.
7037  */
7038 #define IND_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_RXBYTE_M IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_RX_MASK
7039 #define MSK_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_RXBYTE_M 0x8
7040 #define OFF_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_RXBYTE_M 3
7041 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_RXBYTE_M 1
7042 
7043 /*
7044  *
7045  * REGISTER: ftdf_on_off_regmap_rx_status
7046  *
7047  * Initialization value: none.
7048  * Access mode: S-R (state - read)
7049  */
7050 #define IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_RX_STATUS 0x4009020c
7051 #define SIZE_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_RX_STATUS 0x4
7052 #define MSK_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_RX_STATUS 0x1f
7053 
7054 /*
7055  *
7056  * Bit: ftdf_on_off_regmap_rx_buff_is_full
7057  *
7058  * If set to '1', it indicates that the Rx packet buffer is full
7059  */
7060 #define IND_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_RX_BUFF_IS_FULL IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_RX_STATUS
7061 #define MSK_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_RX_BUFF_IS_FULL 0x1
7062 #define OFF_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_RX_BUFF_IS_FULL 0
7063 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_RX_BUFF_IS_FULL 1
7064 /*
7065  *
7066  * Field: ftdf_on_off_regmap_rx_write_buf_ptr
7067  *
7068  * Indication where new data will be written.
7069  * All four bits shall be used when using these pointer values (0d - 15d).
7070  * However, the Receive Packet buffer has a size of 8 entries.
7071  * So reading the Receive Packet buffer entries shall use the mod8 of the pointer values.
7072  */
7073 #define IND_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_RX_WRITE_BUF_PTR IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_RX_STATUS
7074 #define MSK_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_RX_WRITE_BUF_PTR 0x1e
7075 #define OFF_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_RX_WRITE_BUF_PTR 1
7076 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_RX_WRITE_BUF_PTR 4
7077 
7078 /*
7079  *
7080  * REGISTER: ftdf_on_off_regmap_SymbolTimeSnapshotVal
7081  *
7082  * Initialization value: none.
7083  * Access mode: S-R (state - read)
7084  */
7085 #define IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_SYMBOLTIMESNAPSHOTVAL 0x40090210
7086 #define SIZE_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_SYMBOLTIMESNAPSHOTVAL 0x4
7087 #define MSK_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_SYMBOLTIMESNAPSHOTVAL 0xffffffff
7088 
7089 /*
7090  *
7091  * Field: ftdf_on_off_regmap_SymbolTimeSnapshotVal
7092  *
7093  * The Status register SymbolTimeSnapshotVal indicates the actual value of the TimeStamp generator.
7094  * This can be useful for software to use e.g. in CSL mode at creating an Enhanced ACK to calculate the CSL phase and period.
7095  */
7096 #define IND_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_SYMBOLTIMESNAPSHOTVAL IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_SYMBOLTIMESNAPSHOTVAL
7097 #define MSK_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_SYMBOLTIMESNAPSHOTVAL 0xffffffff
7098 #define OFF_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_SYMBOLTIMESNAPSHOTVAL 0
7099 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_SYMBOLTIMESNAPSHOTVAL 32
7100 
7101 /*
7102  *
7103  * REGISTER: ftdf_on_off_regmap_rx_status_delta
7104  *
7105  * Initialization value: 0x0 Initialization mask: 0x1
7106  * Access mode: D-RCW (delta read/clear on write 1)
7107  */
7108 #define IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_RX_STATUS_DELTA 0x40090220
7109 #define SIZE_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_RX_STATUS_DELTA 0x4
7110 #define MSK_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_RX_STATUS_DELTA 0x1
7111 
7112 /*
7113  *
7114  * Bit: ftdf_on_off_regmap_rx_buff_is_full_d
7115  *
7116  * Delta bit of status "rx_buff_is_full".
7117  * This delta bit is set to '1' on each change of this status, contributes to ftdf_ce[1].
7118  */
7119 #define IND_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_RX_BUFF_IS_FULL_D IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_RX_STATUS_DELTA
7120 #define MSK_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_RX_BUFF_IS_FULL_D 0x1
7121 #define OFF_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_RX_BUFF_IS_FULL_D 0
7122 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_RX_BUFF_IS_FULL_D 1
7123 
7124 /*
7125  *
7126  * REGISTER: ftdf_on_off_regmap_rx_status_mask
7127  *
7128  * Initialization value: 0x0 Initialization mask: 0x1
7129  * Access mode: DM-RW (delta mask)
7130  */
7131 #define IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_RX_STATUS_MASK 0x40090224
7132 #define SIZE_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_RX_STATUS_MASK 0x4
7133 #define MSK_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_RX_STATUS_MASK 0x1
7134 
7135 /*
7136  *
7137  * Bit: ftdf_on_off_regmap_rx_buff_is_full_m
7138  *
7139  * Mask bit for delta bit "rx_buff_is_full_d".
7140  * The mask bit is masking when cleared to '0' (default value) and will enable the contribution to the interrupt when set to '1'.
7141  */
7142 #define IND_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_RX_BUFF_IS_FULL_M IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_RX_STATUS_MASK
7143 #define MSK_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_RX_BUFF_IS_FULL_M 0x1
7144 #define OFF_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_RX_BUFF_IS_FULL_M 0
7145 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_RX_BUFF_IS_FULL_M 1
7146 
7147 /*
7148  *
7149  * REGISTER: ftdf_on_off_regmap_tx_control_0
7150  *
7151  * Initialization value: 0x4350 Initialization mask: 0x7ff1
7152  * Access mode: C-RW (control - read/write)
7153  */
7154 #define IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_TX_CONTROL_0 0x40090240
7155 #define SIZE_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_TX_CONTROL_0 0x4
7156 #define MSK_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_TX_CONTROL_0 0x7ff1
7157 
7158 /*
7159  *
7160  * Bit: ftdf_on_off_regmap_DbgTxTransparentMode
7161  *
7162  * If set to '1', the MPDU octets pass transparently through the MAC in the transmit direction (for debug purpose).
7163  */
7164 #define IND_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_DBGTXTRANSPARENTMODE IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_TX_CONTROL_0
7165 #define MSK_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_DBGTXTRANSPARENTMODE 0x1
7166 #define OFF_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_DBGTXTRANSPARENTMODE 0
7167 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_DBGTXTRANSPARENTMODE 1
7168 /*
7169  *
7170  * Field: ftdf_on_off_regmap_macMaxBE
7171  *
7172  * CSMA-CA: Maximum Backoff Exponent (range 3-8)
7173  */
7174 #define IND_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_MACMAXBE IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_TX_CONTROL_0
7175 #define MSK_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_MACMAXBE 0xf0
7176 #define OFF_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_MACMAXBE 4
7177 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_MACMAXBE 4
7178 /*
7179  *
7180  * Field: ftdf_on_off_regmap_macMinBE
7181  *
7182  * CSMA-CA: Minimum Backoff Exponent (range 0-macMaxBE)
7183  */
7184 #define IND_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_MACMINBE IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_TX_CONTROL_0
7185 #define MSK_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_MACMINBE 0xf00
7186 #define OFF_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_MACMINBE 8
7187 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_MACMINBE 4
7188 /*
7189  *
7190  * Field: ftdf_on_off_regmap_macMaxCSMABackoffs
7191  *
7192  * CSMA-CA: Maximum number of CSMA-CA backoffs (range 0-5)
7193  */
7194 #define IND_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_MACMAXCSMABACKOFFS IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_TX_CONTROL_0
7195 #define MSK_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_MACMAXCSMABACKOFFS 0x7000
7196 #define OFF_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_MACMAXCSMABACKOFFS 12
7197 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_MACMAXCSMABACKOFFS 3
7198 
7199 /*
7200  *
7201  * REGISTER: ftdf_on_off_regmap_ftdf_ce
7202  *
7203  * Initialization value: none.
7204  * Access mode: EC-R (composite event)
7205  */
7206 #define IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_FTDF_CE 0x40090250
7207 #define SIZE_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_FTDF_CE 0x4
7208 #define MSK_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_FTDF_CE 0x3f
7209 
7210 /*
7211  *
7212  * Field: ftdf_on_off_regmap_ftdf_ce
7213  *
7214  * Composite service request from ftdf macro (see FR0400 in v40.100.2.41.pdf), set to '1' if the branch currently contributes to the interrupt.
7215  * Bit 0 = unused
7216  * Bit 1 = rx interrupts
7217  * Bit 2 = unused
7218  * Bit 3 = miscelaneous interrupts
7219  * Bit 4 = tx interrupts
7220  * Bit 5 = Reserved
7221  * Upon an interrupt, using the ftdf_ce bits it can be checked which interrupt branch creates this interrupt.
7222  */
7223 #define IND_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_FTDF_CE IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_FTDF_CE
7224 #define MSK_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_FTDF_CE 0x3f
7225 #define OFF_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_FTDF_CE 0
7226 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_FTDF_CE 6
7227 
7228 /*
7229  *
7230  * REGISTER: ftdf_on_off_regmap_ftdf_cm
7231  *
7232  * Initialization value: 0x0 Initialization mask: 0x3f
7233  * Access mode: ECM-RW (composite event mask)
7234  */
7235 #define IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_FTDF_CM 0x40090254
7236 #define SIZE_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_FTDF_CM 0x4
7237 #define MSK_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_FTDF_CM 0x3f
7238 
7239 /*
7240  *
7241  * Field: ftdf_on_off_regmap_ftdf_cm
7242  *
7243  * mask bits for ftf_ce.
7244  * The mask bit is masking when cleared to '0' (default value) and will enable the contribution to the interrupt when set to '1'.
7245  */
7246 #define IND_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_FTDF_CM IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_FTDF_CM
7247 #define MSK_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_FTDF_CM 0x3f
7248 #define OFF_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_FTDF_CM 0
7249 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_FTDF_CM 6
7250 
7251 /*
7252  *
7253  * REGISTER: ftdf_on_off_regmap_SyncTimeStampThr
7254  *
7255  * Initialization value: 0x0 Initialization mask: 0x1ffffff
7256  * Access mode: C-RW (control - read/write)
7257  */
7258 #define IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_SYNCTIMESTAMPTHR 0x40090304
7259 #define SIZE_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_SYNCTIMESTAMPTHR 0x4
7260 #define MSK_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_SYNCTIMESTAMPTHR 0x1ffffff
7261 
7262 /*
7263  *
7264  * Field: ftdf_on_off_regmap_SyncTimeStampThr
7265  *
7266  * Threshold for synchronize the timestamp counter: at this value of the event counter the synchronization of the timestamp (symbol) counter is done (if SyncTimeStampEna is set to '1').
7267  * If SyncTimeStamp_e is set to '1' the synchronization has taken place.
7268  */
7269 #define IND_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_SYNCTIMESTAMPTHR IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_SYNCTIMESTAMPTHR
7270 #define MSK_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_SYNCTIMESTAMPTHR 0x1ffffff
7271 #define OFF_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_SYNCTIMESTAMPTHR 0
7272 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_SYNCTIMESTAMPTHR 25
7273 
7274 /*
7275  *
7276  * REGISTER: ftdf_on_off_regmap_SyncTimeStampVal
7277  *
7278  * Initialization value: 0x0 Initialization mask: 0xffffffff
7279  * Access mode: C-RW (control - read/write)
7280  */
7281 #define IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_SYNCTIMESTAMPVAL 0x40090308
7282 #define SIZE_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_SYNCTIMESTAMPVAL 0x4
7283 #define MSK_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_SYNCTIMESTAMPVAL 0xffffffff
7284 
7285 /*
7286  *
7287  * Field: ftdf_on_off_regmap_SyncTimeStampVal
7288  *
7289  * Value to synchronize the timestamp counter with at the moment indicated by SyncTimeStampThr.
7290  */
7291 #define IND_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_SYNCTIMESTAMPVAL IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_SYNCTIMESTAMPVAL
7292 #define MSK_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_SYNCTIMESTAMPVAL 0xffffffff
7293 #define OFF_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_SYNCTIMESTAMPVAL 0
7294 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_SYNCTIMESTAMPVAL 32
7295 
7296 /*
7297  *
7298  * REGISTER: ftdf_on_off_regmap_SyncTimeStampPhaseVal
7299  *
7300  * Initialization value: 0x0 Initialization mask: 0xff
7301  * Access mode: C-RW (control - read/write)
7302  */
7303 #define IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_SYNCTIMESTAMPPHASEVAL 0x40090320
7304 #define SIZE_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_SYNCTIMESTAMPPHASEVAL 0x4
7305 #define MSK_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_SYNCTIMESTAMPPHASEVAL 0xff
7306 
7307 /*
7308  *
7309  * Field: ftdf_on_off_regmap_SyncTimeStampPhaseVal
7310  *
7311  * Value to synchronize the timestamp counter phase with at the moment indicated by SyncTimeStampThr.
7312  * Please note the +1 correction needed for most accurate result (+0.5 is than the average error, resulting is a just too fast clock).
7313  */
7314 #define IND_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_SYNCTIMESTAMPPHASEVAL IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_SYNCTIMESTAMPPHASEVAL
7315 #define MSK_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_SYNCTIMESTAMPPHASEVAL 0xff
7316 #define OFF_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_SYNCTIMESTAMPPHASEVAL 0
7317 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_SYNCTIMESTAMPPHASEVAL 8
7318 
7319 /*
7320  *
7321  * REGISTER: ftdf_on_off_regmap_timer_control_1
7322  *
7323  * Initialization value: 0x0 Initialization mask: 0x2
7324  * Access mode: C-RW (control - read/write)
7325  */
7326 #define IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_TIMER_CONTROL_1 0x4009030c
7327 #define SIZE_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_TIMER_CONTROL_1 0x4
7328 #define MSK_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_TIMER_CONTROL_1 0x2
7329 
7330 /*
7331  *
7332  * Bit: ftdf_on_off_regmap_SyncTimeStampEna
7333  *
7334  * If set to '1', the synchronization of the timestamp counter after a deep-sleep cycle will be performed when SyncTimeStampThr matches the value of the event (wake-up) counter.
7335  */
7336 #define IND_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_SYNCTIMESTAMPENA IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_TIMER_CONTROL_1
7337 #define MSK_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_SYNCTIMESTAMPENA 0x2
7338 #define OFF_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_SYNCTIMESTAMPENA 1
7339 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_SYNCTIMESTAMPENA 1
7340 
7341 /*
7342  *
7343  * REGISTER: ftdf_on_off_regmap_macTxStdAckFrmCnt
7344  *
7345  * Initialization value: none.
7346  * Access mode: S-R (state - read)
7347  */
7348 #define IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_MACTXSTDACKFRMCNT 0x40090310
7349 #define SIZE_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_MACTXSTDACKFRMCNT 0x4
7350 #define MSK_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_MACTXSTDACKFRMCNT 0xffffffff
7351 
7352 /*
7353  *
7354  * Field: ftdf_on_off_regmap_macTxStdAckFrmCnt
7355  *
7356  * Traffic counter: the number of standard Acknowledgment frames transmitted after the last deep-sleep cycle.
7357  */
7358 #define IND_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_MACTXSTDACKFRMCNT IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_MACTXSTDACKFRMCNT
7359 #define MSK_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_MACTXSTDACKFRMCNT 0xffffffff
7360 #define OFF_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_MACTXSTDACKFRMCNT 0
7361 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_MACTXSTDACKFRMCNT 32
7362 
7363 /*
7364  *
7365  * REGISTER: ftdf_on_off_regmap_macRxStdAckFrmOkCnt
7366  *
7367  * Initialization value: none.
7368  * Access mode: S-R (state - read)
7369  */
7370 #define IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_MACRXSTDACKFRMOKCNT 0x40090314
7371 #define SIZE_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_MACRXSTDACKFRMOKCNT 0x4
7372 #define MSK_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_MACRXSTDACKFRMOKCNT 0xffffffff
7373 
7374 /*
7375  *
7376  * Field: ftdf_on_off_regmap_macRxStdAckFrmOkCnt
7377  *
7378  * Traffic counter: the number of Standard Acknowledgment frames received after the last deep-sleep cycle.
7379  */
7380 #define IND_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_MACRXSTDACKFRMOKCNT IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_MACRXSTDACKFRMOKCNT
7381 #define MSK_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_MACRXSTDACKFRMOKCNT 0xffffffff
7382 #define OFF_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_MACRXSTDACKFRMOKCNT 0
7383 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_MACRXSTDACKFRMOKCNT 32
7384 
7385 /*
7386  *
7387  * REGISTER: ftdf_on_off_regmap_macRxAddrFailFrmCnt
7388  *
7389  * Initialization value: none.
7390  * Access mode: S-R (state - read)
7391  */
7392 #define IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_MACRXADDRFAILFRMCNT 0x40090318
7393 #define SIZE_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_MACRXADDRFAILFRMCNT 0x4
7394 #define MSK_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_MACRXADDRFAILFRMCNT 0xffffffff
7395 
7396 /*
7397  *
7398  * Field: ftdf_on_off_regmap_macRxAddrFailFrmCnt
7399  *
7400  * Traffic counter: the number of frames discarded due to incorrect address or PAN Id after the last deep-sleep cycle.
7401  */
7402 #define IND_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_MACRXADDRFAILFRMCNT IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_MACRXADDRFAILFRMCNT

7404 #define OFF_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_MACRXADDRFAILFRMCNT 0
7405 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_MACRXADDRFAILFRMCNT 32
7406 
7407 /*
7408  *
7409  * REGISTER: ftdf_on_off_regmap_macRxUnsupFrmCnt
7410  *
7411  * Initialization value: none.
7412  * Access mode: S-R (state - read)
7413  */
7414 #define IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_MACRXUNSUPFRMCNT 0x4009031c
7415 #define SIZE_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_MACRXUNSUPFRMCNT 0x4
7416 #define MSK_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_MACRXUNSUPFRMCNT 0xffffffff
7417 
7418 /*
7419  *
7420  * Field: ftdf_on_off_regmap_macRxUnsupFrmCnt
7421  *
7422  * Traffic counter: the number of frames which do pass the checks but are not supported after the last deep-sleep cycle.
7423  */
7424 #define IND_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_MACRXUNSUPFRMCNT IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_MACRXUNSUPFRMCNT

7426 #define OFF_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_MACRXUNSUPFRMCNT 0

7428 
7429 /*
7430  *
7431  * REGISTER: ftdf_on_off_regmap_macFCSErrorCount
7432  *
7433  * Initialization value: none.
7434  * Access mode: S-R (state - read)
7435  */
7436 #define IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_MACFCSERRORCOUNT 0x40090340
7437 #define SIZE_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_MACFCSERRORCOUNT 0x4
7438 #define MSK_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_MACFCSERRORCOUNT 0xffffffff
7439 
7440 /*
7441  *
7442  * Field: ftdf_on_off_regmap_macFCSErrorCount
7443  *
7444  * metrics counter: the number of received frames that were discarded due to an incorrect FCS after the last deep-sleep cycle.
7445  */
7446 #define IND_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_MACFCSERRORCOUNT IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_MACFCSERRORCOUNT
7447 #define MSK_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_MACFCSERRORCOUNT 0xffffffff
7448 #define OFF_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_MACFCSERRORCOUNT 0
7449 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_MACFCSERRORCOUNT 32
7450 
7451 /*
7452  *
7453  * REGISTER: ftdf_on_off_regmap_LmacReset
7454  *
7455  * Initialization value: 0x0 Initialization mask: 0x106df
7456  * Access mode: OS-W (one-shot - write)
7457  */
7458 #define IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMACRESET 0x40090360
7459 #define SIZE_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMACRESET 0x4
7460 #define MSK_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMACRESET 0x106df
7461 
7462 /*
7463  *
7464  * Bit: ftdf_on_off_regmap_LmacReset_control
7465  *
7466  * LmacReset_control: A '1' resets LMAC Controller (for debug and MLME-reset)
7467  */
7468 #define IND_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMACRESET_CONTROL IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMACRESET
7469 #define MSK_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMACRESET_CONTROL 0x1
7470 #define OFF_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMACRESET_CONTROL 0
7471 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMACRESET_CONTROL 1
7472 /*
7473  *
7474  * Bit: ftdf_on_off_regmap_LmacReset_rx
7475  *
7476  * LmacReset_rx: A '1' resets LMAC rx pipeline (for debug and MLME-reset)
7477  */
7478 #define IND_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMACRESET_RX IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMACRESET
7479 #define MSK_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMACRESET_RX 0x2
7480 #define OFF_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMACRESET_RX 1
7481 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMACRESET_RX 1
7482 /*
7483  *
7484  * Bit: ftdf_on_off_regmap_LmacReset_tx
7485  *
7486  * LmacReset_tx: A '1' resets LMAC tx pipeline (for debug and MLME-reset)
7487  */
7488 #define IND_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMACRESET_TX IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMACRESET
7489 #define MSK_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMACRESET_TX 0x4
7490 #define OFF_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMACRESET_TX 2
7491 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMACRESET_TX 1
7492 /*
7493  *
7494  * Bit: ftdf_on_off_regmap_LmacReset_ahb
7495  *
7496  * LmacReset_ahb: A '1' resets LMAC ahb interface (for debug and MLME-reset)
7497  */
7498 #define IND_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMACRESET_AHB IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMACRESET
7499 #define MSK_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMACRESET_AHB 0x8
7500 #define OFF_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMACRESET_AHB 3
7501 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMACRESET_AHB 1
7502 /*
7503  *
7504  * Bit: ftdf_on_off_regmap_LmacReset_oreg
7505  *
7506  * LmacReset_oreg: A '1' resets LMAC on_off regmap (for debug and MLME-reset)
7507  *
7508  * #$LmacReset_areg@on_off_regmap
7509  * #LmacReset_areg: A '1' Resets LMAC always_on regmap (for debug and MLME-reset)
7510  */
7511 #define IND_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMACRESET_OREG IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMACRESET
7512 #define MSK_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMACRESET_OREG 0x10
7513 #define OFF_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMACRESET_OREG 4
7514 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMACRESET_OREG 1
7515 /*
7516  *
7517  * Bit: ftdf_on_off_regmap_LmacReset_tstim
7518  *
7519  * LmacReset_tstim: A '1' resets LMAC timestamp timer (for debug and MLME-reset)
7520  */
7521 #define IND_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMACRESET_TSTIM IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMACRESET
7522 #define MSK_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMACRESET_TSTIM 0x40
7523 #define OFF_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMACRESET_TSTIM 6
7524 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMACRESET_TSTIM 1
7525 /*
7526  *
7527  * Bit: ftdf_on_off_regmap_LmacReset_sec
7528  *
7529  * LmacReset_sec: A '1' resets LMAC security (for debug and MLME-reset)
7530  *
7531  * #$LmacReset_wutim@on_off_regmap
7532  * #LmacReset_wutim: A '1' Resets LMAC wake-up timer (for debug and MLME-reset)
7533  */
7534 #define IND_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMACRESET_SEC IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMACRESET
7535 #define MSK_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMACRESET_SEC 0x80
7536 #define OFF_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMACRESET_SEC 7
7537 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMACRESET_SEC 1
7538 /*
7539  *
7540  * Bit: ftdf_on_off_regmap_LmacReset_count
7541  *
7542  * LmacReset_count: A '1' resets LMAC mac counters (for debug and MLME-reset)
7543  */
7544 #define IND_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMACRESET_COUNT IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMACRESET
7545 #define MSK_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMACRESET_COUNT 0x200
7546 #define OFF_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMACRESET_COUNT 9
7547 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMACRESET_COUNT 1
7548 /*
7549  *
7550  * Bit: ftdf_on_off_regmap_LmacReset_timctrl
7551  *
7552  * LmacReset_count: A '1' resets LMAC timing control block (for debug and MLME-reset)
7553  */
7554 #define IND_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMACRESET_TIMCTRL IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMACRESET
7555 #define MSK_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMACRESET_TIMCTRL 0x400
7556 #define OFF_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMACRESET_TIMCTRL 10
7557 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMACRESET_TIMCTRL 1
7558 /*
7559  *
7560  * Bit: ftdf_on_off_regmap_LmacGlobReset_count
7561  *
7562  * If set, the LMAC performance and traffic counters will be reset.
7563  * Use this register for functionally reset these counters.
7564  */
7565 #define IND_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMACGLOBRESET_COUNT IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMACRESET
7566 #define MSK_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMACGLOBRESET_COUNT 0x10000
7567 #define OFF_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMACGLOBRESET_COUNT 16
7568 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_LMACGLOBRESET_COUNT 1
7569 
7570 /*
7571  *
7572  * REGISTER: ftdf_on_off_regmap_wakeup_control_os
7573  *
7574  * Initialization value: 0x0 Initialization mask: 0x3
7575  * Access mode: OS-W (one-shot - write)
7576  */
7577 #define IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_WAKEUP_CONTROL_OS 0x40090364
7578 #define SIZE_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_WAKEUP_CONTROL_OS 0x4
7579 #define MSK_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_WAKEUP_CONTROL_OS 0x3
7580 
7581 /*
7582  *
7583  * Bit: ftdf_on_off_regmap_WakeupTimerEnable_set
7584  *
7585  * If set, WakeupTimerEnableStatus will be set.
7586  */
7587 #define IND_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_WAKEUPTIMERENABLE_SET IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_WAKEUP_CONTROL_OS
7588 #define MSK_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_WAKEUPTIMERENABLE_SET 0x1
7589 #define OFF_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_WAKEUPTIMERENABLE_SET 0
7590 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_WAKEUPTIMERENABLE_SET 1
7591 /*
7592  *
7593  * Bit: ftdf_on_off_regmap_WakeupTimerEnable_clear
7594  *
7595  * If set, WakeupTimerEnableStatus will be cleared.
7596  */
7597 #define IND_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_WAKEUPTIMERENABLE_CLEAR IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_WAKEUP_CONTROL_OS
7598 #define MSK_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_WAKEUPTIMERENABLE_CLEAR 0x2
7599 #define OFF_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_WAKEUPTIMERENABLE_CLEAR 1
7600 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_WAKEUPTIMERENABLE_CLEAR 1
7601 
7602 /*
7603  *
7604  * REGISTER: ftdf_on_off_regmap_SymbolTimeThr
7605  *

7607  * Access mode: C-RW (control - read/write)
7608  */
7609 #define IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_SYMBOLTIMETHR 0x40090380
7610 #define SIZE_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_SYMBOLTIMETHR 0x4
7611 #define MSK_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_SYMBOLTIMETHR 0xffffffff
7612 
7613 /*
7614  *
7615  * Field: ftdf_on_off_regmap_SymbolTimeThr

7617  * Symboltime Threshold to generate a general interrupt when this value matches the symbol counter value.
7618  */

7621 #define OFF_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_SYMBOLTIMETHR 0

7634

7636  *
7637  * Field: ftdf_on_off_regmap_SymbolTime2Thr
7638  *
7639  * Symboltime 2 Threshold to generate a general interrupt when this value matches the symbol counter value.
7640  */
7641 #define IND_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_SYMBOLTIME2THR IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_SYMBOLTIME2THR
7642 #define MSK_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_SYMBOLTIME2THR 0xffffffff
7643 #define OFF_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_SYMBOLTIME2THR 0
