7646 /*
7647  *
7648  * REGISTER: ftdf_on_off_regmap_DebugControl
7649  *
7650  * Initialization value: 0x0 Initialization mask: 0x1ff
7651  * Access mode: C-RW (control - read/write)
7652  */
7653 #define IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_DEBUGCONTROL 0x40090390
7654 #define SIZE_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_DEBUGCONTROL 0x4
7655 #define MSK_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_DEBUGCONTROL 0x1ff
7656 
7657 /*
7658  *
7659  * Bit: ftdf_on_off_regmap_dbg_rx_input
7660  *
7661  * If set to '1', the Rx debug interface will be selected as input for the Rx pipeline rather than the DPHY interface signals.
7662  * Note that in this mode, DBG_RX_DATA[3:0] and DBG_RX_SOF are sourced by another source (outside the scope of the LMAC) while the other Rx inputs (CCA_STAT, LQI[7:0] and ED_STAT[7:0]) are forced to 0x00.
7663  */
7664 #define IND_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_DBG_RX_INPUT IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_DEBUGCONTROL
7665 #define MSK_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_DBG_RX_INPUT 0x100
7666 #define OFF_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_DBG_RX_INPUT 8
7667 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_DBG_RX_INPUT 1
7668 /*
7669  *
7670  * Field: ftdf_on_off_regmap_dbg_control
7671  *
7672  * Control of the debug interface:
7673  *
7674  * dbg_control 0x00 Not used
7675  * diagnose bus bit 7 - 0 = all '0'
7676  *
7677  * dbg_control 0x01 Legacy debug mode
7678  * diagnose bus bit 7 = ed_request
7679  * diagnose bus bit 6 = gen_irq
7680  * diagnose bus bit 5 = tx_en
7681  * diagnose bus bit 4 = rx_en
7682  * diagnose bus bit 3 = phy_en
7683  * diagnose bus bit 2 = tx_valid
7684  * diagnose bus bit 1 = rx_sof
7685  * diagnose bus bit 0 = rx_eof
7686  *
7687  * dbg_control 0x02 Clocks and reset
7688  * diagnose bus bit 7-3 = "00000"
7689  * diagnose bus bit 2 = lp_clk divide by 2
7690  * diagnose bus bit 1 = mac_clk divide by 2
7691  * diagnose bus bit 0 = hclk divided by 2
7692  *
7693  * dbg_control in range 0x02 - 0x0f Not used
7694  * diagnose bus bit 7 - 0 = all '0'
7695  *
7696  * dbg_control in range 0x10 - 0x1f Debug rx pipeline
7697  *
7698  * 0x10 Rx phy signals
7699  * diagnose_bus bit 7 = rx_enable towards the rx_pipeline
7700  * diagnose bus bit 6 = rx_sof from phy
7701  * diagnose bus bit 5-2 = rx_data from phy
7702  * diagnose bus bit 1 = rx_eof to phy
7703  * diagnose bus bit 0 = rx_sof event from rx_mac_timing block
7704  *
7705  * 0x11 Rx sof and length
7706  * diagnose_bus bit 7 = rx_sof
7707  * diagnose bus bit 6-0 = rx_mac_length from rx_mac_timing block
7708  *
7709  * 0x12 Rx mac timing output
7710  * diagnose_bus bit 7 = Enable from rx_mac_timing block
7711  * diagnose bus bit 6 = Sop from rx_mac_timing block
7712  * diagnose bus bit 5 = Eop from rx_mac_timing block
7713  * diagnose bus bit 4 = Crc from rx_mac_timing block
7714  * diagnose bus bit 3 = Err from rx_mac_timing block
7715  * diagnose bus bit 2 = Drop from rx_mac_timing block
7716  * diagnose bus bit 1 = Forward from rx_mac_timing block
7717  * diagnose bus bit 0 = rx_sof
7718  *
7719  * 0x13 Rx mac frame parser output
7720  * diagnose_bus bit 7 = Enable from mac_frame_parser block
7721  * diagnose bus bit 6 = Sop from mac_frame_parser block
7722  * diagnose bus bit 5 = Eop from mac_frame_parser block
7723  * diagnose bus bit 4 = Crc from mac_frame_parser block
7724  * diagnose bus bit 3 = Err from mac_frame_parser block
7725  * diagnose bus bit 2 = Drop from mac_frame_parser block
7726  * diagnose bus bit 1 = Forward from mac_frame_parser block
7727  * diagnose bus bit 0 = rx_sof
7728  *
7729  * 0x14 Rx status to Umac
7730  * diagnose_bus bit 7 = rx_frame_stat_umac.crc16_error
7731  * diagnose bus bit 6 = rx_frame_stat_umac.res_frm_type_error
7732  * diagnose bus bit 5 = rx_frame_stat_umac.res_frm_version_error
7733  * diagnose bus bit 4 = rx_frame_stat_umac.dpanid_error
7734  * diagnose bus bit 3 = rx_frame_stat_umac.daddr_error
7735  * diagnose bus bit 2 = rx_frame_stat_umac.spanid_error
7736  * diagnose bus bit 1 = rx_frame_stat_umac.ispan_coord_error
7737  * diagnose bus bit 0 = rx_sof
7738  *
7739  * 0x15 Rx status to lmac
7740  * diagnose_bus bit 7 = rx_frame_stat.packet_valid
7741  * diagnose bus bit 6 = rx_frame_stat.rx_sof_e
7742  * diagnose bus bit 5 = rx_frame_stat.rx_eof_e
7743  * diagnose bus bit 4 = rx_frame_stat.wakeup_frame
7744  * diagnose bus bit 3-1 = rx_frame_stat.frame_type
7745  * diagnose bus bit 0 = rx_frame_stat.rx_sqnr_valid
7746  *
7747  * 0x16 Rx buffer control
7748  * diagnose_bus bit 7-4 = prov_from_swio.rx_read_buf_ptr
7749  * diagnose bus bit 3-0 = stat_to_swio.rx_write_buf_ptr
7750  *
7751  * 0x17 Rx interrupts
7752  * diagnose_bus bit 7 = stat_to_swio.rx_buf_avail_e
7753  * diagnose bus bit 6 = stat_to_swio.rx_buf_full
7754  * diagnose bus bit 5 = stat_to_swio.rx_buf_overflow_e
7755  * diagnose bus bit 4 = stat_to_swio.rx_sof_e
7756  * diagnose bus bit 3 = stat_to_swio.rxbyte_e
7757  * diagnose bus bit 2 = rx_frame_ctrl.rx_enable
7758  * diagnose bus bit 1 = rx_eof
7759  * diagnose bus bit 0 = rx_sof
7760  *
7761  * 0x18 diagnose_bus bit 7-3 =
7762  * Prt statements mac frame parser
7763  * 0 Reset
7764  * 1 Multipurpose frame with no dpanid and macImplicitBroadcast is false and not pan cooordinator dropped
7765  * 2 Multipurpose frame with no dest address and macImplicitBroadcast is false and not pan cooordinator dropped
7766  * 3 RX unsupported frame type detected
7767  * 4 RX non Beacon frame detected and dropped in RxBeaconOnly mode
7768  * 5 RX frame passed due to macAlwaysPassFrmType set
7769  * 6 RX unsupported da_mode = 01 for frame_version 0x0- detected
7770  * 7 RX unsupported sa_mode = 01 for frame_version 0x0- detected
7771  * 8 Data or command frame with no dpanid and macImplicitBroadcast is false and not pan cooordinator dropped
7772  * 9 Data or command frame with no dest address and macImplicitBroadcast is false and not pan cooordinator dropped
7773  * 10 RX unsupported frame_version detected
7774  * 11 Multipurpose frame with no dpanid and macImplicitBroadcast is false and not pan cooordinator dropped
7775  * 12 Multipurpose frame with no dest address and macImplicitBroadcast is false and not pan cooordinator dropped
7776  * 13 RX unsupported frame_version detected
7777  * 14 RX Destination PAN Id check failed
7778  * 15 RX Destination address (1 byte) check failed
7779  * 16 RX Destination address (2 byte) check failed
7780  * 17 RX Destination address (8 byte) check failed
7781  * 18 RX Source PAN Id check for Beacon frames failed
7782  * 19 RX Source PAN Id check failed
7783  * 20 Auxiliary Security Header security control word received
7784  * 21 Auxiliary Security Header unsupported_legacy received frame_version 00
7785  * 22 Auxiliary Security Header unsupported_legacy security frame_version 11
7786  * 23 Auxiliary Security Header frame counter field received
7787  * 24 Auxiliary Security Header Key identifier field received
7788  * 25 Errored Destination Wakeup frame found send to Umac, not indicated towards lmac controller
7789  * 26 MacAlwaysPassWakeUpFrames = 1, Wakeup frame found send to Umac, not indicated towards lmac controller
7790  * 27 Wakeup frame found send to lmac controller and Umac
7791  * 28 Wakeup frame found send to lmac controller, dropped towards Umac
7792  * 29 Command frame with data_request command received
7793  * 30 Coordinator realignment frame received
7794  * 31 Not Used
7795  * diagnose bus bit 2-0 = frame_type
7796  *
7797  * 0x19 diagnose_bus bit 7-4 =
7798  * Framestates mac frame parser
7799  * 0 idle_state
7800  * 1 fr_ctrl_state
7801  * 2 fr_ctrl_long_state
7802  * 3 seq_nr_state
7803  * 4 dest_pan_id_state
7804  * 5 dest_addr_state
7805  * 6 src_pan_id_state
7806  * 7 src_addr_state
7807  * 8 aux_sec_hdr_state
7808  * 9 hdr_ie_state
7809  * 10 pyld_ie_state
7810  * 11 ignore_state
7811  * 12-16 Not used
7812  * diagnose bus bit 3 = rx_mac_sof_e
7813  * diagnose bus bit 2-0 = frame_type
7814  *
7815  * 0x1a diagnose_bus bit 7 = execute_sa_match
7816  * diagnose_bus bit 6 = sa_match_found (1 clk delayed)
7817  * diagnose_bus bit 5 = prov_from_swio.FP_override
7818  * diagnose_bus bit 4 = fp_mac_drdy
7819  * diagnose_bus bit 3 = fp_mac_ld_strb
7820  * diagnose_bus bit 2-1 = rx_frame_stat_lmac.rx_sa_mode
7821  * diagnose_bus bit 0 = rx_mac_sof_e
7822  *
7823  * 0x1b diagnose_bus bit 7 = execute_sa_match
7824  * diagnose_bus bit 6-2 = fp_mac_addr_cnt
7825  * diagnose_bus bit 1 = fp_bit_decided
7826  * diagnose_bus bit 0 = prov_from_swio.Addr_tab_match_FP_value
7827  *
7828  * 0x1c diagnose_bus bit 7 = execute_sa_match
7829  * diagnose_bus bit 6 = sa_match_found (1 clk delayed)
7830  * diagnose_bus bit 5 = fp_mac_rdata(68): Short_LongNot
7831  * diagnose_bus bit 4-1 = fp_mac_rdata(67 DOWNTO 64): SA valid bits
7832  * diagnose_bus bit 0 = fp_mac_rdata(0): least significant bit from FPPR
7833  *
7834  * 0x1d diagnose_bus bit 7 = execute_sa_match
7835  * diagnose_bus bit 6 = sa_match_found (1 clk delayed)
7836  * diagnose_bus bit 5-0 = fp_mac_rdata(5 DOWNTO 0): 6 least significant bits from FPPR
7837  *
7838  * 0x1e-0x1f Not Used
7839  * diagnose bus bit 7-0 = all '0'
7840  *
7841  * dbg_control in range 0x20 - 0x2f Debug tx pipeline
7842  * 0x20 Top and bottom interfaces tx datapath
7843  * diagnose_bus bit 7 = tx_mac_ld_strb
7844  * diagnose bus bit 6 = tx_mac_drdy
7845  * diagnose bus bit 5 = tx_valid
7846  * diagnose bus bit 4-1 = tx_data
7847  * diagnose bus bit 0 = symbol_ena
7848  *
7849  * 0x21 Control signals for tx datapath
7850  * diagnose_bus bit 7 = TxTransparentMode
7851  * diagnose bus bit 6 = ctrl_lmac_to_tx.CRC16_ena
7852  * diagnose bus bit 5 = ctrl_lmac_to_tx.tx_start
7853  * diagnose bus bit 4 = ctrl_lmac_to_tx.gen_ack
7854  * diagnose bus bit 3 = ctrl_lmac_to_tx.gen_wu
7855  * diagnose bus bit 2-1 = ctrl_lmac_to_tx.tx_frame_nmbr
7856  * diagnose bus bit 0 = tx_valid
7857  *
7858  * 0x22 Control signals for wakeup frames
7859  * diagnose_bus bit 7 = ctrl_lmac_to_tx.tx_start
7860  * diagnose bus bit 6 = ctrl_lmac_to_tx.gen_wu
7861  * diagnose bus bit 5-1 = ctrl_lmac_to_tx.gen_wu_RZ(4 DOWNTO 0)
7862  * diagnose bus bit 0 = ctrl_tx_to_lmac.tx_rz_zero
7863  *
7864  * 0x23 Data signals for wakeup frame
7865  * diagnose_bus bit 7 = ctrl_lmac_to_tx.tx_start
7866  * diagnose bus bit 6 = ctrl_lmac_to_tx.gen_wu
7867  * diagnose bus bit 5 = tx_valid
7868  * diagnose bus bit 4-1 = tx_data
7869  * diagnose bus bit 0 = ctrl_tx_to_lmac.tx_rz_zero
7870  *
7871  * 0x24 Data and control ack frame
7872  * diagnose_bus bit 7 = ctrl_lmac_to_tx.tx_start
7873  * diagnose bus bit 6 = ctrl_lmac_to_tx.gen_ack
7874  * diagnose bus bit 5 = tx_valid
7875  * diagnose bus bit 4-1 = tx_data
7876  * diagnose bus bit 0 = symbol_ena
7877  *
7878  * 0x25 FP bit decision
7879  * diagnose_bus bit 7 = fp_bit_decided
7880  * diagnose bus bit 6 = execute_sa_match
7881  * diagnose bus bit 5 = ctrl_lmac_to_tx.rx_fp_decided
7882  * diagnose bus bit 4-3 = ctrl_lmac_to_tx.rx_sa_mode
7883  * diagnose bus bit 2 = swio_to_lmac_tx.FP_override
7884  * diagnose bus bit 1 = swio_to_lmac_tx.FP_force_value
7885  * diagnose bus bit 0 = tx_valid
7886  *
7887  * 0x2a Event counter, 8 least significant bits, synchronized to mac_clk
7888  *
7889  * 0x2b symbol counter, 8 fore most least significant bits (15 downto 8)
7890  *
7891  * 0x2c symbol counter, 8 least significant bits (7 downto 0)
7892  *
7893  *
7894  * dbg_control in range 0x2e - 0x3f Debug lmac_controller
7895  * 0x2d Not Used
7896  * diagnose bus bit 7-0 = all '0'
7897  *
7898  * 0x23 Phy_transaction last minute changes due to corner cases
7899  * diagnose_bus bit 7 = phy_transaction
7900  * diagnose_bus bit 6 = symbol_timer_preset
7901  * diagnose_bus bit 5 = symbol_timer_almost_ready
7902  * diagnose_bus bit 4 = csl_idle_rx
7903  * diagnose_bus bit 3 = csl_data_rx
7904  * diagnose_bus bit 2 = rx_enable_os_capt
7905  * diagnose_bus bit 1 = rx_enable_os_capt_done
7906  * diagnose_bus bit 0 = phy_en_ready
7907  *
7908  * 0x2f Phy control in combination with arbiter state machine
7909  * diagnose_bus bit 7 = phy_transaction
7910  * diagnose_bus bit 6 = arb_phy_trans_res_store
7911  * diagnose_bus bit 5-0 = arb_debug_info
7912  *
7913  * 0x30 Phy signals
7914  * diagnose_bus bit 7 = phy_en
7915  * diagnose bus bit 6 = tx_en
7916  * diagnose bus bit 5 = rx_en
7917  * diagnose bus bit 4-1 = phyattr(3 downto 0)
7918  * diagnose bus bit 0 = ed_request
7919  *
7920  * 0x31 Phy enable and detailed statemachine info
7921  * diagnose_bus bit 7 = phy_en
7922  * diagnose bus bit 6-0 = prt statements detailed statemachine info
7923  * 0 Reset
7924  * 1 MAIN_STATE_IDLE TX_ACKnowledgement frame skip CSMA_CA
7925  * 2 MAIN_STATE_IDLE : Wake-Up frame resides in buffer no
7926  * 3 MAIN_STATE_IDLE : TX frame in TSCH mode
7927  * 4 MAIN_STATE_IDLE : TX frame
7928  * 5 MAIN_STATE_IDLE : goto SINGLE_CCA
7929  * 6 MAIN_STATE_IDLE : goto Energy Detection
7930  * 7 MAIN_STATE_IDLE : goto RX
7931  * 8 MAIN_STATE_IDLE de-assert phy_en wait for
7932  * 9 MAIN_STATE_IDLE Start phy_en and assert phy_en wait for :
7933  * 10 MAIN_STATE_CSMA_CA_WAIT_FOR_METADATA framenr :
7934  * 11 MAIN_STATE_CSMA_CA framenr :
7935  * 12 MAIN_STATE_CSMA_CA start CSMA_CA
7936  * 14 MAIN_STATE_CSMA_CA skip CSMA_CA
7937  * 15 MAIN_STATE_WAIT_FOR_CSMA_CA csma_ca Failed for CSL mode
7938  * 16 MAIN_STATE_WAIT_FOR_CSMA_CA csma_ca Failed
7939  * 17 MAIN_STATE_WAIT_FOR_CSMA_CA csma_ca Success
7940  * 18 MAIN_STATE_SINGLE_CCA cca failed
7941  * 19 MAIN_STATE_SINGLE_CCA cca ok
7942  * 20 MAIN_STATE_WAIT_ACK_DELAY wait time elapsed
7943  * 21 MAIN_STATE_WAIT ACK_DELAY : Send Ack in TSCH mode
7944  * 22 MAIN_STATE_WAIT ACK_DELAY : Ack not scheduled in time in TSCH mode
7945  * 23 MAIN_STATE_TSCH_TX_FRAME macTSRxTx time elapsed
7946  * 24 MAIN_STATE_TX_FRAME it is CSL mode, start the WU seq for macWUPeriod
7947  * 25 MAIN_STATE_TX_FRAME1
7948  * 26 MAIN_STATE_TX_FRAME_W1 exit, waited for :
7949  * 27 MAIN_STATE_TX_FRAME_W2 exit, waited for :
7950  * 28 MAIN_STATE_TX_WAIT_LAST_SYMBOL exit
7951  * 29 MAIN_STATE_TX_RAMPDOWN_W exit, waited for :
7952  * 30 MAIN_STATE_TX_PHYTRXWAIT exit, waited for :
7953  * 31 MAIN_STATE_GEN_IFS , Ack with frame pending received
7954  * 32 MAIN_STATE_GEN_IFS , Ack requested but DisRXackReceivedca is set
7955  * 33 MAIN_STATE_GEN_IFS , instead of generating an IFS, switch the rx-on for an ACK
7956  * 34 MAIN_STATE_GEN_IFS , generating an SIFS (Short Inter Frame Space)
7957  * 35 MAIN_STATE_GEN_IFS , generating an LIFS (Long Inter Frame Space)
7958  * 36 MAIN_STATE_GEN_IFS_FINISH in CSL mode, 'cslperiod_timer_ready' is ready sent the data frame
7959  * 37 MAIN_STATE_GEN_IFS_FINISH in CSL mode, 'Rendezvous zero time not yet transmitted sent another WU frame
7960  * 38 MAIN_STATE_GEN_IFS_FINISH exit, corrected for :
7961  * 39 MAIN_STATE_GEN_IFS_FINISH in CSL mode, rx_resume_after_tx is set
7962  * 40 MAIN_STATE_SENT_STATUS CSLMode wu_sequence_done_flag :
7963  * 41 MAIN_STATE_ADD_DELAY exit, goto RX for frame pending time
7964  * 42 MAIN_STATE_ADD_DELAY exit, goto IDLE
7965  * 43 MAIN_STATE_RX switch the RX from off to on
7966  * 44 MAIN_STATE_RX_WAIT_PHYRXSTART waited for
7967  * 45 MAIN_STATE_RX_WAIT_PHYRXLATENCY start the MacAckDuration timer
7968  * 46 MAIN_STATE_RX_WAIT_PHYRXLATENCY start the ack wait timer
7969  * 47 MAIN_STATE_RX_WAIT_PHYRXLATENCY NORMAL mode : start rx_duration
7970  * 48 MAIN_STATE_RX_WAIT_PHYRXLATENCY TSCH mode : start macTSRxWait (macTSRxWait) timer
7971  * 49 MAIN_STATE_RX_WAIT_PHYRXLATENCY CSL mode : start the csl_rx_duration (macCSLsamplePeriod) timer
7972  * 50 MAIN_STATE_RX_WAIT_PHYRXLATENCY CSL mode : start the csl_rx_duration (macCSLdataPeriod) timer
7973  * 51 MAIN_STATE_RX_CHK_EXPIRED 1 ackwait_timer_ready or ack_received_ind
7974  * 52 MAIN_STATE_RX_CHK_EXPIRED 2 normal_mode. ACK with FP bit set, start frame pending timer
7975  * 54 MAIN_STATE_RX_CHK_EXPIRED 4 RxAlwaysOn is set to 0
7976  * 55 MAIN_STATE_RX_CHK_EXPIRED 5 TSCH mode valid frame rxed
7977  * 56 MAIN_STATE_RX_CHK_EXPIRED 6 TSCH mode macTSRxwait expired
7978  * 57 MAIN_STATE_RX_CHK_EXPIRED 7 macCSLsamplePeriod timer ready
7979  * 58 MAIN_STATE_RX_CHK_EXPIRED 8 csl_mode. Data frame recieved with FP bit set, increment RX duration time
7980  * 59 MAIN_STATE_RX_CHK_EXPIRED 9 CSL mode : Received wu frame in data listening period restart macCSLdataPeriod timer
7981  * 60 MAIN_STATE_RX_CHK_EXPIRED 10 csl_rx_duration_ready or csl data frame received:
7982  * 61 MAIN_STATE_RX_CHK_EXPIRED 11 normal_mode. FP bit is set, start frame pending timer
7983  * 62 MAIN_STATE_RX_CHK_EXPIRED 12 normal mode rx_duration_timer_ready and frame_pending_timer_ready
7984  * 63 MAIN_STATE_RX_CHK_EXPIRED 13 acknowledge frame requested
7985  * 64 MAIN_STATE_RX_CHK_EXPIRED 14 Interrupt to sent a frame. found_tx_packet
7986  * 65 MAIN_STATE_CSL_RX_IDLE_END RZ time is far away, switch receiver Off and wait for csl_rx_rz_time before switching on
7987  * 66 MAIN_STATE_CSL_RX_IDLE_END RZ time is not so far away, keep receiver On and wait for
7988  * 67 MAIN_STATE_RX_START_PHYRXSTOP ack with fp received keep rx on
7989  * 68 MAIN_STATE_RX_START_PHYRXSTOP switch the RX from on to off
7990  * 69 MAIN_STATE_RX_WAIT_PHYRXSTOP acknowledge done : switch back to finish TX
7991  * 70 MAIN_STATE_RX_WAIT_PHYRXSTOP switch the RX off
7992  * 71 MAIN_STATE_ED switch the RX from off to on
7993  * 72 MAIN_STATE_ED_WAIT_PHYRXSTART waited for phyRxStartup
7994  * 73 MAIN_STATE_ED_WAIT_EDSCANDURATION waited for EdScanDuration
7995  * 74 MAIN_STATE_ED_WAIT_PHYRXSTOP end of Energy Detection, got IDLE
7996  * 75 MAIN_STATE_IDLE, use_legacy_phy_en = '0', rx_enable_os_capt detected and not yet 1 us 101 of PHY_EN done.
7997  * 76 - 127 Not used
7998  *
7999  * 0x32 RX enable and detailed statemachine info
8000  * diagnose_bus bit 7 = rx_en
8001  * diagnose bus bit 6-0 = detailed statemachine info see dbg_control = 0x31
8002  *
8003  * 0x33 TX enable and detailed statemachine info
8004  * diagnose_bus bit 7 = tx_en
8005  * diagnose bus bit 6-0 = detailed statemachine info see dbg_control = 0x31
8006  *
8007  * 0x34 Phy enable, TX enable and Rx enable and state machine states
8008  * diagnose_bus bit 7 = phy_en
8009  * diagnose_bus bit 6 = tx_en
8010  * diagnose_bus bit 5 = rx_en
8011  * diagnose bus bit 4-0 = State machine states
8012  * 1 MAIN_STATE_IDLE
8013  * 2 MAIN_STATE_CSMA_CA_WAIT_FOR_METADATA
8014  * 3 MAIN_STATE_CSMA_CA
8015  * 4 MAIN_STATE_WAIT_FOR_CSMA_CA_0
8016  * 5 MAIN_STATE_WAIT_FOR_CSMA_CA
8017  * 6 MAIN_STATE_SINGLE_CCA
8018  * 7 MAIN_STATE_WAIT_ACK_DELAY
8019  * 8 MAIN_STATE_TSCH_TX_FRAME
8020  * 9 MAIN_STATE_TX_FRAME
8021  * 10 MAIN_STATE_TX_FRAME1
8022  * 11 MAIN_STATE_TX_FRAME_W1
8023  * 12 MAIN_STATE_TX_FRAME_W2
8024  * 13 MAIN_STATE_TX_WAIT_LAST_SYMBOL
8025  * 14 MAIN_STATE_TX_RAMPDOWN
8026  * 15 MAIN_STATE_TX_RAMPDOWN_W
8027  * 16 MAIN_STATE_TX_PHYTRXWAIT
8028  * 17 MAIN_STATE_GEN_IFS
8029  * 18 MAIN_STATE_GEN_IFS_FINISH
8030  * 19 MAIN_STATE_SENT_STATUS
8031  * 20 MAIN_STATE_ADD_DELAY
8032  * 21 MAIN_STATE_TSCH_RX_ACKDELAY
8033  * 22 MAIN_STATE_RX
8034  * 23 MAIN_STATE_RX_WAIT_PHYRXSTART
8035  * 24 MAIN_STATE_RX_WAIT_PHYRXLATENCY
8036  * 25 MAIN_STATE_RX_CHK_EXPIRED
8037  * 26 MAIN_STATE_CSL_RX_IDLE_END
8038  * 27 MAIN_STATE_RX_START_PHYRXSTOP
8039  * 28 MAIN_STATE_RX_WAIT_PHYRXSTOP
8040  * 29 MAIN_STATE_ED
8041  * 30 MAIN_STATE_ED_WAIT_PHYRXSTART
8042  * 31 MAIN_STATE_ED_WAIT_EDSCANDURATION
8043  *
8044  * 0x35 lmac controller to tx interface with wakeup
8045  * diagnose_bus bit 7 = tx_en
8046  * diagnose_bus bit 6 = rx_en
8047  * diagnose_bus bit 5 = ctrl_lmac_to_tx.gen_wu
8048  * diagnose_bus bit 4 = ctrl_lmac_to_tx.gen_ack
8049  * diagnose_bus bit 3-2 = ctrl_lmac_to_tx.tx_frame_nmbr
8050  * diagnose_bus bit 1 = ctrl_lmac_to_tx.tx_start
8051  * diagnose_bus bit 0 = ctrl_tx_to_lmac.tx_last_symbol
8052  *
8053  * 0x36 lmac controller to tx interface with frame pending
8054  * diagnose_bus bit 7 = tx_en
8055  * diagnose_bus bit 6 = rx_en
8056  * diagnose_bus bit 5 = ctrl_lmac_to_tx.gen.fp_bit
8057  * diagnose_bus bit 4 = ctrl_lmac_to_tx.gen_ack
8058  * diagnose_bus bit 3-2 = ctrl_lmac_to_tx.tx_frame_nmbr
8059  * diagnose_bus bit 1 = ctrl_lmac_to_tx.tx_start
8060  * diagnose_bus bit 0 = ctrl_tx_to_lmac.tx_last_symbol
8061  *
8062  * 0x37 rx pipepline to lmac controller interface
8063  * diagnose_bus bit 7 = tx_en
8064  * diagnose_bus bit 6 = rx_en
8065  * diagnose_bus bit 5 = ctrl_rx_to_lmac.rx_sof_e
8066  * diagnose_bus bit 4 = ctrl_rx_to_lmac.rx_eof_e
8067  * diagnose_bus bit 3 = ctrl_rx_to_lmac.packet_valid
8068  * diagnose_bus bit 2 = ack_received_ind
8069  * diagnose_bus bit 1 = ack_request_ind
8070  * diagnose_bus bit 0 = ctrl_rx_to_lmac.data_request_frame
8071  *
8072  * 0x38 csl start
8073  * diagnose_bus bit 7 = tx_en
8074  * diagnose_bus bit 6 = rx_en
8075  * diagnose_bus bit 5 = csl_start
8076  * diagnose_bus bit 4-1 = swio_always_on_to_lmac_ctrl.tx_flag_stat
8077  * diagnose_bus bit 0 = found_wu_packet;
8078  *
8079  * 0x39 Tsch TX ack timing
8080  * diagnose_bus bit 7-4 = swio_always_on_to_lmac_ctrl.tx_flag_stat
8081  * diagnose_bus bit 3 = tx_en
8082  * diagnose_bus bit 2 = rx_en
8083  * diagnose_bus bit 1 = ctrl_rx_to_lmac.packet_valid
8084  * diagnose_bus bit 0 = one_us_timer_ready
8085  *
8086  * 0x3a Phy control and Phy status
8087  * diagnose_bus bit 7 = phy_transaction
8088  * diagnose_bus bit 6 = phy_en
8089  * diagnose_bus bit 5 = rx_en
8090  * diagnose_bus bit 4 = tx_en
8091  * diagnose_bus bit 3 = cca_stat
8092  * diagnose bus bit 2 = ed_request
8093  * diagnose bus bit 1 = rx_enable_os_capt
8094  * diagnose bus bit 0 = found_tx_packet
8095  *
8096  * 0x3b Phy control, incl old PHY_EN (to show the improvement using v2)
8097  * diagnose_bus bit 7 = phy_transaction
8098  * diagnose_bus bit 6 = phy_en
8099  * diagnose_bus bit 5 = rx_en
8100  * diagnose_bus bit 4 = tx_en
8101  * diagnose_bus bit 3-0 = pti
8102  *
8103  * 0x3c Control signals for arbiter control state machine
8104  * diagnose_bus bit 7 = phy_transaction
8105  * diagnose_bus bit 6 = arb_phy_trans_set_store
8106  * diagnose_bus bit 5 = arb_phy_trans_clr_store
8107  * diagnose_bus bit 4 = arb_phy_trans_res_store
8108  * diagnose_bus bit 3 = found_tx_packet
8109  * diagnose bus bit 2 = found_tx_packet_next
8110  * diagnose bus bit 1 = found_wu_packet
8111  * diagnose bus bit 0 = req_for_ack_flag
8112  *
8113  * 0x3d Output of check which packet to send
8114  * diagnose_bus bit 7 = phy_transaction
8115  * diagnose_bus bit 6 = LmacReady4sleep
8116  * diagnose_bus bit 5-4 = found_tx_number
8117  * diagnose_bus bit 3-2 = found_tx_number_next
8118  * diagnose bus bit 1-0 = found_wu_number
8119  *
8120  * 0x3e CSMA_CA and timer control
8121  * diagnose_bus bit 7 = phy_transaction
8122  * diagnose_bus bit 6 = Csma_ca_resume_stat
8123  * diagnose_bus bit 5 = SingleCCA_os_capt
8124  * diagnose_bus bit 4 = backoff_timer_preset
8125  * diagnose_bus bit 3 = backoff_timer_almost_ready
8126  * diagnose bus bit 2 = backoff_timer_ready
8127  * diagnose bus bit 1 = arb_timer_preset
8128  * diagnose bus bit 0 = arb_timer_ready
8129  *
8130  * 0x3f arbiter control state machine
8131  * diagnose_bus bit 7 = phy_transaction
8132  * diagnose_bus bit 6 = rx_en
8133  * diagnose_bus bit 5 = arb_phy_trans_set_store
8134  * diagnose_bus bit 4 = arb_phy_trans_clr_store
8135  * diagnose_bus bit 3 = arb_phy_trans_res_store
8136  * diagnose bus bit 2-0 = arb_state_info
8137  *
8138  *
8139  * dbg_control in range 0x40 - 0x4f Debug security
8140  * 0x40 Security control
8141  * diagnose_bus bit 7 = swio_to_security.secStart
8142  * diagnose_bus bit 6 = swio_to_security.secTxRxn
8143  * diagnose_bus bit 5 = swio_to_security.secAbort
8144  * diagnose_bus bit 4 = swio_to_security.secEncDecn
8145  * diagnose_bus bit 3 = swio_from_security.secBusy
8146  * diagnose_bus bit 2 = swio_from_security.secAuthFail
8147  * diagnose_bus bit 1 = swio_from_security.secReady_e
8148  * diagnose_bus bit 0 = '0'
8149  *
8150  * 0x41 Security ctlid access rx and tx
8151  * diagnose_bus bit 7 = tx_sec_ci.ld_strb
8152  * diagnose_bus bit 6 = tx_sec_ci.ctlid_rw
8153  * diagnose_bus bit 5 = tx_sec_ci.selectp
8154  * diagnose_bus bit 4 = tx_sec_co.d_rdy
8155  * diagnose_bus bit 3 = rx_sec_ci.ld_strb
8156  * diagnose_bus bit 2 = rx_sec_ci.ctlid_rw
8157  * diagnose_bus bit 1 = rx_sec_ci.selectp
8158  * diagnose_bus bit 0 = rx_sec_co.d_rdy
8159  *
8160  * 0x42 Security ctlid access tx with sec_wr_data_valid
8161  * diagnose_bus bit 7 = tx_sec_ci.ld_strb
8162  * diagnose_bus bit 6 = tx_sec_ci.ctlid_rw
8163  * diagnose_bus bit 5 = tx_sec_ci.selectp
8164  * diagnose_bus bit 4 = tx_sec_co.d_rdy
8165  * diagnose_bus bit 3-0 = sec_wr_data_valid
8166  *
8167  * 0x43 Security ctlid access rx with sec_wr_data_valid
8168  * diagnose_bus bit 7 = rx_sec_ci.ld_strb
8169  * diagnose_bus bit 6 = rx_sec_ci.ctlid_rw
8170  * diagnose_bus bit 5 = rx_sec_ci.selectp
8171  * diagnose_bus bit 4 = rx_sec_co.d_rdy
8172  * diagnose_bus bit 3-0 = sec_wr_data_valid
8173  *
8174  * 0x44-0x4f Not used
8175  * diagnose bus bit 7 - 0 = all '0'
8176  *
8177  * dbg_control in range 0x50 - 0x5f AHB bus
8178  * 0x50 ahb bus without hsize
8179  * diagnose_bus bit 7 = hsel
8180  * diagnose_bus bit 6-5 = htrans
8181  * diagnose_bus bit 4 = hwrite
8182  * diagnose_bus bit 3 = hready_in
8183  * diagnose_bus bit 2 = hready_out
8184  * diagnose_bus bit 1-0 = hresp
8185  *
8186  * 0x51 ahb bus without hwready_in and hresp(1)
8187  * diagnose_bus bit 7 = hsel
8188  * diagnose_bus bit 6-5 = htrans
8189  * diagnose_bus bit 4 = hwrite
8190  * diagnose_bus bit 3-2 = hhsize(1 downto 0)
8191  * diagnose_bus bit 1 = hready_out
8192  * diagnose_bus bit 0 = hresp(0)
8193  *
8194  * 0x52 Amba tx signals
8195  * diagnose_bus bit 7 = ai_tx.penable
8196  * diagnose_bus bit 6 = ai_tx.psel
8197  * diagnose_bus bit 5 = ai_tx.pwrite
8198  * diagnose_bus bit 4 = ao_tx.pready
8199  * diagnose_bus bit 3 = ao_tx.pslverr
8200  * diagnose_bus bit 2-1 = psize_tx
8201  * diagnose_bus bit 0 = hready_out
8202  *
8203  * 0x53 Amba rx signals
8204  * diagnose_bus bit 7 = ai_rx.penable
8205  * diagnose_bus bit 6 = ai_rx.psel
8206  * diagnose_bus bit 5 = ai_rx.pwrite
8207  * diagnose_bus bit 4 = ao_rx.pready
8208  * diagnose_bus bit 3 = ao_rx.pslverr
8209  * diagnose_bus bit 2-1 = psize_rx
8210  * diagnose_bus bit 0 = hready_out
8211  *
8212  * 0x54 Amba register map signals
8213  * diagnose_bus bit 7 = ai_reg.penable
8214  * diagnose_bus bit 6 = ai_reg.psel
8215  * diagnose_bus bit 5 = ai_reg.pwrite
8216  * diagnose_bus bit 4 = ao_reg.pready
8217  * diagnose_bus bit 3 = ao_reg.pslverr
8218  * diagnose_bus bit 2-1 = "00"
8219  * diagnose_bus bit 0 = hready_out
8220  *
8221  * 0x55-0x5f Not used
8222  * diagnose bus bit 7 - 0 = all '0'
8223  */
8224 #define IND_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_DBG_CONTROL IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_DEBUGCONTROL
8225 #define MSK_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_DBG_CONTROL 0xff
8226 #define OFF_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_DBG_CONTROL 0
8227 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_DBG_CONTROL 8
8228 
8229 /*
8230  *
8231  * REGISTER: ftdf_on_off_regmap_txbyte_e
8232  *
8233  * Initialization value: 0x0 Initialization mask: 0x3
8234  * Access mode: E-RCW (event read/clear on write 1)
8235  */
8236 #define IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_TXBYTE_E 0x40090394
8237 #define SIZE_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_TXBYTE_E 0x4
8238 #define MSK_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_TXBYTE_E 0x3
8239 
8240 /*
8241  *
8242  * Bit: ftdf_on_off_regmap_txbyte_e
8243  *
8244  * If set to '1', it indicates the first byte of a frame is transmitted
8245  * This event bit contributes to ftdf_ce[4].
8246  */
8247 #define IND_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_TXBYTE_E IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_TXBYTE_E
8248 #define MSK_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_TXBYTE_E 0x1
8249 #define OFF_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_TXBYTE_E 0
8250 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_TXBYTE_E 1
8251 /*
8252  *
8253  * Bit: ftdf_on_off_regmap_tx_last_symbol_e
8254  *
8255  * If set to '1', it indicates the last symbol of a frame is transmitted
8256  * This event bit contributes to ftdf_ce[4].
8257  */
8258 #define IND_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_TX_LAST_SYMBOL_E IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_TXBYTE_E
8259 #define MSK_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_TX_LAST_SYMBOL_E 0x2
8260 #define OFF_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_TX_LAST_SYMBOL_E 1
8261 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_TX_LAST_SYMBOL_E 1
8262 
8263 /*
8264  *
8265  * REGISTER: ftdf_on_off_regmap_txbyte_m
8266  *
8267  * Initialization value: 0x0 Initialization mask: 0x3
8268  * Access mode: EM-RW (event mask)
8269  */
8270 #define IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_TXBYTE_M 0x40090398
8271 #define SIZE_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_TXBYTE_M 0x4
8272 #define MSK_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_TXBYTE_M 0x3
8273 
8274 /*
8275  *
8276  * Bit: ftdf_on_off_regmap_txbyte_m
8277  *
8278  * Mask bit for event "txbyte_e".
8279  * The mask bit is masking when cleared to '0' (default value) and will enable the contribution to the interrupt when set to '1'.
8280  */
8281 #define IND_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_TXBYTE_M IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_TXBYTE_M
8282 #define MSK_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_TXBYTE_M 0x1
8283 #define OFF_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_TXBYTE_M 0
8284 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_TXBYTE_M 1
8285 /*
8286  *
8287  * Bit: ftdf_on_off_regmap_tx_last_symbol_m
8288  *
8289  * Mask bit for event "tx_last_symbol_e".
8290  * The mask bit is masking when cleared to '0' (default value) and will enable the contribution to the interrupt when set to '1'.
8291  */
8292 #define IND_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_TX_LAST_SYMBOL_M IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_TXBYTE_M
8293 #define MSK_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_TX_LAST_SYMBOL_M 0x2
8294 #define OFF_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_TX_LAST_SYMBOL_M 1
8295 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_TX_LAST_SYMBOL_M 1
8296 
8297 /*
8298  *
8299  * REGISTER: ftdf_on_off_regmap_tx_flag_s
8300  *
8301  * Initialization value: none.
8302  * Access mode: S-R (state - read)
8303  */
8304 #define IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_TX_FLAG_S 0x40090400
8305 #define SIZE_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_TX_FLAG_S 0x4
8306 #define MSK_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_TX_FLAG_S 0x1
8307 #define FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_TX_FLAG_S_NUM 0x4
8308 #define FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_TX_FLAG_S_INTVL 0x20
8309 #define FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_TX_FLAG_STAT_NUM 0x4
8310 #define FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_TX_FLAG_STAT_INTVL 0x20
8311 
8312 /*
8313  *
8314  * Bit: ftdf_on_off_regmap_tx_flag_stat
8315  *
8316  * Tx meta data per entry: if set to '1', the packet is ready for transmission
8317  */
8318 #define IND_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_TX_FLAG_STAT IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_TX_FLAG_S
8319 #define MSK_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_TX_FLAG_STAT 0x1
8320 #define OFF_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_TX_FLAG_STAT 0
8321 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_TX_FLAG_STAT 1
8322 
8323 /*
8324  *
8325  * REGISTER: ftdf_on_off_regmap_tx_flag_clear_e
8326  *
8327  * Initialization value: 0x0 Initialization mask: 0x1
8328  * Access mode: E-RCW (event read/clear on write 1)
8329  */
8330 #define IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_TX_FLAG_CLEAR_E 0x40090404
8331 #define SIZE_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_TX_FLAG_CLEAR_E 0x4
8332 #define MSK_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_TX_FLAG_CLEAR_E 0x1
8333 #define FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_TX_FLAG_CLEAR_E_NUM 0x4
8334 #define FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_TX_FLAG_CLEAR_E_INTVL 0x20
8335 #define FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_TX_FLAG_CLEAR_E_NUM 0x4
8336 #define FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_TX_FLAG_CLEAR_E_INTVL 0x20
8337 
8338 /*
8339  *
8340  * Bit: ftdf_on_off_regmap_tx_flag_clear_e
8341  *
8342  * Tx meta data per entry: if set to '1' the LMAC hardware has cleared the tx_flag_stat status.
8343  * This event bit contributes to ftdf_ce[4].
8344  */
8345 #define IND_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_TX_FLAG_CLEAR_E IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_TX_FLAG_CLEAR_E
8346 #define MSK_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_TX_FLAG_CLEAR_E 0x1
8347 #define OFF_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_TX_FLAG_CLEAR_E 0
8348 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_TX_FLAG_CLEAR_E 1
8349 
8350 /*
8351  *
8352  * REGISTER: ftdf_on_off_regmap_tx_flag_clear_m
8353  *
8354  * Initialization value: 0x0 Initialization mask: 0x1
8355  * Access mode: EM-RW (event mask)
8356  */
8357 #define IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_TX_FLAG_CLEAR_M 0x40090408
8358 #define SIZE_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_TX_FLAG_CLEAR_M 0x4
8359 #define MSK_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_TX_FLAG_CLEAR_M 0x1
8360 #define FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_TX_FLAG_CLEAR_M_NUM 0x4
8361 #define FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_TX_FLAG_CLEAR_M_INTVL 0x20
8362 #define FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_TX_FLAG_CLEAR_M_NUM 0x4
8363 #define FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_TX_FLAG_CLEAR_M_INTVL 0x20
8364 
8365 /*
8366  *
8367  * Bit: ftdf_on_off_regmap_tx_flag_clear_m
8368  *
8369  * Tx meta data per entry: Mask bit for event "tx_flag_clear_e".
8370  * The mask bit is masking when cleared to '0' (default value) and will enable the contribution to the interrupt when set to '1'.
8371  */
8372 #define IND_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_TX_FLAG_CLEAR_M IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_TX_FLAG_CLEAR_M
8373 #define MSK_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_TX_FLAG_CLEAR_M 0x1
8374 #define OFF_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_TX_FLAG_CLEAR_M 0
8375 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_TX_FLAG_CLEAR_M 1
8376 
8377 /*
8378  *
8379  * REGISTER: ftdf_on_off_regmap_tx_priority
8380  *
8381  * Initialization value: 0x0 Initialization mask: 0xf1f
8382  * Access mode: C-RW (control - read/write)
8383  */
8384 #define IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_TX_PRIORITY 0x40090410
8385 #define SIZE_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_TX_PRIORITY 0x4
8386 #define MSK_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_TX_PRIORITY 0xf1f
8387 #define FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_TX_PRIORITY_NUM 0x4
8388 #define FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_TX_PRIORITY_INTVL 0x20
8389 #define FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_TX_PRIORITY_NUM 0x4
8390 #define FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_TX_PRIORITY_INTVL 0x20
8391 #define FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_ISWAKEUP_NUM 0x4
8392 #define FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_ISWAKEUP_INTVL 0x20
8393 #define FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_PTI_TX_NUM 0x4
8394 #define FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_PTI_TX_INTVL 0x20
8395 
8396 /*
8397  *
8398  * Field: ftdf_on_off_regmap_tx_priority
8399  *
8400  * Tx meta data per entry: Priority of packet
8401  */
8402 #define IND_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_TX_PRIORITY IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_TX_PRIORITY
8403 #define MSK_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_TX_PRIORITY 0xf
8404 #define OFF_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_TX_PRIORITY 0
8405 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_TX_PRIORITY 4
8406 /*
8407  *
8408  * Bit: ftdf_on_off_regmap_IsWakeUp
8409  *
8410  * Tx meta data per entry: A basic wake-up frame can be generated by the UMAC in the Tx buffer.
8411  * The meta data control bit IsWakeUp must be set to indicate that this is a Wake-up frame.
8412  */
8413 #define IND_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_ISWAKEUP IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_TX_PRIORITY
8414 #define MSK_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_ISWAKEUP 0x10
8415 #define OFF_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_ISWAKEUP 4
8416 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_ISWAKEUP 1
8417 /*
8418  *
8419  * Field: ftdf_on_off_regmap_pti_tx
8420  *
8421  * This register has 4 entries, belonging to the entry of the Tx frame to send, to be used during transmitting frames and the CMSA-CA phase before (when requested).
8422  * In TSCH mode this register shall be used during the time slot in which frames can be transmitted and consequently an Enhanced ACK can be received.
8423  * Since pti_tx belongs to a certain frame to be transmitted, pti_tx can be considered as extra Tx meta data.
8424  */
8425 #define IND_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_PTI_TX IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_TX_PRIORITY
8426 #define MSK_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_PTI_TX 0xf00
8427 #define OFF_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_PTI_TX 8
8428 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_PTI_TX 4
8429 
8430 /*
8431  *
8432  * REGISTER: ftdf_on_off_regmap_tx_set_os
8433  *
8434  * Initialization value: 0x0 Initialization mask: 0xf
8435  * Access mode: OS-W (one-shot - write)
8436  */
8437 #define IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_TX_SET_OS 0x40090480
8438 #define SIZE_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_TX_SET_OS 0x4
8439 #define MSK_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_TX_SET_OS 0xf
8440 
8441 /*
8442  *
8443  * Field: ftdf_on_off_regmap_tx_flag_set
8444  *
8445  * Tx meta data per entry: if set to '1', the tx_flag_stat will be set to '1'.
8446  */
8447 #define IND_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_TX_FLAG_SET IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_TX_SET_OS
8448 #define MSK_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_TX_FLAG_SET 0xf
8449 #define OFF_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_TX_FLAG_SET 0
8450 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_TX_FLAG_SET 4
8451 
8452 /*
8453  *
8454  * REGISTER: ftdf_on_off_regmap_tx_clear_os
8455  *
8456  * Initialization value: 0x0 Initialization mask: 0xf
8457  * Access mode: OS-W (one-shot - write)
8458  */
8459 #define IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_TX_CLEAR_OS 0x40090484
8460 #define SIZE_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_TX_CLEAR_OS 0x4
8461 #define MSK_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_TX_CLEAR_OS 0xf
8462 
8463 /*
8464  *
8465  * Field: ftdf_on_off_regmap_tx_flag_clear
8466  *
8467  * Tx meta data per entry: if set to '1', the tx_flag_stat will be cleared to '0'.
8468  */
8469 #define IND_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_TX_FLAG_CLEAR IND_R_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_TX_CLEAR_OS
8470 #define MSK_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_TX_FLAG_CLEAR 0xf
8471 #define OFF_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_TX_FLAG_CLEAR 0
8472 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_ON_OFF_REGMAP_TX_FLAG_CLEAR 4
8473 
8474 /*
8475  *
8476  * REGISTER: ftdf_always_on_regmap_wakeup_control
8477  *
8478  * Initialization value: 0x40000000 Initialization mask: 0xe1ffffff
8479  * Access mode: C-RW (control - read/write)
8480  */
8481 #define IND_R_FTDF_ALWAYS_ON_REGMAP_WAKEUP_CONTROL 0x40091000
8482 #define SIZE_R_FTDF_ALWAYS_ON_REGMAP_WAKEUP_CONTROL 0x4
8483 #define MSK_R_FTDF_ALWAYS_ON_REGMAP_WAKEUP_CONTROL 0xe1ffffff
8484 
8485 /*
8486  *
8487  * Field: ftdf_always_on_regmap_WakeUpIntThr
8488  *
8489  * Threshold for wake-up interrupt. When WakeUpEnable is set to '1' and the Wake-up (event) counter matches this value, the interrupt WAKEUP_IRQ is set to '1' for the duration of one LP_CLK period.
8490  */
8491 #define IND_F_FTDF_ALWAYS_ON_REGMAP_WAKEUPINTTHR IND_R_FTDF_ALWAYS_ON_REGMAP_WAKEUP_CONTROL
8492 #define MSK_F_FTDF_ALWAYS_ON_REGMAP_WAKEUPINTTHR 0x1ffffff
8493 #define OFF_F_FTDF_ALWAYS_ON_REGMAP_WAKEUPINTTHR 0
8494 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_ALWAYS_ON_REGMAP_WAKEUPINTTHR 25
8495 /*
8496  *
8497  * Bit: ftdf_always_on_regmap_WakeUpEnable
8498  *
8499  * If set to '1', the WakeUpIntThr is enabled to generate an WAKEUP_IRQ interrupt.
8500  */
8501 #define IND_F_FTDF_ALWAYS_ON_REGMAP_WAKEUPENABLE IND_R_FTDF_ALWAYS_ON_REGMAP_WAKEUP_CONTROL
8502 #define MSK_F_FTDF_ALWAYS_ON_REGMAP_WAKEUPENABLE 0x20000000
8503 #define OFF_F_FTDF_ALWAYS_ON_REGMAP_WAKEUPENABLE 29
8504 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_ALWAYS_ON_REGMAP_WAKEUPENABLE 1
8505 /*
8506  *
8507  * Field: ftdf_always_on_regmap_WakeUp_mode
8508  *
8509  * The Control register WakeUp_mode controls the behavior of the Event counter:
8510  * 0d = off, 1d = free running (default), 2d = one shot with auto clear, 3d = configurable period (timer
8511  * mode).
8512  */
8513 #define IND_F_FTDF_ALWAYS_ON_REGMAP_WAKEUP_MODE IND_R_FTDF_ALWAYS_ON_REGMAP_WAKEUP_CONTROL
8514 #define MSK_F_FTDF_ALWAYS_ON_REGMAP_WAKEUP_MODE 0xc0000000
8515 #define OFF_F_FTDF_ALWAYS_ON_REGMAP_WAKEUP_MODE 30
8516 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_ALWAYS_ON_REGMAP_WAKEUP_MODE 2
8517 
8518 /*
8519  *
8520  * REGISTER: ftdf_fp_processing_ram_long_addr_0
8521  *
8522  * Initialization value: none.
8523  * Access mode: C-RW (control - read/write)
8524  */
8525 #define IND_R_FTDF_FP_PROCESSING_RAM_LONG_ADDR_0 0x40092000
8526 #define SIZE_R_FTDF_FP_PROCESSING_RAM_LONG_ADDR_0 0x4
8527 #define MSK_R_FTDF_FP_PROCESSING_RAM_LONG_ADDR_0 0xffffffff
8528 #define FTDF_FP_PROCESSING_RAM_LONG_ADDR_0_NUM 0x18
8529 #define FTDF_FP_PROCESSING_RAM_LONG_ADDR_0_INTVL 0x10
8530 #define FTDF_FP_PROCESSING_RAM_EXP_SA_L_NUM 0x18
8531 #define FTDF_FP_PROCESSING_RAM_EXP_SA_L_INTVL 0x10
8532 
8533 /*
8534  *
8535  * Field: ftdf_fp_processing_ram_Exp_SA_l
8536  *
8537  * Lowest part of the 64 bits long source address or SA entry 1 resp. SA entry 0 in case of short source address.
8538  */
8539 #define IND_F_FTDF_FP_PROCESSING_RAM_EXP_SA_L IND_R_FTDF_FP_PROCESSING_RAM_LONG_ADDR_0
8540 #define MSK_F_FTDF_FP_PROCESSING_RAM_EXP_SA_L 0xffffffff
8541 #define OFF_F_FTDF_FP_PROCESSING_RAM_EXP_SA_L 0
8542 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_FP_PROCESSING_RAM_EXP_SA_L 32
8543 
8544 /*
8545  *
8546  * REGISTER: ftdf_fp_processing_ram_long_addr_1
8547  *
8548  * Initialization value: none.
8549  * Access mode: C-RW (control - read/write)
8550  */
8551 #define IND_R_FTDF_FP_PROCESSING_RAM_LONG_ADDR_1 0x40092004
8552 #define SIZE_R_FTDF_FP_PROCESSING_RAM_LONG_ADDR_1 0x4
8553 #define MSK_R_FTDF_FP_PROCESSING_RAM_LONG_ADDR_1 0xffffffff
8554 #define FTDF_FP_PROCESSING_RAM_LONG_ADDR_1_NUM 0x18
8555 #define FTDF_FP_PROCESSING_RAM_LONG_ADDR_1_INTVL 0x10
8556 #define FTDF_FP_PROCESSING_RAM_EXP_SA_H_NUM 0x18
8557 #define FTDF_FP_PROCESSING_RAM_EXP_SA_H_INTVL 0x10
8558 
8559 /*
8560  *
8561  * Field: ftdf_fp_processing_ram_Exp_SA_h
8562  *
8563  * Highest part of the 64 bits long source address or SA entry 3 resp. SA entry 2 in case of short source address.
8564  */
8565 #define IND_F_FTDF_FP_PROCESSING_RAM_EXP_SA_H IND_R_FTDF_FP_PROCESSING_RAM_LONG_ADDR_1
8566 #define MSK_F_FTDF_FP_PROCESSING_RAM_EXP_SA_H 0xffffffff
8567 #define OFF_F_FTDF_FP_PROCESSING_RAM_EXP_SA_H 0
8568 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_FP_PROCESSING_RAM_EXP_SA_H 32
8569 
8570 /*
8571  *
8572  * REGISTER: ftdf_fp_processing_ram_size_and_val
8573  *
8574  * Initialization value: none.
8575  * Access mode: C-RW (control - read/write)
8576  */
8577 #define IND_R_FTDF_FP_PROCESSING_RAM_SIZE_AND_VAL 0x40092008
8578 #define SIZE_R_FTDF_FP_PROCESSING_RAM_SIZE_AND_VAL 0x4
8579 #define MSK_R_FTDF_FP_PROCESSING_RAM_SIZE_AND_VAL 0x1f
8580 #define FTDF_FP_PROCESSING_RAM_SIZE_AND_VAL_NUM 0x18
8581 #define FTDF_FP_PROCESSING_RAM_SIZE_AND_VAL_INTVL 0x10
8582 #define FTDF_FP_PROCESSING_RAM_VALID_SA_NUM 0x18
8583 #define FTDF_FP_PROCESSING_RAM_VALID_SA_INTVL 0x10
8584 #define FTDF_FP_PROCESSING_RAM_SHORT_LONGNOT_NUM 0x18
8585 #define FTDF_FP_PROCESSING_RAM_SHORT_LONGNOT_INTVL 0x10
8586 
8587 /*
8588  *
8589  * Field: ftdf_fp_processing_ram_Valid_SA
8590  *
8591  * Indication which SA entry is valid (if set). In case of 4 short SA Valid bit 3 belongs to SA entry 3 etc.
8592  * In case of a long SA Valid bit 0 is the valid indication.
8593  */
8594 #define IND_F_FTDF_FP_PROCESSING_RAM_VALID_SA IND_R_FTDF_FP_PROCESSING_RAM_SIZE_AND_VAL
8595 #define MSK_F_FTDF_FP_PROCESSING_RAM_VALID_SA 0xf
8596 #define OFF_F_FTDF_FP_PROCESSING_RAM_VALID_SA 0
8597 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_FP_PROCESSING_RAM_VALID_SA 4
8598 /*
8599  *
8600  * Bit: ftdf_fp_processing_ram_Short_LongNot
8601  *
8602  * A '1' indicates that Exp_SA contains four short SA's, a '0' indicates one long SA.
8603  */
8604 #define IND_F_FTDF_FP_PROCESSING_RAM_SHORT_LONGNOT IND_R_FTDF_FP_PROCESSING_RAM_SIZE_AND_VAL
8605 #define MSK_F_FTDF_FP_PROCESSING_RAM_SHORT_LONGNOT 0x10
8606 #define OFF_F_FTDF_FP_PROCESSING_RAM_SHORT_LONGNOT 4
8607 #define SIZE_F_FTDF_FP_PROCESSING_RAM_SHORT_LONGNOT 1
8608 #endif // dg_configBLACK_ORCA_IC_REV != BLACK_ORCA_IC_REV_A
8609 #endif // _ftdf
